F2: `Leslie Aun a ɔyɛ lasamafo ɛma Komen Foundation kaa sɛ, ahyɛhyɛde no agye mmara foforo bi atom ɛmma wɔn kwan mma wɔnnye sika anaa ahyɛhyɛdeɛ wɔreyɛ nhwehwɛmu afa wɔn ho nsɔ wɔn ase anaa mmoa wɔn wɔ sikasɛm mu.`
---------------------- (275) ----------------------
F1: `Komen mmara no amma Planned Parenthood anka ho bi esane nhwehwɛmu a na Representative Cliff Sterns reyɔ afa sɛdeɛ Planned Parenthood de wɔn sika yɛ adwuma ne sɛdeɛ wɔbu ho akontaa no.`
F2: `Komen nhyehyɛe no mma Planned Parenthood mfata esiane sɛ Cliff Stearns ananmusifo reyɛ nhwehwɛmu afa Planned Parenthood ho wɔ kwan ɛfa de sika di dwuma ɛbɔ ne sikasɛm ho amanne.`
---------------------- (276) ----------------------
F1: `Stearns reyɛ nhwenhwɛmu ahwɛ ahu sɛ wɔde ɛtoɔ boa nyinsɛn a wɔyi gu denam Planned Parenthood sɛdeɛ wabɛyɛ ɔtitrani ma Oversight ne Investigation kuo ketewa no a House Energy ne Commerce hyɛ wɔn ase no.`
F2: `Stearns reyɛ nhwehwɛmu ahwɛ sɛ Planned Parenthood de toɔ sika na etuatuaa nyinsɛtugo ho aka bere na ɔredi dwuma sɛ obi na ɔda nhwehwɛmu kuo no ano a ɛhyɛ House Energy ne Commerce Committee ase no.`
---------------------- (277) ----------------------
F1: `Kane Massachusetts amrado Mitt Romney dii nkonim wɔ Florida Republican amayɔkuo ɔmanpanin abatoɔ no mu wɔ Benada, ɔnnya mma ɔha nkyekyɛm aduannansia.`
F2: `Massachusetts gɔvna dada Mitt Romney adi nkunim wɔ Republican amnnyɔku no aba wɔtoo wɔ Florida Benada no mu na ɔnyaa aba a wɔtooe no mu ɔha nkyekyɛmu 46.`
---------------------- (278) ----------------------
F1: `Kane U.S mmarahyɛ badwam kasamafoɔ ma House Newt Gingrich tɔɔ so mmienu na mma dodoɔ a ɔnya yɛ ɔha nkyekyɛm aduasa mmienu.`
F2: `U.S. Kasamafo dada a na ɔwɔ Newt Gingrich tɔɔ so abien na ɔnyaa ɔha nkyekyɛmu 32.`
---------------------- (279) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛdeɛ mantam teɛ no, dea nkonim no bɛtu frankaa ama wɔn no, Floridafoɔ de frankaatufoɔ mma no mu aduonum ma Romney, sɛdeɛ ɔbɛdi Republican amayɔkuo no anim.`
F2: `Sɛ siteeti deɛ ɔdi nkunim na ɔfa biribiara bɔ so no, Florida de delegates aduonum no nyinaa maa Romney na ɛmaa ɔbɛdii nkan sɛ obi a Republican amannyɔkuo no ayi no.`
---------------------- (280) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔhyehyɛ ɔyɛkerɛ no kaɛ sɛ nnipa bɛyɛ 100,000 na ɛbaa German nkuro tesɛ Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, ne Hanover.`
F2: `Wɔn wɔyɛɛ ɔyɛkyerɛ no ho ntotoe no kyerɛ sɛ nnipa a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛɛ ɔyɛkyerɛ no mu no wɔ German nkuro te sɛ Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg ne Hanover ano si 100,000.`
---------------------- (281) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ Berlin, apolisifoɔ susu ayɛkyerɛfuo bɛyɛ mpem nsia ne aha num.`
F2: `Wɔ Berlin no, apolisifo asusuw nipa dowdow bɛyɛ mpem asia ne ahanum(6,500) a wɔyɛ asɔretiafo.`
---------------------- (282) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔyɛkyerɛ nso bi kɔɔ so wɔ Paris, Sofia a ɛwɔ Bulgaria, Vilnius a ɛwɔ Lithuania, Valetta a ɛwɔ Malta, Tallinn a ɛwɔ Estonia ɛna Edinburgh ne Glasgow a ɛwɔ Scotland.`
F2: `Asɔretia nso akɔ so wɔ Paris, Sofia a ɛwɔ Bulgaria, Vilnius a ɛwɔ Lithuania, Valetta a ɛwɔ Malta, Tallinn a ɛwɔ Estonia ne Edinburgh ne Glosgow a ɛwɔ Scotland.`
---------------------- (283) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ London, nnipa bɛyɛ sɛ ahanu yɛɛ ɔyɛkyerɛ wo wura ne copyright dwumadibea titire abɔnten so.`
F2: `Wɔ London no, nipa bɛyɛ ahanu (200) na ɛsɔre tiaa adwumakuo ofisis a mmara ma wɔn kwan anaa tumi sɛ wɔyɛ adwuma.`
---------------------- (284) ----------------------
F1: `Bosome a ɛtwamu no, ɔyɛkyerɛ keseɛ bi kɔɔ so wɔ Poland abira na ɔman no de ne nsa ahyɛ ACTA ase, wei faa so maa Poland aban no fa adwen sɛ ɔre nsesa ngyetumu a ne nsa hyɛ aseɛ, seesei.`
F2: `Ɔsram a ɛtwam no, ɔsɔretia a ɛmu yɛ den pii kɔɔ so wɔ Poland bere a ɔman no de de wɔn nsa hyɛɛ ACTA krataa ase ma nti Poland aban ayɛ adwene sɛ ɔnhwehwɛ nea woagye atom no mprenpren no mu.`
---------------------- (285) ----------------------
F1: `Latvia ne Slovakia mmienu twentwɛn wɔn nan ase sɛ wɔde wɔn ho bɛdom ACTA.`
F2: `Latvia ne Slovakia atwetwɛn nhyehye a wɔde dɔm ACTA.`
---------------------- (286) ----------------------
F1: `Animal Liberation and Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) ɛrepre sɛ mmara kwan so wɔde ‘CCTV’ mfonitwa afidie bɛbobɔ mmea a wɔkum mmoa wɔ Australia man no mu.`
F2: `Animal Liberation ne Royal Society a Ɛko tia Mmoa a wɔyɛ wɔn Ayayade (RSPCA) resrɛ sɛ wɔmfa CCTV kamera nkɔ baabi a wɔkum mmoa wɔ Australia.`
---------------------- (287) ----------------------
F1: `RSPCA New South Wales polisini panin David O’Shannessy ka kyerɛɛ ABC sɛ, ɛwɔ sɛ kamera a ɛtwa kurom nneɛma sɛ sini ne sɛ berɛ ano berɛ ano wɔrekɔ mmea a wɔkum mmoa yɛ adeɛ a wɔtae yɛ wɔ Australia man no mu.`
F2: `RSPCA New South Wales panin chief inspector David O'Shannessy de too ABC anim sɛ hwɛ a wɔde wɔn ani bɛdi deɛ ɛrekɔ so baabi a wɔkunkum mmoa no ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ biribi a ɛbɛwɔ Australia afanan baabiara.`
---------------------- (288) ----------------------
F1: `"CCTV no de kɔkɔbɔ kɛseɛ bɛma wɔn a wɔyɛ mmoa ho adwuma ama wɔahunu sɛ wɔn yieyɔ yɛ adeɛ a ɛdi mu pa ara."`
F2: `CCTV no bɛma wɔn a wɔde mmoa di dwuma ahunu sɛ wɔn yiyedi ho hia paa.`
---------------------- (289) ----------------------
F1: `Bosome a atwam no, mape asase wosoↄ akyerɛkyerɛkwan ne United States Geological Survey no daa no adi sɛ asase wosoↄ biara ansi wↄ Iceland.`
F2: `Asase mu nhwehwɛmufo a wↄwↄ United States no wiase nyinaa asasewosow akyerɛkyerɛkwan no daa no adi sɛ, wↄ nnawↄtwe a etwaa mu no,asasewosow biara ansi wↄ Iceland.`
---------------------- (290) ----------------------
F1: `Ↄfese a ɛhwɛ Iceland kurow no ewiem nsakraeɛ so no de ato dwa sɛ asasewosoↄ biara nkↄↄ so wↄ Hekla mpↄtam ho nnↄnhere 48 a etwmu yi mu.`
F2: `Ↄfese a ɛhwɛ Iceland kurow no wim nsakrae so no abↄ amanneɛ sɛ asasewosow biara ensii wↄ Hekla mpↄtam hↄ nnↄnhere 48 a atwam yi.`
---------------------- (291) ----------------------
F1: `Asasewosoↄ a ɛyɛ hu na ɛde nsakraeɛ a ɛda nsow bae no sii Ɔbenem 10 wↄ “summit caldera" ne "volcano” atifi-apueeɛ mantam hↄ.`
F2: `Asasewosow a ɛyɛ hu na ɛde nsakrae soronko bae no sii March 10 wↄ tokuro kɛseɛ a ɛda bepↄw no atifi,ne fa a ɛkyerɛ atifi-apueeɛ no.`
---------------------- (292) ----------------------
F1: `Amaneɛbↄ kyerɛ sɛ bepↄw no ase yɛɛ kusuu a na ɛnyɛ sɛ ogya bi firi bepↄw no mu na ɛɛba.`
F2: `Amaneɛbↄ kyerɛ sɛ bepↄw no ase yɛɛ kusuu a na ɛnyɛ sɛ ogya bi fi bepↄw no mu ba.`
---------------------- (293) ----------------------
F1: `Mununkum no yɛbea bɛyɛɛ te sɛ deɛ ogya bi epue firi bepↄw no mu.`
F2: `Mununkum no yɛbea yɛɛ te sɛ nea ogya bi epue fi bepↄw no mu.`
---------------------- (294) ----------------------
F1: `Na Luno no kura fangoo 120- 160 ‘cubic metres’ berɛ a ɛsɛeɛ maa mframa gyampantrudu ne asɔɔkye piaa no kɔtoo adwumayɛfoɔ nsuo bi mu.`
F2: `Bere a Luno no sɛɛe na mframa twee no kɔɔ breakwater mu no na ɛwɔ fango kubik mita 120–160 .`
---------------------- (295) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde wiemhyɛn kɔyii nkurɔfokuo dummienu no na pira a na ɛwom yɛ obi hwene a na abu.`
F2: `Helicipters kɔ twitwa gyee crewmembers du abien na pira a ɛwom yɛ ɛhwene na ɛho atɔ kyema.`
---------------------- (296) ----------------------
F1: `Na suhyɛn a ne tenten yɛ 100-metre no nam kwan so rekɔfa adaka a afuom nnuro wɔ mu no sɛnea wɔyɛ no daa no, na mpanimfoɔ no bi suro sɛ ahina no bɛtumi ama nneɛma no bi ada adi.`
F2: `Na hyɛn a ɛyɛ mita 100 no nam ne kwan a daa ɔfa so sɛ ɛrekɔ fa fertiliser cargo na mfiase no na mpaninfo suro sɛ hyɛn no load no bɛspill.`
---------------------- (297) ----------------------
F1: `Nsusuiɛ foforɔ a wɔde aba no adi kan afa mmara nsusuiɛ mu dada wɔ afe 2011.`
F2: `Nsesae a wɔasusu no wɔagye ne mmienu atom wɔ fie hɔ ɛwɔ 2011 mu.`
---------------------- (298) ----------------------
F1: `Mmarahyɛbadwa no fa a ɛhyɛ mmara no yɛɛ nsesaeɛ berɛ a House of Representatives pepaa ɔkasamu a ɛtɔ so mmienu na afei ‘Senate’ hyɛɛ mmara no ɔkwan foforɔ so a na ɛne dada no sɛ a na ɛyɛ ɛda Dwoada.`
F2: `Wɔyɛɛ nsesae wɔ saa mmara yi mu bere a House of Representatives no popaa kasamu a ɛtɔ so abien no na Senate no gye fɔɔm a ɛte saa toom wɔ Dwoada no.`
---------------------- (299) ----------------------
F1: `Mmarahyɛbadwa no fa a ɛhyɛ mmara no yɛɛ nsesaeɛ berɛ a House of Representatives pepaa mmara a ɛtɔ so mmienu no na afei ‘Senate’ hyɛɛ mmara Dwoada kwan foforɔ so a na ɛne dada no sɛ.`
F2: `Kasamu a ɛtɔ so abien a annyina, a ɛkasa tia bra wɔbra bɔbeasu-korɔ nna civil unio, ho nsɛm bɛsɔre daakye bi.`
---------------------- (300) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔgu redi nhyehyɛeɛ no so no, mmarahyɛ adwuma a wɔbɛpa wɔn no bɛhwehwɛ HJR-3 no mu bio wɔ afe 2015 anaa 2016 de akyerɛ sɛ ɛnkɔ so nwɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Mmarahyɛfoa wɔato aba ayi wɔn no bɛsane ahwehwɛ HJR-3 no mu wɔ ebia 2015 anaasɛ 2016 na ama wɔatena prosɛse no mu.`
---------------------- (301) ----------------------
F1: `Vautier yiedie a ɔdiiɛ a na ɛmfa atenetene adwuma ho no bi ne atuatoɔ a wɔte tia kɔm wɔ afe 1973 mu de kyerɛɛ ne bo a na ɛnwo nneɛma a aban abra so.`
F2: `Nneɛma a Vautie atumi ayɛ a akwankyerɛ ma ɛda nkyɛn a, deɛ ɛko ne aduane a ɔde kamee ne ho sɛ ɔnni wɔ afe 1973 a na ɔhunu sɛ ɛyɛ amannyɔsɛm mu nsɛm a wɔde sie ɔmanfo`
---------------------- (302) ----------------------
F1: `Francefoɔ mmara asesa. Ne ntoabɔ dwuamdie no hyɛɛ aseɛ berɛ a na wadi mfeɛ 15 wɔ berɛ a ɔde ne ho kɔbɔɔ French Resistance wɔ Wiase ntɔkwa kɛseɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu no mu.`
F2: `Wɔsesaa French mmara no mu. Ne activism no firii ase mfe 15 bere a ɔkɔdɔmm French Resistance no wɔ Wiase ko II`
---------------------- (303) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔkunkyiree ne ho nsɛm guu nwoma bi a ɔtwerɛɛ no afe 1998 mu.`
F2: `Ɔkaa n’anaksa ho asɛm wɔ 1998 nwoma mu.`
---------------------- (304) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ afe 1960 mmerɛ mu no, ɔsanee n’akyi kɔɔ Algeria man a na afei na wɔanya faahodie mu kɔkyerɛɛ sinitwa.`
F2: `Afe 1960’s mu no ɔde n’ani kyerɛɛ Algeria a na anya faahodie foforɔ no kɔ kyerɛ sɛnea wɔyɛ sini.`
---------------------- (305) ----------------------
F1: `Japanni Judoka Hitoshi Saito a wagye ‘Olympicgold medal’ mmienu no, awu wɔ berɛ a wadi mfeɛ 54.`
F2: `Japani a ɔbɔ judoka, Hitoshi Saito dii nkunim wɔ Olympic no mu nyaa sikakɔɔ mɛdaas abien awu na ɔdii mfe 54.`
---------------------- (306) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔaka sɛ mmoa bi a adidi n’abɔnwono ho ama no kokoram yareɛ na ɛkumm no.`
F2: `Wɔkyerɛ mu sɛ yare a ekumm no ne intrahepatic bile duct kokoram yare no.`
---------------------- (307) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔwuu wɔ Osaka Benada no.`
F2: `Owui Benada no wɔ Osaka.`
---------------------- (308) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwom sɛ na ɔyɛ ‘Olympic ne World champion’ deɛ, na Saito sane yɛ All Japan Judo Federation mu ekuo panin ansa na ɔrewu.`
F2: `Sɛ obi na ɔbɔ ne mmɔden wɔ Olympic ne waise nyinaa akansi mu no, na Saito na ɔyɛ obi Japan nyinaa mu no na ɔyɛ titena ɛma ahoboaboa kuo bere a ɔwui no.`
---------------------- (309) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa a wɔkɔɔ apontoɔ no ase bɛyɛ 100, wɔkɔɔ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ na wɔbɛka awarefoɔ yi ho ama wɔadi wɔn mfirinhyiada a ɛdikan wɔ wɔn ayeforɔ a wɔyɛɛ no afe a atwam no.`
F2: `Anyɛ biara nnipa bɛyɛ 100 na wɔkɔɔ aponto no sɛnea wɔne awarefo no a wɔwaree aferaasɛ no bɛdi wɔn afe edi kan no ho afahyɛ no abom.`
---------------------- (310) ----------------------
F1: `Mpanimfoɔ de too dwa sɛ, wɔahyɛ da ato hɔ a wɔde bɛdi afahyɛ foforɔ no.`
F2: `Mpaninfo no kaa sɛ wɔde nkaedi no a wɔbɛdi no ahyɛ bere foforo.`
---------------------- (311) ----------------------
F1: `Na awarefoɔ no ayɛ ayeforɔ afe baako nie wɔ Texas na wɔsane baa Bufalo sɛ wɔne wɔn mfɛfoɔ ne annuanom rebɛgye wɔn ani.`
F2: `Na awarefo yi aware wɔ Texas afe a etwaam no na wɔne wɔn nnamfo ne wɔn abusuafo aba Buffalo sɛ wɔrebɛgye wɔn ani.`
---------------------- (312) ----------------------
F1: `Ayefokunu a wadi mfeɛ 30 a wɔwoo no wɔ Bufalo no yɛ nnipa nan a wɔwuuiɛ no mu baako, nanso anyɛ ne yere no ya.`
F2: `Ne kunu a wadi mfe 30 no, wɔwoo no wɔ Buffalo, na ɔka nnipa nnan a wɔkumm wɔn wɔ etu toto no mu, nanso ne yere no ho anka.`
---------------------- (313) ----------------------
F1: `Karno yɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛni a ɔkyerɛ Borɔfo a wagye din nanso ɔha adwene na ɔkyerɛɛ adeɛ wɔ Modern English ne King’s Glory na ɔtaa ka sɛ berɛ a na ɔkyerɛ adeɛ no na ɔwɔ adesuafoɔ 9,000 a wɔakyerɛ wɔn adeɛ.`
F2: `Karno yɛ obi a wɔagye na obiara nim no nanso n’asɛm yɛ den a ɔkyerɛ Borɔfo na wakyerɛ ade wɔ Modern Education ne King's Glory ase na ɔka sɛ bere a na n’adwuma no gyina mu no na ɔwɔ asuafo 9,000.`
---------------------- (314) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ n’adekyerɛ nwoma mu no, na ɔde nsɛm bi di dwuma a awofoɔ binom ka sɛ ɛnni mu papa, na ɔtaa de nsɛm fin nso di dwuma.`
F2: `Ne twerɛto hɔ no mu ɔde nsɛmfua bi a awofo bu no sɛ ɛyɛ ahomaso kasa na ɔka sɛ ɔde kasafi di dwuma wɔ adesuadan mu ‘klass’.`
---------------------- (315) ----------------------
F1: `Nnɛɛmafoɔ adesua maa no daa adi pefee sɛ na ɔde nkaebɔ akɛseɛ bobɔ lɔɔre ho wɔ aberɛ a ɔnni so tumi na afei na ɔtwa ntorɔ nso sɛ ɔyɛ okunini wɔ borɔfo kasa kyerɛ mu.`
F2: `Modern Education abɔ ne sobo sɛ wɔde ade a wɔde rebɔ wo dawuro a waprente no akɛseakɛse afemfam bɔs no mu a wammisa ɛho kwan ansa na ɔreyɛ saa na ɔdii atoro sɛ ɔne Borɔfo kyerɛkyerɛni panin.`
---------------------- (316) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔadi kan abɔ no soboɔ sɛ ɔde wawia obi dwumadie, nanso wammɔ no ka.`
F2: `wɔabɔ no sobo bere bi a atwan sɛ wato copyright ho mmara pɛn nanso wɔamfa no annyina atemu ano.`
---------------------- (317) ----------------------
F1: `Obi a ɔwiee sukuu wɔ hɔ kaa sɛ, na ɔde Ingresifoɔ brɔfo na ɛkyerɛ adeɛ, na ɔkyerɛ mpenatweɛ ho nneɛma ma wɔktwerɛ gu wɔn nwoma mu, na wayɛ sɛ asukuufoɔ adamfo.`
F2: `Obi na ɔyɛ sukuuni kaa sɛ ‘ɔde slang na edi dwuma wɔ klass, na ɔkyerɛ kwan ɔkwan obi bɛfa so atwe mpena wɔ ho ade wɔ notes mu na ɔyɛ sukuufo ‘yɔnko’.`
---------------------- (318) ----------------------
F1: `Mfeɛ bɛyɛ ahaasa mu ni no, ɛwom sɛ wɔyɛ ɔman a wɔn ankasa di wɔ dwa deɛ, China atu mpɔn wɔ yie wɔ n’adwadie mu.`
F2: `Mfe aduasa atwam no, ɛmfa ho sɛ China akɔ so ayɛ communist man no, ne guadi akɔ ani.`
---------------------- (319) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔyɛɛ nsakraeɛ a ɛdi kan faa ɔman no adwadie ho berɛ a na Deng Xiaoping di wɔn so.`
F2: `Deng Xiaoping nniso ase na wɔyɛɛ sikasɛm mu nsakrae a edi kan.`
---------------------- (320) ----------------------
F1: `Firi saa mmerɛ no, Chinaman kɛseyɛ no anyini mpɛn 90.`
F2: `Ɛfiri saa bere no, China sikasɛ atu mpɔn mmɔho 90.`
---------------------- (321) ----------------------
F1: `Mpɛn a ɛdi kan no, afe atwam no, China tɔn kaa kɔɔ aman foforɔ so kyɛnn Germany na wɔsane bɛsanee Amɛrika man no ho sɛ dwadibea kɛseɛ a ɛwɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Aferaasɛɛ ne bere a edi kan de kaa kɔ amannɔne kyɛnn Germany na ɛpaa United States a ɔno na ɛyɛ saa ade yi kɛse paa no.`
---------------------- (322) ----------------------
F1: `Mfeɛ ahaanu akyiri no, China GDP bɛtumi aboro United States deɛ so.`
F2: `China's GDP bɛtumi ayɛ kɛse asene United states wɔ mfe adunu ntam.`
---------------------- (323) ----------------------
F1: `Tropical Storm Danielle, ahum a ɛtɔ so nan a wɔato no din wɔ 2010 Atlantic ‘hurricane season’ mu, asane asi bio wɔ eastern Atlantic Ocean mu.`
F2: `Mframa gyampaturudu a yɛfrɛ no Danelle na wɔbɔɔ din sɛ ɛtɔ so nnan wɔ afe 2010 Atlantic hurricane bere no, na abɛyɛ eastern Atlantic Ocean.`
---------------------- (324) ----------------------
F1: `Ahum no a ɛsii Miami, Florida bɛyɛ 3,000 miles no, atumi agyina mframa ano bɛyɛ 40 mph (64 kph).`
F2: `Mfram no a ɛyɛ bɛyɛ maale no 3,000 firi Miami,Florida wɔ mframa a ɛyɛ 40 mph (64 kph).`
---------------------- (325) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔhwɛ wiem nsakraeɛ wɔ National Hurricane Center susuu sɛ, ɛmpem nkɔ si Wukuada no na Danielle ano ayɛ den adane ahum kɛseɛ.`
F2: `Nyansahunufo a ɔwɔ Ɔman no Hurricane Asoe aka sɛ ennuru Wukada no na Danielle abɛyɛ hurricane .`
---------------------- (326) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnam sɛ ahum no nya nsiiɛ nti, ɛyɛ den sɛ yɛbɛhunu ne nsunsuansoɔ a ɛde bɛba Amɛrika man anaa Caribbean so.`
F2: `Ɛsiane sɛ mfram no mmɛn landfall nti, ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ yɛbɛhunu nsunsuanso a ɛbɛnya wɔ United States anaasɛ Caribbean so.`
---------------------- (327) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔwoo no wɔ Croatia ahenkuro, Zagreb, Bobek gyee din wɔ berɛ na ɔsi akan ma Partizan Belgrade.`
F2: `Wɔwoo Bobek wɔ Crotia ahenkuro Zagreb mu na ɔgyee din bere na ɔsi akan ma Partizan Belgrade no.`
---------------------- (328) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔkɔɔ bɔɔlobɔ kuo no mu wɔ afe 1945 mu na ɔtenaa hɔ kɔsii 1958.`
F2: `Ɔkɔ dɔmm wɔn 1945 na ɔtenaa kɔ sii 1958`
---------------------- (329) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ ne pɛn so wɔ bɔɔlobɔ kuo no mu, ɔtoo ntena 403 wɔ berɛ a na wasi akan 468.`
F2: `Bere na ɔka ku no ho no, ɔtoo atena 403 wɔ akan 468 a ɔsiiɛ no.`
---------------------- (330) ----------------------
F1: `Bɔɔlobɔni biara nni hɔ a wɔasi akan dodo anaa wato ntena dodo ama bɔɔlobɔ kuo no kyɛn Bobek.`
F2: `Obiara nni hɔ a wagyina mu anaasasɛ wato ntena ama ku no asene Bobek.`
---------------------- (331) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ afe 1995 mu, wɔyii no sɛ ɔyɛ bɔɔlobɔni a ɔsombo pa ara wɔ Partizan abakɔsɛm mu.`
F2: `1995 mu no wɔtoo aba maa no sɛ Partizan abakɔsɛm mu nyinaa no ɔno ne obi a ɔbɔ ne ho mmɔden paaa.`
---------------------- (332) ----------------------
F1: `Nwomtokuo a wɔagye din wɔ wiase nyinaa a yɛfrɛ wɔn Cirque du Soleil de dwumadiesoronko bi na ɛhyɛɛ apontoɔ no ase.`
F2: `Anigye no hyɛɛ ase firii Cirque du Soleil kuo a agye din wɔ wiase afanan nyinaa so.`
---------------------- (333) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔwieeɛ na Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra nso de wɔn deɛ toaa so, Janissary nwomtokuo, ne anwomtofoɔ Fatih Erkoç ne Müslüm Gürses nso ka ho.`
F2: `Deɛ edi so baa ɛno akyi ne Istanbul State Symphony sankɔbɔ a ɛyɛ Janissary band na anwontofo no ne Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses.`
---------------------- (334) ----------------------
F1: `Whirling Dervishes kuo no nso bɛtoaa so.`
F2: `Afei Whirling Dervishes baa prama no so.`
---------------------- (335) ----------------------
F1: `Turkey nwomtoni baa hoɔfɛfoɔ Sezen Aksu ne Italini sakubɔfoɔ Alessandro Safina ne Greek nwomtoni Haris Alexiou nso bɛtoo nwom.`
F2: `Turkeyni diva Sezen Aksu ne Itanin tenor Alessandro Safina ne Greek singer Haris Alexiou goro boom.`
---------------------- (336) ----------------------
F1: `Deɛ wɔde twaa toɔ ne sɛ Turkey asa kuo Fire of Anatolia nso bɛdii "Troy" yɛkyerɛ dwumadie no.`
F2: `Awiee no,Turkey asa ku Fire of Anatolia bɛdii agoru a ɛno ne “Troy”.`
---------------------- (337) ----------------------
F1: `Peter Lenz, aberanteɛ a wadi mfeɛ 13 a ɔde dadepɔnkɔ si akan, anya akwanhyia awu wɔ Indianapolis Motor Speedway.`
F2: `Peter Lenz, a wadi mfe 13 a ɔde motosakre si kan awu na esii bere ɔnyaa akwanhyia wɔ Indianapolis Motor Speedway no so no.`
---------------------- (338) ----------------------
F1: `Berɛ a na ɔrekentene ne ho wɔ kwan so no, Lenz hwee ase firi ne dadepɔnkɔ no so, na Xavier Zayat de dadepɔnkɔ twifaa ne so.`
F2: `Bere na ɔreyɛ warm-up lap no, Lenz firii ne bike no so hwee fam na Xavier Zayat ɔno nso yɛ ɔkansifo no nso bɛtwi faa ne so.`
---------------------- (339) ----------------------
F1: `Amonom hɔ ara na ayarehwɛfoɔ a wɔwɔ hɔ no bɛhwɛɛ no de no kɔɔ ayaresabea bi a ɛbɛn hɔ maa akyire yi ɔwuuiɛ.`
F2: `Ntɛmpa no ara na nnuruyɛfo a wɔwɔ hɔ hwɛɛ no na wɔde no kɔɔ ayaresabea a ɛwɔ mpatam hɔ na akyi na ɔwuiɛ.`
---------------------- (340) ----------------------
F1: `Zayat ampira wɔ akwanhyia no mu.`
F2: `Zayat ho anksa wɔ akwanhyia yi mu.`
---------------------- (341) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnam sikasɛm a ayɛ basaa wɔ waise afanaa nyinaa ho no, Zapatero toaa so kaa sɛ, "sikasɛm ka ɔman yieyɔ ho, ɛdi mu tintiman.`
F2: `Ɛdefa wiase nyinaa sikasɛm ho, Zapatero toaa so kaa sɛ “ sikasɛm ka ɛkɔnomi no ho, ɛyɛ biribi a ɛho hia paa.`
---------------------- (342) ----------------------
F1: `Yɛwɔ sikasɛm a atɔ ape afe ni, a ano aberɛ ase bosome kakra akyi, na mehunu no sɛ seisei deɛ dwadie sikasɛm no rema ne mu so."`
F2: `Yɛahyia sikasɛm mu ahokyere afe mu no nyinaa, na emu ayɛ den wɔ abosome abien a atwam ni no, na seesei yɛsusu sɛ sikasɛm no reyɛ yiye ba.”`
---------------------- (343) ----------------------
F1: `Nawɔtwe a ɛtwaam no, Naked News daa no adi sɛ wɔbɛpa abɛɛfo kasa ahodoɔ no bi aka ne kaseɛbɔ a wɔde to dwa ho, na wɔada kaseɛbɔ adwumakuo mmiɛnsa nso adi aka ho.`
F2: `Nnawɔtwe a etwaam no, Naked News de too gua sɛ wɔbɛma kasa a wɔka wɔ wiase afanan nyinaa no akɔ n’anim na ma kasebɔ a wɔde to gua no akɔ anim wɔ broadcaste abiɛsa so.`
---------------------- (344) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔma wɔn kaseɛbɔ wɔ Brɔfo ne Japanese mu, saa dwumakuo kɛseɛ yi redane nwumadie ahodoɔ a wɔbɛka Spanish, Italian ne Korefoɔ kasa wɔ so, na wɔayi no wɔ tɛlɛbihyin, abɛɛfo ntontan ne tetefon so.`
F2: `Wɔadi ma kasasebɔ no wɔ Borɔfo ne Japan mu, wiase nyinaa adwumaku yi reda dwumadie ahorow adi wɔ Spanish, Italian ne Korea kasa mu wɔ tɛlevishyin, wɛb ne mobaa afiri so.`
---------------------- (345) ----------------------
F1: `Me tiri yɛɛ yie biribiara anto me, nanso mehunu adeɛ a ɛyɛ hu pa ara wɔ m’ani so, wɔ berɛ a na nkurɔfoɔ rebɔ wɔn ho mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛpae nhwehwɛ afa mu apue.`
F2: `Me ti yɛɛ yiye biribiara anya ɛme, nanso ahodwiride ‘macabre scene’ , bere na nkorɔfo repre sɛ wɔbɛsɛe mpoma na wɔafiri adi.`
---------------------- (346) ----------------------
F1: `Na ebinom de nkonnwa rebobɔ mpoma no ano, nanso na mpoma no ntumi mmubu.`
F2: `Na nkorɔofo de akonnwa nkyɛnmu no,nanso na mpoma no ntumi mmu.`
---------------------- (347) ----------------------
F1: `"Mpoma no baako ho buuiɛ maa wɔhyɛɛ aseɛ sɛ wɔbɛfa mu apue," wei ne nsɛm a Franciszek Kowal a ɔnyaa ne tiri didiim kaeɛ.`
F2: `Franciszek Kowal a ɔnyaa ne ti dii mu kaa sɛ, “ Nkyɛmu no mu biako na awiee no koraa etumi bui, na wɔfii ase faa mpoma mu puepueei”.`
---------------------- (348) ----------------------
F1: `Nsroma ma yɛn kanea ne ɔhyew esiane ahoɔden a ɛda adi wɔ aberɛ a ‘hydrogen atoms’ adi afra (anaa ahyiam) redane ‘element’ a emu yɛ duru.`
F2: `Nsroma ɛma nkanea na esiane ɔhyew a ɛfiri hydrogen atom mu bere (aka abom) ayeyɛ nneɛma a emu yɛ duru.`
---------------------- (349) ----------------------
F1: `Abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɛfoɔ reyɛ adwumaden a ɛbɛboa ama wɔatumi ayɛ adeɛ a ɛno nso bɛtumi ama anyinam ahoɔden.`
F2: `Nyansahunufo reyɛ reactor a ɛbɛtumi amema energy saa kwan korɔ no arar so.`
---------------------- (350) ----------------------
F1: `Wei yɛ ɔhaw kɛseɛ a ne ko yɛ den pa ara na ɛbɛtumi adi mfeɛ bebree ansa na wɔatumi ayɛ deɛ ɛbɛdi dwuma yie.`
F2: `nanso wei yɛ biribi ayɛ den sɛ ɛbɛtumi asi ani na ɛbɛdi mfe pii na yɛhunu useful fusin reactors noa ayeyɛ.`
---------------------- (351) ----------------------
F1: `Dadeɛ a yɛakontono no nante nsuo ani esiane nsuo ani bɔberɛ nti.`
F2: `Pan a ɛyɛ steel no tɛ nsuo ani esiane surface tension nti.`
---------------------- (352) ----------------------
F1: `Nsuo ani bɔberɛ no yɛ adwuma firisɛ, ‘molecules’ a ɛwɔ nsuo no ani no ka bom deɛ emu yɛ den sene mframa ‘molecules’ no a ɛwɔ nsuo no so no.`
F2: `Surface tension esiane sɛ nsuo no molecues a ɛwɔ nsuo no ase no ne wɔn ho hyia paa sene sɛnea ɛne mframa molecules a ɛwɔ soro sene wɔn no.`
---------------------- (353) ----------------------
F1: `Nsuo ‘molecules’ no yɛ honam ani adeɛ a ɛwɔ nsuo ani, na ɛma kwan ma nneɛma bi te sɛ nnadeɛ tumi nante nsuo ani.`
F2: `Nsuo no molecules no yɛ nvisible skin wɔ nsu no ano na ɛma nneɛma te sɛ paneɛ tɛ nsu no ani.`
---------------------- (354) ----------------------
F1: `Dadebena a ɛda ‘skate’ a wɔtwi no sukɔkyea soɔ no wɔ afaafa mmienu a emu ayɛ donko. Afaa mmienu no boa ma ɛtumi kyere asukɔkyea no, wɔ berɛ akyea mu.`
F2: `Blade a ɛwɔ nnɛ mmerɛ yi mu ice skate so no wɔ ano abien na ɛwɔ concave hollow ne ntam. Ano abien yi ma kwan ma grasp of ice no tumi kɔ mu, sɛ mpo etumi keka no ho ‘ayɛ tilted’ a.`
---------------------- (355) ----------------------
F1: `Esiane sɛ dadebena no ase akoa nti, sɛ dadeɛ no kyea kɔ afa ne afa a, n’afa a ɛne asukɔkyea no nya nkutaho no so kyea.`
F2: `Esiane sɛ blade no ase no akyea kakra no nti, bere a blade no kɔ ɔfa baako anaa foforɔ no, baabi a ɛne ice no adi ahyia no nso kyea.`
---------------------- (356) ----------------------
F1: `Wei na ɛboa ne ɔretwi no ma no twa ne ho. Sɛ ‘skate’ no kyea kɔ nifa a, deɛ ɔretwie no nso kɔ nifa, sɛ ɛkɔ benkum nso a, deɛ ɔretwie no nso kɔ benkum.`
F2: `Wei ma skater no dane ne ho. Sɛ skates no kyea kɔ nifa a, skater no dane kɔ nifa, na sɛ skates no kyea kɔ benkum a, skater no dane kɔ benkum.`
---------------------- (357) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ ɛbɛtumi asane anya ahoɔden dada a na ɛwɔ no a, gye sɛ wɔgyae ahoɔden a watwe afiri kanea mu no.`
F2: `Sɛ ɛbsane akɔ energyɛ lɛɛvo dada no a, ɛsɛ eyi energy a ɛka ho a wɔnya firii kanea no mu no.`
---------------------- (358) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔyɛ saa wɔ berɛ wɔreyiyi nkanea nketenkete bi adi a wɔfrɛ no "photon".`
F2: `Wɔyɛ wei bere a eyi nneɛma nketewa bi a yɛfrɛ no “photon” no.`
---------------------- (359) ----------------------
F1: `Abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɛfoɔ frɛɛ dwumadie yi "stimulated emission of radiation" ɛfiri sɛ ‘atoms’ no nya ahoɔden firi nkanea a ɛhyerɛn mu, na ama ‘photon of light’ nso apue, ɛna kanea nso yɛ ‘radiation’ no fa bi.`
F2: `Nyansahunufo frɛ saa kwan yi "stimulated emission of radiation" ɛfiri sɛ atoms no kanea a ahyerɛn no na ɛstimulati no, na ɛkɔ photon of light emission no ba, na kane ano yɛ radion ku no bi.`
---------------------- (360) ----------------------
F1: `Mfonii a ɛtoa so no kyerɛ sɛnea ‘atoms’ da ‘photons’ adi. Ampa, nokorɛ mu no ‘photons’ susua sene nea ɛwɔ mfonii yi mu.`
F2: `Mfoni a edi so no kyerɛ atoms aemitting photons. Ɛyɛ nokware sɛ photons susua sene deɛ ɛwowɔ mfoni yi mu no.`
---------------------- (361) ----------------------
F1: `‘photons’ mpo susua sene nneɛma ɛka bom bɛdane ‘atoms’ mpo.`
F2: `Photons no sua sene nneɛma ɛbɛyɛ atoms no!`
---------------------- (362) ----------------------
F1: `Nnɔnhwere ɔha akyi a wɔyɛɛ ho adwuma no, ahoma tea a ɛhyɛ kanea no mu no hyeeɛ na kanea no antumi anyɛ adwuma bio.`
F2: `Filamenta a ɛwɔ bulb no mu hyeeɛ na kanea bulb no antumi anyɛ adwuma bio wɔ nnɔnhwere pii a wɔde yɛɛ adwuma bebree no akyi.`
---------------------- (363) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛba saa a na ɛhia sɛ yɛsesa kanea no. Ɛwɔ sɛ yɛyɛahwɛyie yɔ berɛ a yɛresesa kanea.`
F2: `Kanea bulb no hia nsesa. Ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ ahweyiye bere a woresesa kanea bulb no.`
---------------------- (364) ----------------------
F1: `Deɛ ɛi kan, ɛwɔ sɛ yɛdum adeɛ a yɛde sɔ kanea no anaa yɛtwe anyinam kanea n’ahoma no firim.`
F2: `Deɛ edi kan, baabi a wɔde dum no sane de sɔ no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɛda baabi adum anaasɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔtwa nhama no mu.`
---------------------- (365) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛnti ne sɛ, anyinam ahoɔden a ɛnam bea a yɛde sɔ kanea no a ɛyɛ dadeɛ a ɛwɔ kanea no ho no bɛtumi ama ogya afa yɛn mu wɔ berɛ a yɛn nsa akɔka saa dadeɛ no, anaa sɛ yɛn nsa akɔka dadeɛ no wɔ berɛ ɛho kakra aka bea a yɛde hyɛ mu no.`
F2: `Deɛ nti a ɛte saa ne sɛ anyinam ahoɔden wɔ sɔkɛt no mu baabi ɛyɛ dade no a bulb no wɔ no na ɛbɛtumi ahyɔɔko wo sɛ wo nsa kɔ wura sɔkɛte no mu anaasɛ dade no ase wɔ bulb no mu bere a kakra ɛhyɛ sɔkɛte no mu no.`
---------------------- (366) ----------------------
F1: `Akwaa no mu deԑ ԑhia pa ara ‘aforo sane die wɔ nnipadua’ no mu ne akoma, ԑno na ԑpu mogya gu nnipadua no mu.`
F2: `Akwaa titire a ɛwɔ circuatory sistɛm mu ne akoma no, a ɛno ɛpɔpe mmogya no.`
---------------------- (367) ----------------------
F1: `Mogya firi akoma no mu fa dorobԑn bi a yԑfrԑ no ‘arteries’ mu kɔ na asane afa dorobԑn a yԑfrԑ no ‘veins’ mu aba akoma no mu. Dorobԑn nketewa pa ara no din de ‘capillaries’.`
F2: `Mogya nofiri akoma no mu pue wɔ nnubɛn bi a yɛfrɛ no arteries na ɛsane nam nnurubɛn bi a yɛfrɛ no veins mu sane ba akoma no mu. Nnurubɛn a esusua paa no de capillaries.`
---------------------- (368) ----------------------
F1: `‘Triceratop’ se ntumi nwe nwura nko ara na mmom ԑtumi we dua mman ne nhini a ԑyԑ den pa ara.`
F2: `Triceratops se bɛtumi abɔ ade mu na ɛnyɛ nhaban nko mpo mman a ne nhini a emu yɛ den mpo.`
---------------------- (369) ----------------------
F1: `Abɔdeԑ mu nyansapԑfoɔ bi dwene sԑ ‘Triceratops’ di ‘cycads’, a ԑyԑ dua bi a na ԑnyԑ nna wɔ Cretaceous.`
F2: `Abɔdeԑmunyasapԑ binom dwene Triceratops adi cycads, a ɛno ne afifide ɛnyɛ na koraa wɔ Cretaceous.`
---------------------- (370) ----------------------
F1: `Saa dua yi te sԑ abԑ dua ԑnna ԑwɔ nhaban a ano no yԑ feafea.`
F2: `Saa afifide yi sɛ abɛdua ketewa a ɛwɔ ahenkyɛw, na ahaban no yɛ nkasɛɛnkasɛɛ.`
---------------------- (371) ----------------------
F1: `Nka ‘Triceratops’ bԑtumi de n’ano denden no ayi ahaban no ansa na awe dua no ankasa.`
F2: `Anka Triceratops betumi de n’ano a ɛyɛ den no ate nhaban no ansa na wawe dua no.`
---------------------- (372) ----------------------
F1: `Abɔdeԑ mu nyansapԑfoɔ no bi nso se saa dua yi wɔ awuduro ԑno nti ԑnyԑ adeԑ a ‘dinosaur’ biara di, ԑwom sԑ seisei ‘sloth’ ԑne mmoa bi te sԑ ako (a wɔfiri dinosaurs no ase) no tumi di nhaban anaa nnuaba a awuduro wom.`
F2: `Abɔdeԑmunyasapԑ nkae ka sɛ saa afifide yɛ awurudu na ɛntumi mma sɛ dinosaur diiɛ, ɛwom sɛ nnɛ sloth ne mmoa afofor te sɛ ako (a wɔyɛ dinosaurs asefo) tumi we nhaban no anaasɛ aba no.`
---------------------- (373) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛbԑyԑ dԑn na ahoɔden a ԑwɔ Io atumi atwe me? Sԑ wogyina Io ani a, wo mu duru a wowɔ no Asase so no so te.`
F2: `Lo gravity bɛtwe me kwan bɛn so? Sɛ wogyina lo no so a, wommu duru no ɛnyɛ te sɛ deɛ na ɛte wɔ Asase so.`
---------------------- (374) ----------------------
F1: `Obi a ne mu duru yԑ 200 pounds (90kg) wɔ Asase so no mu duru wɔ Io no bԑyԑ 36 pounds (16kg). Ɛno nti ahoɔden no bԑtwe wo kakra.`
F2: `Nnipa ne mu duru yɛ 200 pounds (90kg) wɔ Asase so no mu duru bɛyɛ 36 pounds (16kg) wɔ lo so. Gravity no ntwee wo pii.`
---------------------- (375) ----------------------
F1: `Awia no nni ‘crust’ a wobԑtumi agyina so te sԑ Asase deԑ no. Awia no nyinaa yԑ ‘egyaframa’, egya, ne ‘plasma’.`
F2: `Awia nni crust te sɛ Asase no so a wobɛtumi agyina so. Awia no yɛ gyaframa, gya ne plasma.`
---------------------- (376) ----------------------
F1: `Mmerԑ dodoɔ a woretwe wo ho firi awia no ho no na ‘egyaframa’ no mu reyԑ ha.`
F2: `Gyaframa no bɛyɛ hahaaha bere a wofi Awia no mfimfin kɔ akyikyi.`
---------------------- (377) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ yԑhwԑ awia no a, akyire no a yԑhunu no de ‘photosphere’, a ԑkyerԑ sԑ, "kanea kurukuruwa".`
F2: `Deɛ a ɛwɔ abɔntene a yɛhunu sɛ wohwɛ Awia yɛfrɛ no fotosphere, a ԑkyerԑ "Kanea Bɔɔl".`
---------------------- (378) ----------------------
F1: `Mfeԑ mpem mmiԑnsa akyi no, afe 1610 mu no, ‘Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei’ de ‘telescope’ hunuu sԑ, Venus wɔ nkyekyԑmu bi te sԑ deԑ bosome wɔ no.`
F2: `Mfe mpem abiɛsa akyi no, wɔ 1610, Italini a ɔhwɛ nsoroma Galileo Galilei de telescope di dwuma hunu sɛ Venus wɔ afaafa sɛnea ɔsram te no.`
---------------------- (379) ----------------------
F1: `Saa nkyekyԑmu yi ba ԑfiri sԑ Venus (anaa Bosome) no fa a ԑkyerԑ Awia no nko ara na ԑnya kanea. Venus nkyekyԑmu yi kaa bi too ‘Copernicus adwenkyerԑ’ so sԑ ‘planets’ no twa Awia ho hyia.`
F2: `Afaafa no kɔ so wɔ Venus no fa nko ara (anaasɛ wɔ Ɔsram no) a ɛhwɛ Awia no sɔ. Venus no afaafa no foa tiɔri ɛne Copernicus a okyinsrom ano de twa Awia no ho.`
---------------------- (380) ----------------------
F1: `Mfeԑ kakra bi akyire 1639 no, ‘English astronomer a ɔde Jeremiah Horrocks’ hunuu sԑ Venus firi baabi kɔ baabi.`
F2: `Afei, wɔ mfe bi akyi wɔ 1639, nsromamuhwɛni bi a ɔyɛ Englishni a yɛfrɛ no Jeremiah Horrocks hwɛɛ Venus transit no.`
---------------------- (381) ----------------------
F1: `Na England san dii Danelaw so nkonim no, onyaa asomdwoe pii bere tenten.`
F2: `Na England atena hɔ asomdwoe mu bere tenten fiti bere a ɔdii Danelaw so nkonim no.`
---------------------- (382) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, wɔ afe 991 mu no Ethelred hyiaa Viking a na ne dɔm no dɔɔso paa kyɛn dɔm biara no, efiri Guthrum deɛ no so, bɛyɛ mfe apem a na aba kɔ no.`
F2: `Nanso wɔ 991 Ethelred hyiaa Viking dɔm a na wɔdɔɔ so kyɛn biara fiti Guthrum mfeha na edi kan no a.`
---------------------- (383) ----------------------
F1: `Nea na odi saa dɔm no anim ne Olaf Trygvasson, Norwayni a na ne botae ne sɛ ɔbɛgye ne man afiri Danefo no nnisoɔ ase.`
F2: `Olaf Trygvasson na ɔdii dɔm yi anim, na ɔyɛ Norweni a na wawe ahinam so sɛ ɔbɛgye ne man a Danishfoɔ agye abɔ so no afiri wɔn nsam.`
---------------------- (384) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ asraafo no nkuguo a edi kan no akyi no, Ethelred tumi ne Olaf yɛɛ nhehyɛe, na ɔsan kɔɔ Norway kɔbɔɔ mmɔden sɛ ne nsa bɛka n'ahinni no. Ɛyɛɛ te sɛ nkunim ne nkuguo a adi afrafra.`
F2: `Bere a edi kan a asrafo no nneɛma yɛɛ bisi basa no, Ethelred bɛtee Olaf ase, na ɔsan kɔɔ Norway sɛ ɔbɛkɔ akɔ hwɛ sɛ ɔbɛtumi akɔkyekyere n’aheman na nkonimdi pii afi mu aba.`
---------------------- (385) ----------------------
F1: `Hangeul nko ara ne atwerԑdeԑ a wɔde baeԑ a wɔde di dwuma da biara. Saa atwerԑdeԑ yi bae wɔafe 1444 mu Ɔhene Sejong ahennie berԑ so (1418 – 1450).`
F2: `Hangeul nko ara ne atwerɛde a wɔahyɛda ayɛ a wɔde di dwuma daa. Wɔyɛɛ atwerɛde no1444 wɔ Ɔhene Sejong aheni mu (1418 - 1450).`
---------------------- (386) ----------------------
F1: `Na Ɔhene Sejong yԑ ɔhene a ɔtɔ so nnan wɔ Joseon Dynasty no mu ԑnna ɔyԑ obi a wɔbu no pa ara.`
F2: `Na Ɔhene Sejong ne ɔhen a ɔtɔ so wɔ Joseon Dynasty na ɔyɛ obi na wɔbu no paa.`
---------------------- (387) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔdii kan too Hangeul atwerԑdeԑ no din Hunmin Jeongeum, a ԑkyerԑ sԑ "nnyegyeeԑ pa no a yԑde tenetene ɔmanfoɔ no".`
F2: `Mfiase no ɔtoo Hangeul atwerɛde no din Hunmin Jeongeum a ɛkyerɛ, nnyegyee a ɛyɛ a wɔde ma nnipa akwankyerɛ”.`
---------------------- (388) ----------------------
F1: `Adwenkyerԑ bebree wɔ hɔ fa kwan a Sanskrit faa so baeԑ ho. Wɔn mu baako fa ‘Aryan akwantuo’ a wɔde firi atɔeԑ wuraa India mu a na wɔde wɔn kasa nam ho.`
F2: `Tiɔre ahorow bebree wɔ hɔ ɛka sɛnea ɛyɛe a Sanskrit baae. Ɛmu biako ɛfa Aryan tu a wɔtu firii atɔe baa India na wɔreba no na wɔde kasa no baaeɛ.`
---------------------- (389) ----------------------
F1: `Sanskrit yԑ tete kasa na yԑbԑtumi de atoto Latin kasa a wɔka no wɔ Europe no ho.`
F2: `Sanskirt yɛ tete kasa na wɔde toto Latin kasa a wɔka no wɔ Europe no ho.`
---------------------- (390) ----------------------
F1: `Tete nwoma a na ԑwɔ wiase no nyinaa na wɔatwerԑ no Sanskrit kasa mu. Wɔkekaa ‘Upanishads’ sii ani wieeԑ no, Sanskrit yerae ԑnam tumi nnidisoɔ nti.`
F2: `Nwoma a akyɛ wɔ waise paa a wnim no wɔ twerɛɛ Sanskirt. Bere a wɔboaboaa Upanishads, Sanskrit twaam esiane hierarchy nti.`
---------------------- (391) ----------------------
F1: `Sanskrit yԑ kasa a ԑyԑ den na ԑyԑ dԑ a ԑno ne India kasa bebree farebae, sԑdeԑ Latin nso yԑ Europe kasa bi te sԑ French ne Spanish farebae no.`
F2: `Sanskirt yɛ den paa na ɛyɛ kasa a ɛyɛ kama, a ɛno ne mprenpren Indian kasa ahorow no fibea, sɛnea latin yɛ Europe kasa fibea te sɛ French ne Spanish.`
---------------------- (392) ----------------------
F1: `Berԑ a wɔne France ntɔkwa no baa awieeԑ no, Germany yԑԑ ahoboa sԑ wɔbԑto ahyԑ Britain so.`
F2: `Berea france ako no baa awiee no, Germany yɛɛ ahoboa sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Britain island no so.`
---------------------- (393) ----------------------
F1: `Germany too saa ɔsa yi din “Operation Sealion”. Britain asogyafoɔ no akodeԑ bebree yerae berԑ a wɔtu firii Dunkirk no nti na wɔayԑ mmrԑ.`
F2: `Germany frɛɛ ntohyɛso no “ “Operation Sealion”. Britain Asraafo no akode akɛse akɛse ne supplies dodow no ara na ayerayera bere a wɔtu fii Dunkirk, enti na asraafo no no ayɛ mmerɛ.`
---------------------- (394) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso na Roya Navy no da so wɔ ahoɔden sene German Navy no (“Kriegsmarine”) a sԑ obiara bԑto hyԑԑ English Channel no so a, anka wɔbԑdi ne so nkonim.`
F2: `Nanso na Royal Navy no ho yɛ den sene German navy no (“Kriegsmarine”) na anka wɔbɛtumi asɛe invasion fleet a akɔ Borɔfo Channel no.`
---------------------- (395) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso na Roya Navy no suhyԑn no kakra bi na na ԑwɔ baabi a atamfo no bԑfa aba ԑfiri sԑ na akannifoɔ no suro sԑ German de akodeԑ firi soro bԑha wɔn.`
F2: `Nanso Royal navy hyɛmma no mu kakraa bi pɛ na ɛbɛn invasion routes no esiane sɛ na wɔn a wɔpɛ no suro sɛ Germanfo bɛtu ade afa wim aba wɔn so.`
---------------------- (396) ----------------------
F1: `Ma yԑnhyԑ aseԑ mfiri Italy nhyehyԑeԑ no nkyerԑmu no ho. Na Italy yԑ Germany ne Japan "nuabarima ketewa".`
F2: `Ma yɛmfa adwene a Italy nni kan. Na Italy yɛ Germany ne Japan “nua kumaaa”.`
---------------------- (397) ----------------------
F1: `Na wɔn asogyafoɔ ne navy no nni ahoɔden, ԑwom sԑ na wɔayԑ suhyԑn mono nnan ansa naɔ ko no rehyԑ aseԑ.`
F2: `Na wɔn army ne wɔn navy no nni hoɔden, ɛwom sɛ wɔayɛ hyɛmma afoforo nnan ansa na ako no rebɛfi ase.`
---------------------- (398) ----------------------
F1: `Na deԑ Italy repԑ nyinaa ne Afrika aman. Sԑ wɔbԑtumi anya saa aman yi a, na wɔhia sԑ wɔnya akofoɔ a wɔbԑfa ԑpo no so saa de abԑwura Afrika.`
F2: `Italy boate titire paa ne Afrika aman. Sɛ wɔbnya saa aman yi, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔnya asraafo naunching paade, asraafo yi bɛfa Mediterranean po na wɔkɔpue Afrika.`
---------------------- (399) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛno nti, na ԑsԑ sԑ wɔyi baabi a Britain wɔ ne wɔn suhyԑn a ԑwɔ Egypt no nyinaa firi hɔ. Sԑ wɔyi saa adeԑ yi to nkyԑn a, na ԑnni sԑ Italy akofoɔ no yԑ biribi foforɔ biara.`
F2: `Wɔbɛtumi ayɛ saa gye sɛ wɔyi Britain atenae ne hyɛm no firi Egypt. Saa adeyɛ yi da nkɛyɛn a, Italy hyɛn a wɔde di ako no na ɛnsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ biribi foforo biara.`
---------------------- (400) ----------------------
F1: `Afei Japan. Na asuo atwa Japan ho ahyia te sԑ Britain.`
F2: `Afei Japan. Na Japan yɛ islanf man, te sɛ Britain.`
---------------------- (401) ----------------------
F1: `‘Submarines’ yԑ suhyԑn a wɔayԑ sԑ ԑmfa asuo ase, na ԑnwɔ hɔ berԑ bi mu.`
F2: `Submarines yɛ hyɛm a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ sɛ entu kwan wɔ nsu ase na ɛkɔ so tena bere tenten bi mu.`
---------------------- (402) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde ‘Submarines’ dii dwuma wɔ Wiase Ntɔkwa kɛseɛ I ԑne Wiase Ntɔkwa kɛseɛ II’ no mu. Saa berԑ no na ԑyԑ nyaa ԑnna ԑsane nso wɔ baabi pɔtee a ԑtumi to tuo kɔduru.`
F2: `Wɔde Submarines dii dwuma Wiase Ko I ne Wiase Ko II no mu. Saa bere na ɛkɔ nyaa na wowom na woto tuo a na ɛntumi nkɔ akyiri.`
---------------------- (403) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔko no ahyԑaseԑ no na wɔtaa fa asuo no ani, nanso berԑ rekɔ n’anim no ‘submarines’ no kɔɔ asuo no ase sԑdeԑ ԑbԑyԑ a wɔnhu wɔn.`
F2: `Ako no mfiase no na na ɛtaa tɛ nsu no ani, na bere a bere radar fii ase bae no ɛbɔɔ adwuma pɛpɛɛpɛ na eyi hyɛɛ submarine s no maa ɛkɔɔ nsu no ase tonn na obiara ahunu no.`
---------------------- (404) ----------------------
F1: `Na wɔfrԑ German ‘submarines’ no U-Boats. Na Germanfoɔ no ayԑ adeԑ wɔ kwan a wɔfa so de ‘submarines’ di dwuma no ho.`
F2: `Na wɔfrɛ Gemany submarines no U-Boats. Na Germanfo no bɔ wɔn ho mmɔden wɔ sɛ navigeeti ne dwumadi mu.`
---------------------- (405) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnam kwan a na wɔfa so de ‘submarines’ no di dwuma yie no nti, ɔko no akyi no wɔannye Germanfoɔ no anni sԑ wɔwɔ bebree.`
F2: `Esiane wɔn nkunimdi wɔ submarines ho nti, akodi no akyi wɔnnye Germanfo sɛ wɔnni bebree.`
---------------------- (406) ----------------------
F1: `Aane! Ɔhene Tutankhamun, a ԑtɔ da a wɔtumi frԑ no "King Tut" anaa "The Boy King", yԑ tete Egypt ahemfo no mu baako a wɔnim no berԑ yi mu.`
F2: `Aane! Ɔhene Tutankhamun, ɛtɔ da wɔfrɛ no “ɔhene Tut" anaasɛ "The Boy King", yɛ tete Egypt ahene a wɔnim wɔ nnɛ mmere yi mu.`
---------------------- (407) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑyԑ nwanwa ne sԑ na wɔnhu no sԑ ne ho hia tete mmerԑ no mu nti wɔantwerԑ ne ho asԑm tete ahemfo nwoma bebree mu.`
F2: `Deɛ ɛyɛ dɛ no, na wɔmmu no nɛ ne hia paa tete no na wɔnka tete ahene dodow a wɔayɛ wɔn din ho twerɛtohɔ no.`
---------------------- (408) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso berԑ a wɔhuu ne nna afe 1922 mu no ԑmaa nnipa huu no yie. Akorɔmfoɔ wiaa nna bebree mu adeԑ nanso ne deԑ no nko ara deԑ, wɔamfa wɔn nsa anka.`
F2: `Ne nna wɔhuu wɔ 1922 maa wɔbɛyɛɛ obi a wagye din. Bere na wɔabuebue tete nna dodow no ara so awia mu nneɛma no, saa nna yi na obiara nkaa no.`
---------------------- (409) ----------------------
F1: `Na nneԑma a wɔde siee Tutankhamun no bebree a wɔhɔ a ԑnyԑԑ hwee, a nneԑma a wɔde sika kɔkɔɔ ne aboɔ a ԑho hia ayԑ mpempem ka ho.`
F2: `Nneɛma dodo no a wɔde siee Tutankhamun no wɔakora so yiye, a artefacts mpempem a wɔde nnade ayeyɛ ne abɔ ɛho yɛ na.`
---------------------- (410) ----------------------
F1: `‘Spoke wheels’ a Assyriafoɔ no yԑeԑ no maa wɔn apɔnkɔ no mu yԑԑ ha sane ho yԑԑ hare a na wɔbԑtumi asane asogyafoɔ ne apɔnkɔfoforɔ ho.`
F2: `Wheels a ɛyɛ dede a ɛbaae no ama Assyrian apɔnkɔ mu ayɛ ha,ɛkɔ ntɛm na wɔasiesie no etumi san asraafo ho ne apɔnkɔ nkae ho.`
---------------------- (411) ----------------------
F1: `Na wɔn pea no tumi wura asogyafoɔ a wɔne wɔn reko no akokyԑm no mu. Bԑyԑ 1000 B.C., Assyriafoɔ de ‘cavalry’ a ԑdi kan no baeԑ.`
F2: `Wɔn peaw a efiri wɔn crossbows mu no tumi wura kyɛm a ɛhyɛ asraafo a wɔyɛ atamfo no mu. Bɛyɛ 1000 B.C mu na Assyrianfo kɔfaa cavalry a edi kan baae.`
---------------------- (412) ----------------------
F1: `‘Cavalry’ yԑ asogyafoɔ a wɔtena apɔnkɔ akyi di ako. Saa berԑ no na wɔnyԑԑ ‘deԑ wɔde gu pɔnkɔ akyi’ no nti na wɔtena apɔnkɔ no akyi saa ara na wɔdi ako no.`
F2: `Cavlry yɛ ɔsraani a ɔtena pɔnkɔ so di ako. na wɔnnya nyɛɛ no, enti Assyrianfo cavalry tenaa wɔn apɔnkɔ so kɛkɛ na wɔkooe.`
---------------------- (413) ----------------------
F1: `Yԑnim Greek amanyɔfoɔ, abɔdeԑ mu paadehunufoɔ, mfoninyԑfoɔ bebree. Ebia wɔn mu deԑ yԑnim no pa ara ne Homer, onifrani a na ɔka anwonsԑm no a ɔyԑԑ Greek kasadwini mmienu: ‘the poems Iliad ԑne Odyssey’ no.`
F2: `Yɛnim Greek amannyɔfo,nyansahufo ne adwiniyɛfo pii. Deɛ wagye din pa wɔ amammere wei mu ne Homer, a na ɔyɛ anwonsɛmkafo a n’ani afiri no a ɔyɛɛ Greekfo kasadwini abien: anwonsɛm Iliad neOdyssey.`
---------------------- (414) ----------------------
F1: `‘Sophocles ԑne Aristophanes’ yԑ wɔn a wɔtwerԑ ahwԑgorɔ nwoma a wɔwɔ din pa ara na wɔn ahwԑgorɔ ka wiase kasadwini a ԑdi mu pa ara no ho bi.`
F2: `Sophocles ne Aristophanes yɛ playwrights a ɛda so ara agye din na wɔbu wɔn nnwuma no sɛ wiase nyinaa kasadwini mu no ɛka deɛ ɛyɛ papa paa no ho.`
---------------------- (415) ----------------------
F1: `Greekni a wagye din bio yԑ ‘mathematician Pythagoras’, a dodoɔ no ara nim no sԑ ɔde ayɔnkofa a ԑda ‘triangle’ afaafa no ntam no baeԑ no.`
F2: `Greekni foforo a wagye yiye ne nkotabufo Pythagoras, a deɛ obiara de nim ne theorem a agye din a ɛfa relations a ɛfa right triangles afa ahorow ho no.`
---------------------- (416) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa dodoɔ a wɔka Hindi no sesa. Wɔkyerԑ sԑ ԑyԑ ԑfiri mmienu kɔsi nnan mu kasa a nnipa dodoɔ ka pa ara wɔ wiase.`
F2: `Akonta a wɔbu fa wɔn a wɔka Hinda kasa no ho gu ahorw. Wɔbu akonata ɛno ne kasa a ɛtɔ so abien anaa nnan wɔka wɔ wiase paa.`
---------------------- (417) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa dodoɔ a wɔfiri kuro no mu ka kasa no sesa a ne nnyinasoɔ no yԑ nkorabata a wɔkan no.`
F2: `Wɔn a ɛyɛ wɔ kurom kasa dodow no gu ahorow na egyina kasa no nkorabata a wɔka no so anaasɛ wɔkan kasa no nkorabata a ɛbenbɛn no.`
---------------------- (418) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa dodoɔ a wɔde wɔn ani bu sԑ wɔka kasa no yԑ bԑyԑ ɔpepem 340 kɔsi ɔpepem 500, ԑnna wɔn a wɔte no yԑ ɔpepem 800.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔka no akonatbu kyerɛ sɛ wɔn dodow bɛyɛ ɔpepem 340 kɔsi ɔpepem 500 na dodow bɛyɛ ɔpepem 800 na wɔte kasa yi.`
---------------------- (419) ----------------------
F1: `Hindi ԑne Urdu sԑ wɔn sԑmfua a ԑde di dwuma mu nanso atwerԑ mu deԑ, ԑsesa; nnipa a wɔka kasa no mmienu bԑtumi ate wɔn ho ase wɔ daadaa nkɔmmɔdie mu.`
F2: `Nsɛmfua a ɛwɔ Hundi ne Urdu mu no sesɛ nanso wɔn atwerɛ nyɛ pɛ, daadaa nkɔmmɔbɔ mu no nnipa a wɔka kasa yi tumi te wɔn mu biara kasa a wɔreka no ase.`
---------------------- (420) ----------------------
F1: `Mfeɛ ɔha a ɛtɔ so 15th mu hɔ no, na ‘Estonia Atifi fam’ hyԑ Germany amanneԑ ase.`
F2: `Bɛyɛ afeha ɛtɔ so 15 no, na Estonia atifihyɛ Germany amammere ase.`
---------------------- (421) ----------------------
F1: `Na Germanfoɔ bi pԑ sԑ wɔka Onyankopɔn ho asԑm kyerԑ nnipa no, ԑno nti wɔyԑԑ ‘Estonian literal language’ no.`
F2: `Na German monks pɛsɛ wɔtwe nnipa no bɛn Onyankopɔn,eno nti wɔka faa Estonian literal kasa no baae.`
---------------------- (422) ----------------------
F1: `Na ne nnyinasoɔ yԑ German atwerԑdeԑ no ԑnna wɔde atwerԑdeԑ baako yi "Õ/õ" kaa ho.`
F2: `Na egyina German akyerɛwde no so na wɔde akyerɛwde biako "Õ/õ" kaa ho.`
---------------------- (423) ----------------------
F1: `Mmerԑ bi akyi no nsԑmfua bebree a wɔfԑm firii German kasa mu bԑnyaa nteaseԑ. Wei ne anibue ahyԑaseԑ.`
F2: `Bere kɔɔ so no, wɔfɛmm nsɛmfua dodo no ara firii German mu bɛka boom. Wei ne nkɔanim no mfiase.`
---------------------- (424) ----------------------
F1: `Amammerԑ kwan so no, deԑ ɔbԑdi adeԑ no wura sogya mu berԑ a wawie sukuu no.`
F2: `Amammrε kwan so no, nea adedi rebɛduru ne so no sɛ ɔwie sukuu ara pɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ ɔkɔ sraadi.`
---------------------- (425) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, Charles kɔɔ suapɔn wɔTrinity College, Cambridge ԑhɔ na ɔsuaa ‘Anthropology ԑne Archaeology’, ԑne ‘History’ akyire yi, a ɔnyaa 2:2 (suapɔn abodin a yɛfrɛ no).`
F2: `Nanso Charles kɔɔ suapɔn wɔ Rinity Kɔlegyi, Cambridge na ɛhɔ na ɔsuaa Anthropology ne Archaeology na akyi abakɔsɛm na wɔnyaa 2:2 ( (a ɛyɛ sekɛnd klass lowa digirii).`
---------------------- (426) ----------------------

F2: `Charles ne obi a ɔwɔ Britain Adehye Abusua no a wɔmaa no digirii abodin.`
---------------------- (427) ----------------------
F1: `'European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) yԑ ɔman no mu 3%.`
F2: `European Turkey ( Thrace apue anaasɛ Rumelia wɔ Balkan peninsula no) ɛka ɔman no ho 3% .`
---------------------- (428) ----------------------
F1: `Turkey ano bԑboro 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) wɔ ne tenten mu ԑne 800 km (500 mi) wɔ ne tԑtrԑtԑ mu, akɔyԑ ‘rectangular shape’.`
F2: `Turkey no nsaase no tenten boro kilomita 1,600 (1,000 mi) ne trɛ yɛ 800 km(500 mi), na ayɛ ne ho ahinanan hyeepu.`
---------------------- (429) ----------------------
F1: `Turkey beaeԑ no wɔ weinom ka ho ‘lakes, ԑfa 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), a emu 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) wɔ Asia anaafoɔ atɔeԑ ԑnna 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) wɔ Europe’.`
F2: `Turkey mmea a deɛ ɛka ho ne atadeɛ, ɛfa kilomit no square 783,562 (300,948 sq mi), a emu 755,688 kilomita square no (291,773 sq mi) ɛwɔ Asia anaafo atɔe ne kilomita square23,764 (9,174 sq mi) wɔ europe.`
---------------------- (430) ----------------------
F1: `Turkey beaeԑ no ma no yԑ wiase mu ɔman a ԑtɔ so 37 a ԑso pa ara, ԑnna ԑreyԑ ne ‘Metropolitan France ԑne the United Kingdom’ a yԑaka abom ayԑ pԑ.`
F2: `Turkey na wiase nyiaa man a ɛso no ɛtɔ 37 na ɛte sɛnea wɔaka Metropolitan France ne United Kingdom abom.`
---------------------- (431) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛpo atwa Turkey ho ahyia wɔ baabi mmiԑnsa: ‘Aegean Sea no wɔ atɔeԑ, Black Sea no wɔ atifi ԑnna Mediterranean Sea no wɔ anaafoɔ.`
F2: `Ɛpo atwitwa Turkey afa abiɛsa ho ahyia: Aegean po no kɔ atɔe, Ɛpo Tuntum no kɔ atifi ɛna Mediterranean Po no kɔ anaafo.`
---------------------- (432) ----------------------
F1: `Luxembourg wↄ abakↄsεm tenten nanso wↄn ahofadie afe a efi 1839 nka ho.`
F2: `Luxembourg wɔ abakɔsɛm tenten anso wɔn faahodien no firi 1839.`
---------------------- (433) ----------------------
F1: `Na εnnε bere wei mu Belgiunm fa bi ka Luxembourg ho tete no nanso εbεyε sε Belgium wↄ 1830 Belgian Revolution.`
F2: `Na nnɛ mmerɛ yi mu Belgium ɛka Luxembourg bi a atwam na ɛbɛyɛɛ Belgian 1830s Belgian Ɔamni anidani ‘Revolution’ no akyi.`
---------------------- (434) ----------------------
F1: `Luxembourg man no bↄ wↄn ho mmↄden sε wↄnngyina ↄfa biara nanso Germany man no mu wↄde wↄn ho hyε Wiase Nyinaa Ko I ne Wiase Nyinaa Ko II no mu.`
F2: `Luxembourg abɔ mmɔden sɛ ɛbɛyɛ ɔman a ennyina ɔfa biara nanso Wiaso KO I ne Wiase Ko II mu Germanyfo kɔ gyee hɔ kɛntɛnn so.`
---------------------- (435) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ afe 1957 mu no, Luxemburg bεyεε aman a wↄtee kuo bi a εnnε wↄfrε no European Union.`
F2: `1957 mu no, Luxembourg bɛkaa wɔn wɔtee ahyehyɛde a ɛnnɛ yɛfrɛ no European Union no ho.`
---------------------- (436) ----------------------
F1: `Drukgyal Dzong yε abankεseε a adane dantuo na esane yↄ Buddahfoↄ ahotefoↄ efie a εwↄ Paro ↄmansini no atififam (wↄ Phondey Akuraseε).`
F2: `Drukgyal Dzong yɛ ɛdan a ɛyɛ den a asɛe ne Buddhist monastery a ɛwɔ Paro mansini mu wɔatifi fam (ɛwɔ Phondey akuraase).`
---------------------- (437) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄka sε wↄ afe 1649 mu no, Zhabdrung Ngaawang Namgyel yε abankεseε no maa nkonim a odii wↄ Tibetan_mongol asrafoↄ so no.`
F2: `Wɔkyerɛ sɛ 1649, Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyel sii ɔdan ahoɔden wom yi de kaae nkunim wɔ Tibetan-Mongo akofo so no.`
---------------------- (438) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ afe 1951 mu no, ogyahyehyε bi siia nnoↄma nyinaa hyeeε nanso tete Drukgyal Zhabdrung Ngawang nnoↄma no kaa yε, ebi yε Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal ahoni no.`
F2: `1951 mu no, ogya maa Drukgyal Dzong tete ade bi ɛho hia wɔ ɔsom mu ‘relics’ no kae, te sɛ Zhabdrung Ngawang Namgyal mfoni.`
---------------------- (439) ----------------------
F1: `Ogyahyehyε no akyi no, wↄ koraa abankεseε no so na wↄbↄↄ ho ban nso, εno ma no bεyεε Bhutan ade a εtwetwe amanfoↄ na εmaa wↄn ahomeka.`
F2: `Egya no aky no, ɔdan ɛwɔ ahoɔden a hwee ntumi no wɔkoraa so bɔɔ ho ban, na ɛyɛ Bhutan mmea ɛtwetwe nkorɔfo ba hɔ paa no biako.`
---------------------- (440) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ mfe mpem ahawↄtwe bere mu no Cambodia man no bεhyε aman mmienu a wↄwↄ tumi paa ntamu, Thailand ne Vietnam.`
F2: `Afeha ɛtɔ so 18 mu no, amanifo abien na na wɔpree Cambodia ho, Thailand ne Vietnam.`
---------------------- (441) ----------------------
F1: `Thailandfoↄ no to hyε Cambodia man no so mpεn pii wↄ mfe mmpem ahawↄtwe bere no mu na 1772 mu no wↄ sεe Phom Phen.`
F2: `Thaifo no kɔɔ Cambodia mprɛ pii wɔ afe ha ɛtɔ so 18 na afe 1772 mu no wɔsɛɛe Phnom Phen.`
---------------------- (442) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ mfe a etwa toↄ wↄ mfe mpem ahawↄtwe bere mu no Vietnamfoↄ no nso to hyεε Cambodia so.`
F2: `Afeha ɛtɔ so 18 mu no Vietnamfo nso bepuee mu wɔ Cambodia.`
---------------------- (443) ----------------------
F1: `Venezuelafoↄ ↄha mu nkekyemu duowↄtwe na wↄn nyε adwuma, na wↄn a wↄyε adwuma no nso yε nnwuma a εnhyε aban aseε.`
F2: `Venezuelafo mu ɔha nkyekyɛmu edu nnwɔtwe na wɔnnyɛ adwuma na wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma no mu dodo no ara yɛ adwuma wɔ nfɔmaa ɛkɔnɔmi mu.`
---------------------- (444) ----------------------
F1: `Venezuelafoↄ mu mmienu mu nkekyemu mmiεnsa a wↄyε adwuma no yε ↄsom adwuma, bεyε nkyeyemu anan yε adwuma wↄ adwumayε beaε a wↄ danedane asase so nnoↄma ani na nkyeyemu anum yε kuayↄ adwuma.`
F2: `Venezuelafo a wɔyɛ adwuma no, wɔkyɛ wɔn mu abiɛsa a wɔn mu abien na wɔwɔ ɔsom afa mu, wɔn mu anan mu nkyεmu baako yɛ adwuma wɔ mfridwuma mu na wɔn wɔto nnum yɛ kuadwuma.`
---------------------- (445) ----------------------
F1: `Asase so nnoↄma a εsomboↄ paa ma Venezuelafoↄ no yε ngo, na ↄman no de emufa kεseε tu kwan kↄ nkuro foforↄ so, emfa ho sε wↄn mu ↄha mu nkekyemu baako pε na εyↄ adwuma wↄ ngo ho adwumayε beaε hↄ.`
F2: `Ndastre a ɛwɔ Venezuela paa ne fango, a ɛno na ɔman no de kɔ aguaman so,ɛwom sɛ nnipa wɔyɛ adwuma wɔ hɔ no yɛ ɔha nkyekyɛmu biako pɛ.`
---------------------- (446) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ ↄman no ahofadie mfiaseε no, Singapore Botanic turo ho nimdiefoↄ boa ma wↄ sesaa nsuopↄw no bεyεε no Garden City asase a εhye wↄ so.`
F2: `Ɔman no faahodiemfiase no, Singapore Botanic Gardens animdefo boa ma wɔsiesiee island no ma ɛbɛyɛɛ trɔpikaa Turo a ɛyɛ fɛ.`
---------------------- (447) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ afe 1981 no wↄ faa, Vanda Miss Joaquim, orchid nhwiren, sε ↄman no nhwiren.`
F2: `1981 mu no, wɔpaw Vanda Miss Joaquim, a ɔyɛ orchid hybrid, sɛ ɔman nyinaa nhwire ‘mfrawɛse’.`
---------------------- (448) ----------------------
F1: `Afe biara no wↄ Ahinime mu no mmoa a wↄwe ahaban ↄpepem baako ne aha num tu kↄ anaafoↄ asase pradadaa so, na wↄtwa Mara Asubↄnten, firi atififam bepↄ so nsuo no enti.`
F2: `Afe biara bɛyɛ Ahineme mu no, mmoa wɔwe wura bɛyɛ ɔpepem 1.5 na wɔkɔ anafo fam, wɔtwa Mara asubɔnten a wɔfiri mmepɔ no atifi ɛma nsu no.`
---------------------- (449) ----------------------
F1: `Na wↄnam atↄeεfam san ba atififam, na wↄ san twa Mara asubↄnten no ba, nsuo tↄ no akyiri wↄ Oforisuo mu.`
F2: `Na wɔsan ba atifi a ɛyɛ atifi a wɔnam atɔe,afe wɔsan twa asubɔnten Mara bio bere nsuo no ate wɔ Oforisuo mu.`
---------------------- (450) ----------------------
F1: `Serengeti man no mmoa tenabea wↄ Serengeti mantemu, mmoa tenabea a εwↄ Ngorongoro ne Maswa mmoa tenabea a εwↄ Tanzania ne Maasai Mara man no mmoa tenabea wↄ Kenya.`
F2: `Serengeti mantam no wɔ Serengeti Ɔman mu Paake, Ngorongoro Bea a Wɔakora so ne Maswa Wurammmoa Atenae a Wɔagya ɛwɔ Tanzania ne Maasai Mara Ɔman mu Beae bi a Wɔagya ato hɔ a ɛwɔ Kenya`
---------------------- (451) ----------------------
F1: `Dawurubↄ mu nkotahodie ho adesua hwehwε sε wotumi nya nkↄmmↄ ne amammerε ho nimdeε, saa nso na εsε sε wonya nnwinade a wosua wↄ adesuadan mu no nso ho nimdeε paa (anansesεm a wↄkyerεw wↄ kyerεwpon so, ↄbↄtie ne ↄhwεtie mu nyiyimu, anasesεm ka, ne neaε εkeka ho.)`
F2: `Sua woresua sɛ wobɛyɛ midia a ɛyɛ anika no hia kɔnvɛnhyinaa ne tradihyinaa nimde, na wohunu sɛnea wode nnwinade bedi dwumayiye wɔ klaase (storyboarding, audio ne vidio ɛditin, anansesɛm to, ne ade)`
---------------------- (452) ----------------------
F1: `Nkↄmmↄbↄ ho bↄtirimuyε hwehwε sε wo san susu dea wodwene fa dawurubↄ adwuma ho na wosua sε wobεdwene nnoↄma ho wↄ akwan ahodoↄ so.`
F2: `Interactive design hwehwɛ sɛ wobɛsane ayɛ wo nsusui a ɛfa midia dwumadi ‘production’ na woasua sɛnea wobɛsusu nneɛma ho wɔ akwan ahorow so ho no mu nhwehwɛmu .`
---------------------- (453) ----------------------
F1: `Nkↄmmↄbↄ ho bↄtirimyε hwehwε sε nhyehyεeε ho nnoↄma nyinaa hyia, nanso εsε sε ne nyinaa yε adeε a nyansa wↄ mu sε woyiyi no baako baako a.`
F2: `Interactive design hwehwɛ sɛ dwumadi no afa ahorow no ne ne nkae no wɔ nsawɔso di, nanso ɛno nko wɔ hɔ ntease wom.`
---------------------- (454) ----------------------
F1: `Ↄhaw a εwↄ zoom mfoninitwa nhwehwε ho yε ne focal ho adwuma a εyε bisibasa ne mfoninitwa ahwehwε ho nnoↄma a εho hia na watumi anya focal ntwemu a εwↄ anim sen mfoninitwa nhwehwε a εba fam deε.`
F2: `Ade a ɛnyɛ wɔ zoom lɛnse ne sɛ; focal complexity ne lɛns elemɛnts nɔma dodowehia na ama aduru baabi a fooka legths wɔ no kyɛn prima lɛnses.`
---------------------- (455) ----------------------
F1: `Saa ↄhaw wei abεyε ↄhaw ketewa ama wↄn a wↄyε mfoninitwa ahwehwε efiri sε wↄtumi yε mfoninitwa ahwehwε a εyε papa.`
F2: `Wei nyɛ biribi a ɛha adwenr esiane sɛ wɔn a wɔyɛ lɛns no aduru akyi paa wɔ lɛnse yɛ mu.`
---------------------- (456) ----------------------
F1: `Wei ama zoom mfoninitwa ahwehwε no tumi ma mfonini yεfε paa te sε dea wↄde mfoninitwa ahwehwε a εwↄ focal ntwemu pↄtee na etwaaeε.`
F2: `Wei ama Zoom lɛnses kwan ma ɛma mfoni a ɛyɛ fɛ sɛ yɛde toto lɛnses a ɛwɔ fokaa legth no ho a.`
---------------------- (457) ----------------------
F1: `Ↄhaw foforↄ a εwↄ zoom mfonintwa nhwehwε ho ne sε akwan a kanea famu (ahoↄhareε) no εtae wↄ fam.`
F2: `Ade biako aɛnyɛ wɔ zoom lɛnses ho ne sɛnea aperture (mmirika no) ma lɛnse no taa yɛ nyaa no.`
---------------------- (458) ----------------------
F1: `Wei ma no yε den sε wode zoom mfoninitwa nhwehwε a ne bo wↄ fam no betwa mfonini wↄ beaε a kanea nni anaa kanea εwↄ fam.`
F2: `Wei ma ɛye den sɛ zoom lɛnses a ne bo nyɛ den a wode bɛdi dwuma wɔ baabi nkanea nni a flash nni no yɛ den.`
---------------------- (459) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔhaw baako a wɔtaa hyia bere a wode sini rekɔ DVD so no ne sɛ mfoni no fa bi kɔtɛ nkyɛn bere a worebɔ no.`
F2: `Ɔhaw biako a ɛtaa ba bere a wode sini regu DVD so ne ovasikan.`
---------------------- (460) ----------------------
F1: `TV ahodoɔ pii wɔ hɔ a wɔyɛ de sɔ ɔmanfoɔ pii no ani.`
F2: `Wɔayɛ tɛlɛvihyin dodoɔ no ara sɛ ɔmanfo no ani nnye ho.`
---------------------- (461) ----------------------
F1: `Eno nti, biribiara a wohu wɔ TV so no wɔ ɛhyeɛ a atwa wɔ soro, fam, ne nkyɛn nkyɛn.`
F2: `Esiane yei nti, biribiara wobɛhunu wɔ Tv so no, na wɔatwitwa ano no so, soro, ase ne nkyɛnkyɛnmu.`
---------------------- (462) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔyɛ saa de ma mfoni no nyinaa kata anim. Brɔfo kasa mu no wɔfrɛ no "overscan", a ase kyerɛ sɛ mfoni no bi kɔtɛ ɛfa bere a worebɔ no.`
F2: `Wɔyɛ yei sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a mfoni no bɛfa so nyinaa. Yei na yɛfrɛ no ovasikan.`
---------------------- (463) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, sɛ woyɛ DVD a, ebia wobetwa ne hyeɛ nso. Na sɛ sini no wɔ nkyrɔeɛ a ɛbɛn aseɛ hɔ pii a, ne nyinaa ɛmma yiye.`
F2: `Awerɛhosɛm ne sɛ, sɛ woyɛ DVD a, baabi bɛtumi afirim, na sɛ sini no wɔ ntwerɛeɛ a ɛwɔ ase mpo a, wɔnhu ne nyinaa.`
---------------------- (464) ----------------------
F1: `Tete abakɔsɛm no ma deɛ yɛsusu no di nhini, ɛkaekae yɛn mfonii a ɛfa ako, nnipa dodoɔ bi apontoɔ ne ɔhenepɔn Arthur ho.`
F2: `Tete abankɛse a ɛwɔ boro adwene ne nteaseɛ so, ɛde mfonin a ɛrekyerɛ sɛ wɔtete apɔnkɔ so kura peaw, bakwɛɛte ne Arthurian chivalry.`
---------------------- (465) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho mpo sɛ atumi agyina ɔsɛeɛ ano mfeɛ apem, ɛnyɛ den sɛ yɛbɛtwe yɛn adwene asi ako a asisi tete so, na yɛate nan a ɛkeka bom wɔ akwan so na huboa abɔ yɛn ɛnam afiase da nti.`
F2: `Mpo sɛ wogyina nnoɔma a atwam mfe apem no so a, wotumi kae ako a abɛtwam no ho a, wommerɛ ho koraa, na wɔtumi te apɔnkɔ no nan ase dede sɛ ɛnam aboɔ so ne ehu a efiri amena donkodonko no aka.`
---------------------- (466) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso deɛ yɛdwene ho no gyina deɛ asie so? Adɛn nti na wɔsisii abankɛseɛ? Sɛn na wɔsi hyehyɛeɛ na wɔsii no?`
F2: `Nanso yɛn nsusuiɛ no gyina sɛ nea ɛteɛ so anaa? Deɛ edi kan koraa no, adɛn nti na wɔsisii abankɛse? Kwan bɛn na wɔfaa so yɛɛ ho nhyehyɛe na wɔsiie?`
---------------------- (467) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ saa bere titire no, Kirby Muxloe Abankεseε no yε ↄdan a wↄn ahyεmu den sen abankεseε no ankasa.`
F2: `Te sɛ bere no,Kirby Muxloe Castle yɛ efi abɔne ho ban kyɛn castle ankasa.`
---------------------- (468) ----------------------
F1: `Ne mpoma a wↄde ahwehwε ayε ne fasuo teatea no rentumi nnyina nhyεso ano nkyε.`
F2: `Ne mpoma akɛse na afasu mfeamfeaa ntumi nnyina ntohyɛso a anka ɛbɛkyɛ no.`
---------------------- (469) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ 1480 bere mu, bere a Lord Hastings fii ase sii no, na ↄman no wↄ asomdwoe na na nkuo nketewa ne atuatefoↄ ho nkoa na na wohia ahobanmↄ.`
F2: `1480s mu no, bere Lord Hastings fii ne si ase no, na ɔman no mu dwo na wɔhia banbɔ de kotaia nnipa kakra bi wɔnenam fom nkorɔfo nneɛma no.`
---------------------- (470) ----------------------
F1: `Na tumi a wↄkyε no pεpεεpε no yε akwanso adeyↄ a Europe man no fa so ma Europe nkuro no nyinaa tumi a wↄwↄ no tena hↄ.`
F2: `Na balance of power no yɛ sistɛm a Europe aman nam so hwehwɛ sɛ Europe ama no nyinaa bɛyɛ adehye aman.`
---------------------- (471) ----------------------
F1: `Na atrimupↄ ne sε Europe aman nyinaa bεhwε sε ↄman baako rengye tumidie no nyinaa, ne saa enti na aman no mu aban tae sesa kuo a wↄwↄ mu sεnea εbεyε a bribiara bεyε pε.`
F2: `Na adwene no nyinaa ne sɛ ɛmma Europe aman no bi mmɛ nya tumi nkyɛn nkae no, na national governments taa sesa deɛ wɔne bɔ no ‘alliences’ na ama biriribiara ayɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.`
---------------------- (472) ----------------------
F1: `Spain Ahindie ho Ↄko no hyεε ↄko a edi kan a na εfa tumidie a εbε kari pε no ho agyirae.`
F2: `Spanish Succession ako no na ɛbɛyɛɛ ako a edi kan asɛm a na ɛda gua so tumi a ɛyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.`
---------------------- (473) ----------------------
F1: `Wei hyεε nsakraε kεseε hi agyirae, efirisε Europe man no tumidie no renngyina ↄsom so nko bio. Enti, mfe Aduasa Ↄko no bεyε ↄko a etwa to a wↄbεferε no ↄsom ho ↄko.`
F2: `Wei yɛ biribi aɛho hia paa, esiane na Europe tumidi no nkɔ nko nka sɛ wɔreko ɔsom ako. Kyerɛ sɛ, Mfe aduasa Ako no bɛyɛ deɛ etwa sɛ ɛno ne ɔsom ako aetwa to.`
---------------------- (474) ----------------------
F1: `Artemis asↄrefie a εwↄ Ephesus no wↄseε no wↄ Kitawonsa 21, 356 BCE bere a Herostratusfoↄ no twaa ogya too mu no.`
F2: `Artemis beae a wɔsom a ɛwɔ Ephesus no wɔsɛɛe no Kitawonsa 21, 356 BCE na ɛyɛ ogya na ɛtoo mu na deɛ wɔyɛɛ saa ne Herostratus.`
---------------------- (475) ----------------------
F1: `Abakↄsεm kyerε sε, dea na εhyε no nkuran ne sε ↄbɛdi nkonim ↄkwan biara so. Ephesofpↄ no, abufuo mu no, kaeε sε mma wↄn twerε Herostratus din da.`
F2: `Asɛm no kyerɛ sɛ, deɛ ɛhyɛɛ ne mpamden ne sɛ ɔbɛgye din kwan biara so.`
---------------------- (476) ----------------------
F1: `Greek abakↄsεm twerεfoↄ Strado twerɛ edin no, εno na yenim εnnε no. Wↄseε asↄrefie no saa anadwo a wↄwoo Alexander the Great no.`
F2: `Greek abakɔsɛm ho ɔbenfo Strabo twerɛɛ din no, a ɛno na yɛnim no nnɛ no. Wɔsɛɛe beae a wɔsom no saa anadwo no a wɔwoo Alexander Ɔkɛse no.`
---------------------- (477) ----------------------
F1: `Alexander, a ↄyε ↄhene no, yεe sε anka obetua sika ama wↄn asan asi asↄrefie no bio, nanso wↄn angye saa adeyε no anto mu. Ekyiri yi, wↄ Alexander wuo akyi no, wↄ san sii asↄrefie no wↄ 323 BCE mu.`
F2: `Alexander, sɛ ɔhene no, yɛɛ sɛ ɔbɛfa asɔrefi a ɔresan asi no ho ka, nanso wɔampene so. Akyi bere Alexander wuui no, wɔsan sii asɔre fi no wɔ 323 BCE.`
---------------------- (478) ----------------------
F1: `Bↄ mmↄden sε wonsa ntea ho be dwodwo wↄ abereε a womia nnwomto mu agyire no so yiyie no - afei nso bↄ mmɔden sε wommfa wo nsa tea no nnyε adwuma den biara.`
F2: `Hwɛ sɛ wo nsa no ayɛ relaxed bere a worebɔ notes no pɛpɛpɛɛ - afei nso bɔ mmɔden sɛ wontwetwe wo nsa sɛnea ɛnsɛ.`
---------------------- (479) ----------------------
F1: `Woyε no sa a, woremmerε pii. Kae sε εho nhia sε wo bɛmia mmia no so den dodo sε enyε dede kεseε te sε piano no.`
F2: `Saa kwan yi so no, wommerɛ pii koraa. Kae sɛ ɛho nhia sɛ wode ahoɔden bɛmia keys so sɛ wopɛ sɛ volume no kɔ soro wɔ piano so.`
---------------------- (480) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ senkuo no so no, sε ano bεyε den bi aka ho a, mia bellows no so den anaa mia so ntεmntεm.`
F2: `Accordion so no, sɛ wopɛ volume no bi aka ho a, fa bellows no di dwuma na pressure anaasɛ supiidi mmara mu.`
---------------------- (481) ----------------------
F1: `Mysticism ɛyɛ hu a obi behu twaka a ɛda obi ne adeɛ bi ntam, hu a obehu ne ho ne adeɛ bi, anaa sɛ obi be hu dea ɛwɔ hɔ ankasa, sɛdeɛ biribi kyɛn so, honhom ho nokware, anaa Onyankopɔn.`
F2: `Mysticism yɛ pursuit of communion, adida anaasɛ conscious awareness of an ultimate reality, ahintasɛm, honhom mu nokwasɛm anaasɛ Nyankopɔn.`
---------------------- (482) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔgyedini no hwԑ sԑ ɔbԑnya suahunu anaa nhunumu wɔ nyame bi/bosom bi mu.`
F2: `Gyidini no hwehwɛ suahunu tee, nkate anaasɛ nya anisoadehunu wɔ devine reality/ɔbosom no anaasɛ abosom.`
---------------------- (483) ----------------------
F1: `Akyidifoɔ no bɔ wɔn bra kwan bi so anaa nneԑma bi a ԑma saa suahunu no kɔ nkan.`
F2: `Akyitaafo di asetena kwan bi akyi, anaasɛwɔyɛ nneɛma bi ɛma wɔtete saa suahunu no.`
---------------------- (484) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑma ‘Mysticism’ da nso firi ԑsom foforɔ ho ne suahunu a wɔsi so dua sԑ obi nya wɔ berԑ a ɔde n’adwene asi so ne titire ne asomdwoeԑ, nhunumu, nhyira anaa anigyeԑ mmorosoɔ so no.`
F2: `Mysticism bɛtumi ada nso afiri ɔsom mu gyidi nkae ho na ɛsom na ɛde n’ani si ankorɛankorɛ suahunu wɔ state of consciousness mu,titire deɛ ɛyɛ asomdwoe,insightful, blissful anaasɛ mpo ecstatic character.`
---------------------- (485) ----------------------
F1: `‘Sikhism’ yԑ som a ԑfiri ‘India’. Ɛhyԑԑ aseԑ firii ‘Punjab’ mpɔtam hɔ wɔ ‘15th mfeɛ ɔha a ɛtɔ so berԑ no mu wɔ berԑ a nkyekyԑmu baa ‘Hindu amammerԑ’ mu no.`
F2: `Sikhism yɛ ɔsom a ɛfiri Indian anafo fam. Ɛhyɛɛ ase firii Punjab mantam firi afeha a ɛtɔ so 15 na ɛfiri Hindu amammere a emu paapaee no mu na ɛbaae.`
---------------------- (486) ----------------------
F1: `‘Sikhs’ no hunu wɔn som no sԑ ԑne ‘Hinduism’ no nyԑ pԑ ԑwom sԑ wɔgye tom sԑ ԑfiri ‘Hindu amammerԑ’ mu na ԑbaeԑ.`
F2: `Sikhs hunu sɛ wɔn som no da nso wɔ Hinduism ho ɛwom wɔgye tom sɛ wɔfi Hundu mu de.`
---------------------- (487) ----------------------
F1: `‘Sikhs’ no frԑ wɔn som no ‘Gurmat’ a ԑyԑ Punjabi ma "guru no akwan". ‘Guru’ no yԑ India som no nyinaa fapem nanso ‘Sikhism’ mu no, ayԑ ade titire a ԑyԑ ‘Sikh’ gyedie nnyinasoɔ.`
F2: `Sikhs frɛ wɔn som no Gurmat, a ɛyɛ Punjabi asɛmfu asɛm “guru no kwan”. Guru no yɛ Indian ɔsom nyinaa fapem nanso Sikhism mu no,nanso Sikhism agye Sikh gyidi a ɛho pa no atom.`
---------------------- (488) ----------------------
F1: `Guru Nanak (1469–1539) na ɔtee saa som yi wɔ ‘15th mfeɛ ɔha a ɛtɔ so no mu. Ɔno akyi no, ‘guru’ ahodoɔ nkron na aba.`
F2: `Guru Nanak na ɔtee ɔsom yi wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 15 (1469–1539). Gurus nkron dii wei akyi ntoaso ntoaso.`
---------------------- (489) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso Ayԑwohomumu 1956 mu no, basabasayԑ a ԑmaa ne ho so wɔ Poland sɔɔ Krushchev bɔhyԑ no hwԑeԑ, wɔ berԑ a na adwumayԑfoɔ a wɔreyԑ ɔyԑkyerԑ fa aduane a ԑnni hɔ ne wɔn akatua a wɔate so no danee ɔyԑkyerԑ a na ԑtia ‘Communism’ no mu.`
F2: `Nanso wɔ ayɛwohumummɔ 1956 mu no,wɔsɔɔ Krushchev bɔhyɛ no hwɛɛe bere na sakasa rekɔ so wɔ Poland, a na adwumayɛfo reyɛ ɔyɛkyerɛ nnuane a na ɛho ayɛ den ne akatua nteso so,na ɛdane bɛyɛɛ ɔyɛkyerɛ a wɔyɛ tiaa Communism.`
---------------------- (490) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwom sԑ awieeԑ no Krushchev maa nkurɔfoɔ kɔsɔɔ ano deԑ nanso ɔmaa kwan maa nneԑma no bi yԑԑ adwuma sane tee aseԑ sԑ ɔde Wladyslaw Gomulka a na wagye din no bԑyԑ mansoafoɔ.`
F2: `Awiee no, Krushchev de dorobɛn kↄe ma ɛhɔ daa dinn, ɔmaa nneɛma na wɔrepɛ no bi kwan na ɔtee ase paw Wladyslaw Gomulka a na wagye din paa no sɛ ɔmansoafo foforo.`
---------------------- (491) ----------------------
F1: `Na ‘Indus Valley Anibue’ no yԑ ‘Bronze Age anibue’ wɔ ‘northwest Indian’ mpɔtam hɔ a na seesei Pakistan ԑne mantam bi wɔ ‘northwest India’ ԑne ‘northeast Afghanistan’ ka ho.`
F2: `Indus Valley Anibue yɛ Bronze Bere mu anibue wɔ India atifiatɔe ubcontinent a nnɛ mmerɛ yi mu Pakistan ne amantam bi a ɛwɔ India ne Afghanistan atifiatɔe.`
---------------------- (492) ----------------------
F1: `Anibue no nyaa nkɔsoɔ wɔ ‘Indus River’ asase a ԑwɔ ne nkyԑn no so nti na edin no da so no.`
F2: `Anibue no kɔɔ anim wɔ Indus asubɔntene basins no mu baabi a enyaa ne din firiiɛ.`
---------------------- (493) ----------------------
F1: `Animdefo bi kyerԑ sԑ ԑnam sԑ na anibue no wɔ asase a ԑwɔ seesei asuo a awe ‘Sarasvati’ no nti ԑsԑ sԑ ne din yԑ ‘Indus-Sarasvati Anibue’, a ebinom nso frԑ no ‘Harappan Anibue’ ԑnam Harappa nti, beaeԑ a ԑdii kan wɔ 1920s no mu.`
F2: `Ɛwom sɛ abenfo bi keka sɛ esiane sɛ na anibue bi ɛwɔ Sarasvati Asubɔnten basin a seesei awe no mu no, ɛsɛ yɛfrɛ no Indus-Sarasvati Anibue, ebinom nso frɛ no Harappan Anibue na wɔde too Harappa,, wɔuu ne bea a edi kan no 1920s mu.`
---------------------- (494) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑdeԑ na Roman empire no yԑ ‘militaristic’ si teԑ no na ԑmaa nnuroyԑ tuu mpɔn.`
F2: `Esiane sɛ na Roman aheman no mu asraafosɛm abusu nti ɛboa ma wɔnyaa nkcanim wɔ aduyɛ mu.`
---------------------- (495) ----------------------
F1: `Emperor Augustus hyԑԑ aseԑ faa adɔkotafoɔ maa ɔyԑԑ ‘Roman Medical Corps’ a ԑdi kan no sԑdeԑ wɔde bԑyԑ adwuma ɔko akyi.`
F2: `Kanifo Augustus fii ase faa Adɔkotfo adwuma mu na wɔtee Roman Medical Corps sɛ wɔnni dwuma wɔ ako no akyi.`
---------------------- (496) ----------------------
F1: `Na ‘Surgeons’ no wɔ nimdeԑ fa ‘sedatives’ ahodoɔ ho a ‘morphine ԑfiri poppy aba mu ԑne scopolamine a ԑfiri herbane aba mu’ ka ho.`
F2: `Nnuyɛfo ‘Surgeons’ wɔ nimde wɔ nnuro ahorow a ɛma adwene no mmerɛ pii na ɛnyɛ adwuma pii ho a morphine a ɛfiri poppy aba mu scopolamine a ɛfi herbane aba mu.`
---------------------- (497) ----------------------
F1: `Na wɔahunu sԑdeԑ wɔsi yi honam akwaa bi firi hɔ na amma deԑ wapira no annya ‘gangrene’ ԑne ‘tourniquets’ ԑnna ‘arterial clamps’ sԑdeԑ ԑbԑma mogya adi aforosane.`
F2: `Wɔbɛyɛɛ akunini wɔ twa wɔtwa obi akwaa bi fi hɔ no ho na abɔ nnipa no ho ban afi honam abɔre ho ne afiri wɔdde di dwuma ɛmma mogya nni afurusane ne ade wɔde di dwuma a ɛmma mogya na nkɔ mu.`
---------------------- (498) ----------------------
F1: `Mfeɛ ɔha a ɛtɔ so bebree akyi no, Roman empire no nyaa nimdeԑ pii wɔ nnuroyԑ ne apomuden mu a ԑno ne ԑnnԑ nimdeԑ no nnyinasoɔ.`
F2: `Mfe ha ha bi akyi no,Roman aheman no nyaa nkɔanim wɔ aduyu mu na ɛbɛyɛɛ nimde a ɛwɔ hɔ nnɛ no nnyinaso.`
---------------------- (499) ----------------------
F1: `‘Pureland origami’ yԑ ‘origami’ ԑma wotumi yԑ ‘fold’ baako pԑ wɔ berԑ bi mu, na wɔmma ‘folds’ a ne yԑ yԑ den te sԑ ‘reverse folds’ ho kwan ԑnna ‘folds’ no nyinaa wɔ baabi pɔtee a wɔwɔ.`
F2: `Pureland origami yɛ origami nhyɛ da so sɛ folder biako pɛ na wɔtumi yɛ no bere koro mu, fold bere a ɛyɛ den te sɛ reverse fold wɔmma ho kwan, ɛnyɛ folds nyinaa na ɛwɔ mmeae a ɛyɛ tee.`
---------------------- (500) ----------------------
F1: `John Smith na ɔyԑԑ no wɔ ‘1970s’ no mu de boaa wɔn a wɔnkwadaree ‘fold’ no yԑ mu anaa wɔnni ‘motor skills’ no pii.`
F2: `John Smith ina ɔyɛɛ no 1970s mu sɛ ɛmmoa wɔn a wɔyɛ folders a wɔnni suahunu pii no anaasɛ wɔn a motor skills nkɔ anim pii no.`
---------------------- (501) ----------------------
F1: `Nkwadaa hunu abusua a wɔbɔ ԑne nneԑma a ԑwɔ abusua no ho ntԑm, saa nneԑma yi nso nya nsunsuansoɔ wɔ suban so.`
F2: `Mmɔfra nya nnipa a wɔyiyi wɔn mu ho adwene firi wɔn mmɔfra ase na saa nyiyimu yi ɛka nneyɛe.`
---------------------- (502) ----------------------
F1: `Nhwԑsoɔ ne sԑ, nkwadaa a wɔhu wɔn abusua sԑ ԑsua na wɔnyԑ adeԑ wɔ sukuu mu no nso nyԑ adeԑ wɔ sukuu mu berԑ a wɔbԑhu sԑ saa adeԑ no bata n’abusua ho no.`
F2: `Sɛ nhwɛso no, mmɔfra nnipa mu nyinyimu nya wɔn so nkɛntɛnso no mmɔ mmɔden wɔ sukuu mu bere a wɔabɛhunu sɛ esiane wɔn abusuaku a wɔfi mu nti wɔyiyi wɔn mu no.`
---------------------- (503) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ United States no, websaet a nkrɔfo kɔ hɔ paa a ɛto so mmiensa yɛ MySpaɔe. Na seiseiaa no, nkrɔfo a wɔn ho nsɛm wɔ hɔ no yɛ 54 million.`
F2: `MySpace ne wɛbsaete a ɛtɔ so abiɛsa a wɔde di dwuma pa ara wɔ United State na mprenmpren wɔn a wɔn ho nsɛm wɔ hɔ no yɛ ɔpepem 54.`
---------------------- (504) ----------------------
F1: `Nkrɔfo pii kɔ saa wɛbsaet ahorow yi hɔ, ne titirw adesuafo.`
F2: `Saa wɛbsaete weinom anya asrafoɔ pa ara, titiriw deɛ ɛfa nhomasua ho.`
---------------------- (505) ----------------------
F1: `Saa websaet ahorow yi wɔ nneɛma pii a ɛyɛ wɔ ho. Ebi ne sɛ, ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wobɛbue klass kraatafa a nneɛma a ɛwɔ hɔ no bi ne blɔgs, sini ahorow, mfoni ahorow ne nkekaho ahorow.`
F2: `Nnoɔma pa bi wɔ wɛbsaet yi ho, deɛ ɛko bi ne, sɛ woreyɛ klass peegyi a wommerɛ a deɛ ɛbɛka ho bi ne blogs, vidio ahodoɔ, mfoni ne nnoɔma nkaeɛ.`
---------------------- (506) ----------------------
F1: `Websaet address biako pɛ no bɛtumi de wo akɔ saa kraatafa no so. ɛyi ma no yɛ mmrɛw ma asukuufo a wɔbrɛ sɛ wɔbɛkae na watypo wɔ kiibɔd so anaa wɔɔspɛɛle no.`
F2: `Wonam wɛb adrɛse biako a wode bɛma so no wo nsa betumi aka, ɛma ɛyɛ mmerɛw sɛ wobɛkae na ɛma ɛyɛ mmerɛw ma wo sɛ wobɛtaapo ama asukuufoɔ a wɔbɛwɔ ɔhaw wɔ kiibɔdo a wɔde bedi dwuma ho anaa wɔwɔ ɔhaw wɔ sopɛɛlin ɛho no.`
---------------------- (507) ----------------------
F1: `Wobetumi asesa no na ayɛ mmrɛw sɛ wobɛkenkan, na kɔla no nso wobɛtumi ayɛ no gɔɔn ana ketewaa bi.`
F2: `Wɔbɛtumi ayɛ no kwan soronko bi so ɛbɛma ɛnyɛ den sɛ ɔbɛkenkan, na afei nso kɔla kakra anaa deɛ ɛnɔɔso sɛnea ɛsɛ.`
---------------------- (508) ----------------------
F1: `Attention Deficit Disorder "yԑ adwene mu haw a deԑ ԑkyerԑ no ase ne ‘wobԑyԑ biribi a wonnwene ho’, ‘sԑ wode w’adwene bԑsi deԑ ԑnhia so, ԑne ‘sԑ wobԑpere wɔ biribi ho, anaa wobԑnya ahoɔden ama aboro so".`
F2: `Attention Deficit Disorder “neurological syndrome a ne klasek a ɛyɛ nsunsuanso a aka abom a impulsivity, distractibility ne hyperactivity anaasɛ ahoɔden mmoroso”.`
---------------------- (509) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnyԑadesua dԑmdie na mmom ԑyԑ adesua haw; ԑyԑ "nkadwaa ɔha mu abupԑn 3 kɔsi 5, ebia ԑbԑyԑ Amerika nkwadaa ɔpepem mmienu".`
F2: `Ɛnyɛ adesua mu dɛmdi, ɛyɛ adesua mu biribi a ɛnkɔ yiye; ɛka mmɔfra mu ɔha nkyekyɛmu 3 kɔsi 5, bɛyɛ Ameika mmɔfra bɛboro ɔpepem 2.`
---------------------- (510) ----------------------
F1: `Nkwadaa a wɔwɔ ADD ntumi mfa wɔn adwene nsi nneԑma bi te sԑ sukuu dwumadie so, nanso wɔbԑtumi de wɔn adwene akɔ biribi a wɔpԑ ne yԑ so te sԑ wɔrehwԑ cartoons a wɔn ani gye ho anaa wɔretwerԑ ɔkasamu a agyinahyԑdeԑ nni mu.`
F2: `MMɔfra a wɔwɔ ADD no ntumi mfa wɔn adwene nsi sukuu dwumadi so, nanso wɔtumi de wɔn adwene si nneɛma wɔn ani gye ho so te sɛ wɔredi agoru anaasɛ sɛ wɔbɛhwɛ kaatoons a n’ani gye ho anaasɛ wɔbɛtwerɛtwerɛ kasamu a wɔmfa atwerɛmu agyinaehyɛde nni dwuma.`
---------------------- (511) ----------------------
F1: `Saa nkwadaa yi taa nya asԑm ԑfiri sԑ "wɔda suban a ԑnyԑ adi, taa ne afoforɔ ko, sɔre tia mpaninnie" sԑdeԑ ԑbԑma wɔn adwene no ayԑ adwuma ԑfiri sԑ kwan a wɔn adwene no yԑ adwuma no yԑ soronko.`
F2: `Mmɔfra weinom taa de wɔn to asɛm mu, esiane sɛ wɔde wɔn ho nneyɛe a ɛyɛ hu mu,wɔkɔ, ne wɔn a wɔkura tumi di anobaabae, esiane sɛ wɔn adwene mma wɔnhunu nneɛma ɛyɛ no.`
---------------------- (512) ----------------------
F1: `ADD toto ayɔnkofa a wɔne wɔn mfԑfoɔ wɔ ntam ԑfiri sԑ nkwadaa foforɔ ntumi nte deԑ nti a wɔda saa suban no adi anaa deԑ nti a ‘wɔbobɔ atwerԑdeԑ a ԑwɔ asԑmfua no sԑdeԑ wɔyԑ no no, anaa wɔn adwene mu mueeԑ.`
F2: `ADD ɛka wɔne wɔn mfɛfo ntam nkitahodi esiane sɛ mmɔfra afoforo nte sɛ nti a wɔyɛ wɔn ade wɔ saa kwan no so anaasɛ sɛ nti wɔsopɛɛle saa kwan no anaasɛ wɔn nyini no da soronko.`
---------------------- (513) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑdeԑ tumi a nnipa fa so nya nimdeԑ sane sua adeԑ no sesaeԑ sԑdeԑ yԑaka wɔ soro hɔ no, mprԑ dodoɔ a obi nya nimdeԑ no nso sesaeԑ.`
F2: `Sɛ ahoɔden a yɛde sua nimde na yɛde sua ade no sesa wɔ kwan bi so sɛnea wɔaka a ɛwɔ fam sene baabi a anka ɛsɛ ɛhyɛ ase ‘ base rate’ no a nimde a wɔanya no sesa.`
---------------------- (514) ----------------------
F1: `Kwan a wɔfa so nya nimdeԑ bi no yԑ soronko. Na kwan a wɔfa so kaekae nneԑma no nyԑ ankorԑankorԑ deԑ bio na mmom sԑ wobԑkae abasԑm no na na wɔhwԑ.`
F2: `Kwan a wɔnam so ma wɔn nsa nka nsɛm no yɛ soronko. Ɔyɛ biara nni ankorɛankorɛ so sɛ ɔnkae ade, nan mmom sɛ ɔbɛtumi akae tɛst bɛyɛɛ de wɔde ani sii so.`
---------------------- (515) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑteԑ ne sԑ, ‘Renaissance’ yԑԑ nsesaeԑ mapa wɔ kwan a yԑfa so sua adeԑ ԑne kwan a yԑfa so de nimdeԑ ma mu.`
F2: `Renaissance maa nsakrae a ɛhia baa kwan wɔfa sua ade na wɔkyekyɛ nimde no mu.`
---------------------- (516) ----------------------
F1: `Na ‘akaatia’ no mfa wɔn nsa nnante bio anaa mfa nkuta adeԑ anaa mfa nto wɔn ho mfa nnua ntam te sԑ wɔn nsԑsoɔ asoroboa nkaeԑ no.`
F2: `Ɛnte sɛ primates nkae no, hominids mfa wɔn nsa nni dwuma wɔ locamotion mu bio anaasɛ wɔgyina wɔn anan so anaasɛ nsɔ dua mu nto adonko.`
---------------------- (517) ----------------------
F1: `Akaatia nsa ne ne nan nyinaa kԑseԑ ne ne tenten yԑ pԑ, ԑkyerԑ nsa no dwumadie sԑ ɔnante ne nan so a.`
F2: `Akaatia nsa ne ne wɔn nan mu kɛse ne wɔn tenten sɛ, na ɛkyerɛ nsa a wɔde sɔ ade a emu yɛduru mu wɔ knuckle nante mu.`
---------------------- (518) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa nsa yԑ tia sene ne nan, ԑmu nkasԑԑ no tene.`
F2: `Nnipa nsa yɛ tia sene wɔn nan mu ɛwɔ dompe a ɛwɔ nsansoaa ne nannsoa.`
---------------------- (519) ----------------------
F1: `Nkasԑԑ a adi mfeԑ ɔpepem mmienu kɔsi ɔpepem mmiԑnsa no daa no adi maa yԑhunuu sԑ nsa dwumadie ne adeԑ mu sosɔ na mmom ԑnyԑ nanteԑ.`
F2: `Fossil nsa mu dompe a adi mfe ɔpepem abien kɔ ɔpepem abiɛsa kyerɛ sɛnea wɔadane wɔn nsa locomotion kɔ manipulation.`
---------------------- (520) ----------------------
F1: `Ebinom gye di sԑ wobԑso daeԑ bebree wɔ berԑ a w’ani wɔ wo ho so na wonim sԑ woreso daeԑ no yԑ ahomete.`
F2: `Nnipa pii gye di sɛ artificially induced lucid dae a obi bɛso pii no bɛtumi ayɛ ɔbrɛ.`
---------------------- (521) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ nti a saa adeԑ yi ne ‘lucid dreams’ no a ԑretrԑ wɔ berԑ yi mu wɔ ‘REM states’ no mu no.`
F2: `Saa phenomenon yi boatae paa yi fi lucid dae a emu twe ɛwɔ REM siteeti ntam.`
---------------------- (522) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wonya ‘REMs’ kakra bi anadwo baako biara a, saa berԑ a wobԑda pa ara ama wo nnipadua no agye n’ahome no ntaa nsi mma nyԑ ɔhaw.`
F2: `REMs kakraa bi a ɛwɔ hɔ anadwo no, ne tebea a wɔwom a ɛma woda ankasa yiye no ne wo honam ɛrekɔva no ntaa mma wonnya ɔhaw.`
---------------------- (523) ----------------------
F1: `Wei yԑ ahomete te sԑ deԑ ԑsԑ sԑ wosɔre simma aduonu anaa aduasa biara hwԑ TV no.`
F2: `Wei yɛ berɛ te sɛnea ɛsɛ sɛ sima aduonu anaasɛ aduasa biara no wo sɔre hwɛ TV.`
---------------------- (524) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛso nsunsuansoɔ no gyina sԑdeԑ w’adwene no bԑyԑ saa daeԑ yi bi anadwo biara.`
F2: `Nsunsuanso no gyina sɛnea w’adwene no bɔ mmɔden dwene nneɛma ho anadwo ho da biara no.`
---------------------- (525) ----------------------
F1: `Efiti mfiase no ara na nneɛma ankɔ yiye mma Italifo no wɔ North Afrika. Italifo hyɛɛ ɔsatu ase June 10,1940. Saa naawɔtwe no ara na na Britainfo asraafo kuo 11th Hussars ako agye Capuzzo Aban wɔ Libia afa.`
F2: `Nnoɔma a ankɔ yiye amma Italifo wɔ Afrika Atifi fam fiti mfiase no pɛɛ. Nnawɔtwe so bere a Italifo suae ɔko wɔ bosome Ayɛwohumumɔ da a ɛtɔ so 10, 1940, na Britainfoɔ Hussarfoɔ a wɔto so 11 no agye Fɔɔto Capuzzo abɔ so wɔ Libya`
---------------------- (526) ----------------------
F1: `Britainfo no kɔtɛw Bardia apueifam na wɔkyeree Italifo no asraafo mfiriyɛfo panyin a na ɔtɔ so du, Ɔsahene Lastuɔɔi.`
F2: `Britainfoɔ no kɔtɛɛ wuram na wɔtow hyɛɛ Italifoɔ Asrafo no so ɔkyeree Ngyinia panyin a ɔtɔ so du, Gyɛneral Lastucci.`
---------------------- (527) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ Ayɛwohomumɔ 28 so no, Marshal Italo Balbo, Libia Amrado-Sahene ne nea na ɛda adi pefee sɛ obedi adeɛ, Mussolini, wui bere a na wɔn wimhyɛn no resi wɔ Tobruk. Wɔn asraafo tuo na ekum wɔn.`
F2: `Da a ɛtↄ so 28 wↄ Ayɛwohumumo bosome no, Srani panyin Italo Balbo, a na ɔyɛ kandini wɔ Libya na ɔno na ɔbɛdi Mussolini ade no wui ɛnam atuo a ɛto fii ne nkurↄfo no hↄ a wↄnhyɛ da wↄ bere a na ɔresi wɔ Tobruk.`
---------------------- (528) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnnɛyi agodie a wɔfrɛ no "fencing" no wɔ afa ahodoɔ bebree, efi adesuafoɔ a wɔwɔ sukuupɔn mu kosi wɔn a wɔreyɛ adwuma ne Olympic akansie mu.`
F2: `Fencing agurɔ a aba so no wɔdi wɔ gyinapɛn biara, fi asuafo a wɔ sua ade wɔ suapɔn mu kosi animdefo so ne Olympic akansi mu.`
---------------------- (529) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔtaa di saa agodie yi wɔ ntɔkwa kwan so, ɔgodifoɔ baako reko tia ne yɔnko.`
F2: `Nnipa abien abien na edi agurɔ no, ɔkofo biako ko tia ne yɔnko.`
---------------------- (530) ----------------------
F1: `Golf yɛ agodie bi a agodifoɔ no de mporibaa bɔ bɔɔlo no hyɛ tokuro mu.`
F2: `Golf yɛ agorɔ bi a wɔn a wɔbɔ no de aporibaa bɔ bɔɔlo kɔ hyɛ tokuro mu.`
---------------------- (531) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde ntokuro dunwɔtwe na edi agurɔ yei mpɛn pii, na agodifoɔ no firi aseɛ wɔ tokuro a edi kan wɔ agodibeaeɛ hɔ na wowie wɔ deɛ ɛtɔ soɔ dunwɔtwe no so.`
F2: `Wɔ bɔ ntokuro dunwɔtwe sɛ ɛyɛ ɔfa a ɛnam ne kwan so a, na wɔn a wɔbɔ no tae fi ase bɔ wɔ tokuro a edi kan no mu akansi no mu na wɔ wie wɔ tokuro a ɛto so dunwɔtwe no mu.`
---------------------- (532) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔgodifoɔ a obewie agorɔ no berɛ a ɔto n'aporibaa no mpɛn kakraa bi no na odi nkonim.`
F2: `Onipa a ɔbɔ dodow kakraa bi, anaa ɔhim aporibaa no kakraa bi de wie akansi no na ɔbedi nkonim.`
---------------------- (533) ----------------------
F1: `Wodi saa agorɔ yei wɔ ɛserɛsoɔ, na wotwa ɛserɛ a etwa tokuro no ho ahyia no ma ɛyɛ tiatiaa sene deɛ aka no na wɔfrɛ no ahabammono.`
