F2: `Wɔ bɔ wɔ sare so, na wɔ twa sare a ɛwɔ tokuro no ano no so ma no yɛ tia na wɔferɛ no ahabanmuno.`
---------------------- (534) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ nsrahwɛ a agye din paa ne deɛ ɛfa akwantuo ho a nnipa anigye ho: Anigyediɛ nsrahwɛ.`
F2: `Ebia nsrahwɛ ho nhwɛso a agye din paa no yɛ nea nkurɔfo de toto akwantu ho no: Ɔhome ho nsrahwɛ.`
---------------------- (535) ----------------------
F1: `Yei ne berɛ a nkurɔfoɔ kɔ mmeaeɛ a ɛda nso wɔ wɔn daa daa asetena mu de home na wɔde gye wɔn ani.`
F2: `Wei yɛ bere a nkurɔfo kɔ beae bi a ɛda nsow wɔ wɔn daa-daa abrabɔ ho kɔ gye wɔn ahome na wogye wɔn ani.`
---------------------- (536) ----------------------
F1: `Mpoano, agodi beaeɛ ne beaeɛ a wosi ntomadan da mu yɛ beaeɛ a anigyediɛ nsrahwɛfoɔ tae kɔ.`
F2: `Mpoano, turo ne nsraban mmeae yɛ mmeae a agyi din a nkurɔfo a wɔ kɔ nsrahwɛ no tae kɔ hwɛ hɔ.`
---------------------- (537) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ onii a ɔrekɔ beaeɛ bi no botaeɛ ne sɛ obesua beaeɛ no abakɔsɛm ne wɔn amammerɛ a, ende na wɔfrɛ saa nsrahwɛ yei sɛ amammerɛ nsrahwɛ.`
F2: `Sɛ atrimpɔw a obi de kɔ sera beae bi ne sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ohu beae no abakɔsɛm ne n’amammerɛ a ɛnde nsrahwɛ a ɛte saa no wɔferɛ no amammerɛ ho nsrahwɛ.`
---------------------- (538) ----------------------
F1: `Nsrahwɛfoɔ tumi kɔsra mmeaeɛ a agye din ahodoɔ wɔ kuro pɔtee bi mu anaasɛ wɔpaw sɛ wɔde wɔn adwene besi beaeɛ baako pɛ soɔ.`
F2: `Nsrahwɛfo no betumi akɔsera mmeae titiriw ahorow wɔ ɔman pɔteebi so anaa wɔbetumi apaw sɛ wɔbɛ ma wɔn ani akɔ beae biako pɛ so.`
---------------------- (539) ----------------------
F1: `Berɛ a wohunuu deɛ ɛrekɔ soɔ no, atukɔtenafoɔ no ma wɔde asraafoɔ no bi bɛkaa wɔn ho.`
F2: `Bere a Ɔman a na edi ɔman foforo no so no huu nea ɛrekɔso no, wɔferɛɛ se mmagum mera.`
---------------------- (540) ----------------------
F1: `Asraafoɔ a wɔbɛkaa wɔn a wodi anim no ho no ne 1st ne 3rd Hampshire asraafoɔ kuo a wɔyɛ mmarima 200, a na wɔhyɛ Colonel John Stark ne James Reed (a wɔbɛyɛɛ asahene) aseɛ.`
F2: `Asraafo dɔm a na wɔrehyɛ animkɔ gyinabea no so no na 1st ne 3rd Hampshire Foforo no dɔm a mmerima 200 wɔ mu no ka ho bi, wɔ Asafoahene John Stark ne James Reed ase (akyire no wɔn baanu no nyinaa bɛyɛɛ asafoahenekunini).`
---------------------- (541) ----------------------
F1: `Stark mmarima no gyinaa beaeɛ a atukɔtenafoɔ no wↄ wↄn atifi fam wↄ ɛban no ho.`
F2: `Stark mmerima no gyinaa wɔn gyinabea wɔ ban a na ɛwɔ Ɔman a na edi ɔman foforo so no gyinabea no nkyɛn wɔ atififam akyiri.`
---------------------- (542) ----------------------
F1: `Berɛ a asorɔkye no baa fam no, ɛmaa kwan bɛdaa Mystic asubɔtene no ho wɔ asase a na nsuo atwa ho ahyia ne fa bi atifiapueeɛ mantam hɔ. Ntɛm ara na wɔde aboɔ yɛɛ ban tiatia bi trɛɛ wɔn hyeɛ mu kosii mpoano ketewa bi wɔ nsuo no ano atifi fam.`
F2: `Bere a asorɔkye a aba fam no maa kwan bɛ daa Mystic Asubɔntene no ho wɔ peninsula a ɛwɔ atifi-apue fam no ho no, wɔ yɛɛ ntɛm de ɔbo ban tiatia terɛɛ ban no mu kɔɔ atififam akyiri hɔ wɔ nsuo no ano wɔ po ano ketewa no so.`
---------------------- (543) ----------------------
F1: `Gridley ne Stark de dua a ne tenten bɛyɛ anammɔn 100 (30 m) sii ɛban no anim na ɔhyɛe sɛ obiara ntu tuo kosi sɛ wobewie deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ.`
F2: `Gridley anaa Stark de dua a ne tenten bɛyɛ anamɔn 100 (30m) ato ban no anim na ɔhyɛɛ sɛ mma obiara ntow tuo kosi sɛ ɔman no asraafo kuo a wɔdi mu no hyɛ wɔn ansa.`
---------------------- (544) ----------------------
F1: `Na Amerikafoɔ no tirimupɔ ne sɛ wɔbɛto ahyɛ wɔn so wɔ akwan ahodoɔ mmieɛnsa soɔ denam toto a wɔbɛtoto wɔn nneɛma yie.`
F2: `Amarica atrimpɔw no gyinaa sɛ wɔnam ɔkwan biako so bɛ to ahyɛ wɔn so efiri akwan ahorow mmiɛnsa so.`
---------------------- (545) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔsahene John Cadwalder bɛto ahyɛ Britainfoɔ asraafoɔ a wɔrebɔ ban wɔ Bordentown de atwe wɔn adwene firi hɔ, sɛdeɛ wobetumi asi mmoa biara a ɛbɛba ho kwan.`
F2: `Ɔsahene John Cadwalder bɛtow ahyɛ Britain asraafodɔm a wɔwɔ Bordentown so de atwe wɔn adwene efiri ade titiriw no so, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔ be siw mmagum biara kwan.`
---------------------- (546) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔsahene James Ewing de asraafoɔ 700 betwa esubontene no wɔ Trenton Ferry, na wɔde wɔn nsa bɛto nsamsoɔ a ɛwɔ nsuka no so na woasi atamfoɔ no asraafoɔ no kwan na woantumi annwane.`
F2: `Ɔsahene James Ewing de ɔmanmufo a wɔn atetew wɔn tesɛ asraafo no mu 700 betwa asubɔntene a ɛwɔ Trenton Ferry no, wɔde wɔn nsa bɛto ɛtwene a ɛwɔ Assunpink Creek no atifi no na wɔbɛsiw atamfo no asraafodɔm biara kan sɛ wɔbɛ guan.`
---------------------- (547) ----------------------
F1: `Asraafoɔ dɔm a wobedi ako no ankasa betwa asubontene no akwansini nkron wɔ Trenton atifi fam, na wɔbɛkyɛ wɔn mu ekuo mmienu, kuo baako hyɛ Greene aseɛ na baako nso hyɛ Sullivan aseɛ, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛto ahyɛ wɔn so ansa na ahemadakye aduru.`
F2: `Asraafokuw no mu titiriw a mmerima 2,400 wɔ mu no betwa asubɔntene no akɔ akwansin akrɔn wɔ Trenton atififam, na afei wɔbɛkyɛ wɔn mu mmienu na kuw biako bɛwɔ Greene ase na biako nso awɔ Sullivan ase, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛ tow ahyɛ wɔn so ahemadakye.`
---------------------- (548) ----------------------
F1: `Esiane sɛ wɔasesa mmirikatuo no firi anan mu nkyekyemu baako kɔ ɛfa no nti, ama ahohyɛsoɔ hu abehia sene ahoɔhare.`
F2: `Nsakrae a efiri nkyɛmu anan a aka wɔ akwansini fa mu mmirikatu no mu no, ahoɔhare bɛyɛ ade a ɛho nhia na amanehunumu boasetɔ bɛyɛ ade titiriw a ɛho hia paa.`
---------------------- (549) ----------------------
F1: `Ne saa nti ɛsɛ sɛ obi a wakwadare mmirika a wotu no akwansini fa no, tumi de sima mmienu so nkonim, ɛsɛ sɛ ne ho yɛ hare deɛ nanso ɛsɛ sɛ otumi hyɛ ne ho so wɔ akwansideɛ ahodoɔ a obehyia no mu.`
F2: `Ɛwom s ɛ obi a ɔdi kan wɔ akwansini fa mu mmirikatu mu no betumi de simma mmienu awia a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ obi a ne ho yɛ hare paa, nanso ɛsɛ ɔnya amanehunumu boasetɔ wɔ asiane nyinaa mu.`
---------------------- (550) ----------------------
F1: `Ansa na mmirikatuo berɛ no bɛhyɛ aseɛ no, nsiesie pa a wobetumi ayɛ ne sɛ wode wo ho bɛhyɛ mmirika a wotu fa kuro mu awɔbrɛ mu na wode apɔmutenetene a ɛyɛ ma nipadua ne fa ewɔ soro no ka ho.`
F2: `Mmirika a wɔtu fa aman mu wɔ awɔbere mo, ne apomuteɛteɛ ho dwumedie a wɔyɛ ma nipadua no fa a ɛwɔ suro no a wɔka bɔmu no, yɛ ɔkwan pa a wɔ de yɛ ahoboa ma mmirikatu bere no.`
---------------------- (551) ----------------------
F1: `Nnuane pa a yedie nkoa rentumi mma yɛnkɔ kan wɔ akansie mu, nanso ebetumi aboa akansifoɔ a wɔyɛ afoforɔ no apɔmuden.`
F2: `Aduandi a wo be didi yie nkoa rentumi mma wommɔ wo ho mmɔden yie wɔ akansi mu, nanso ebetumi aboa akansifo nkumaa ma wɔn apɔwmuden akɔ yie.`
---------------------- (552) ----------------------
F1: `Akwahosan a edi mu, nsuo a yɛtaa nom ne te a yɛbɛte sɛdeɛ nnuru a yɛde si nnuane anan mu no yɛ adwuma fa no bɛboa mmirikatufoɔ ma wɔakɔ wɔn anim na wɔn ani agye agodie no ho.`
F2: `Wɔn apɔmuden a wɔbɛma akari pɛ, nsuo a wɔbɛtae anom, ne nnuane nnuru nsiananmu ho ntease a edi mu a wɔbenya no betumi aboa akansifo ama wɔn mmɔdenbɔ anya nkɔanim na anigye a wɔwɔ ma agudie no nso akɔ anim.`
---------------------- (553) ----------------------
F1: `Amirikatuo a ɛnyɛ tenten pii yɛ akansie a ne boɔ nhyɛda nyɛ den; nanso, nkorɔfoɔ wɔ adwene bi wɔ nneɛma kakra a ehia na ama wɔatumi asi akan no.`
F2: `Kwansini ntam mmirikatu yɛ agudie a ne bo nyɛ den; nanso, nnsɛm a ɛnnyɛ nokware pii wɔ hɔ a ɛfa adwinnade a ɛho hia sɛ wonya na ama wo atumi de wo ho ahyɛ saa agudie yi mu.`
---------------------- (554) ----------------------
F1: `Wobetumi atɔ ɛho akadeɛ sɛdeɛ wo berɛ a wohia, nanso ɛrenhyɛda nya nsunsuansoɔ biara wɔ deɛ wobɛyɛ no so.`
F2: `Wobetumi atɔ neama a wo hia no, nanso emu pii benya nkɛntɛnso kakra anaa ɛrennya nkɛntɛnso biara wɔ wo mmɔdenmɔ so.`
---------------------- (555) ----------------------
F1: `Agodifoɔ no bɛte nka sɛ wohia akadeɛ bi ɛberɛ a saa ade korɔ no mfa mfasoɔ papa biara mmrɛ no.`
F2: `Akansifo betumi ate nka sɛ wɔ hia ade bi abere mpo a ɛmfa mfaso biara ɛmma wɔn.`
---------------------- (556) ----------------------
F1: `Yebetumi aka sɛ atom yɛ nneɛma a eka bom yɛ matter no deɛ edi mu akotene paa.`
F2: `Wɔbu atɔm sɛ ɛyɛ ade a ɛho hia wɔ ade biara mu no mu biako.`
---------------------- (557) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛdeɛ Bohr nhwɛsoɔ a wɔatwa no tia no kyerɛ no, ɛyɛ adeɛ a ɛyɛ nwonworann paa, a electron no redi nucleus no a ɛwɔ ne mfinfini no ho kyinhyia te sɛ sɛdeɛ okyinsoroma twa owia no ho hyia no. Hwɛ mfonini 1.1.`
F2: `Bohr nhwɛso a asete nyɛ den no kyerɛ sɛ, ɛyɛ ade a ne ntease yɛ den, a ɛwɔ nucleus mfinfini a elentron pii twa ho hyia, biribi te sɛ sɛnea akyinsroma no twa owia no ho no - hwɛ mfonini 1.1.`
---------------------- (558) ----------------------
F1: `Nneɛma nketenkete mmienu ɛna ɛbom yɛ nucleus no - neutrons ne protons.`
F2: `Neama mmienu na ɛka bɔm na ɛyɛ nucleus no - neutron pii ne proton pii.`
---------------------- (559) ----------------------
F1: `Proton no wɔ anyinam tumi a ɛyɛ positive na neutron no nni tumi biara. Electron no wɔ anyinam tumi a ɛyɛ negative.`
F2: `Proton pii wɔ electric charge a ɛyɛ kotope abere a neutron pii nni charge biara. Electron pii no wɔ electric charge a ɛnyɛ kotope.`
---------------------- (560) ----------------------
F1: `Ansa na wobɛhwɛ opirafo no, ɛsɛ sɛ wodi kan hwɛ beaeɛ a ɔda no yie na woamfa wo ho anto asiane mu.`
F2: `Ansa na wobɛhwɛ onipa a wapira no, ɛsɛ sɛ wodi kan hwehwɛ beae hɔ yie de hwɛ sɛ asiane biara nni hɔ.`
---------------------- (561) ----------------------
F1: `Bere a worebɛn no no, ɛsɛ sɛ wohwɛ beaeɛ a opirafo no da ne biribiara a ebetumi ayɛ asiane nso.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ wohwɛ sɛnea onipa a wapira no da hɔ no bere a worebɛn no ne asiane biara a ebetumi asi ho nsɛnkyerɛne.`
---------------------- (562) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wo a worekɔboa opirafo no nso pira a, eyi bɛma tebea no asɛe koraa.`
F2: `Sɛ wopira bere a woreboa obi a, wobɛma neama agye nsam koraa.`
---------------------- (563) ----------------------
F1: `Nhwehwɛmu ama ada edi sɛ berɛ a obi abotow, ehu aka no na ɔma adeɛ yɛ hu sene sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ no na ɛde ɛyeaa ne mmerɛwyɛ ba wɔn a wɔn akyi ase yɛ wɔn ya no mu.`
F2: `Nhwehwɛmu no huu sɛ adwenemhaw, ehu ne atoyerɛnkyɛm dii ayɔnkofa a ɛda ɔyaw ne dɛmdi a ɛwɔ sisi akyi mu yaw a wɔn a wɔyare saa yare no wɔ no ntam asɛm.`
---------------------- (564) ----------------------
F1: `Nsunsuansoɔ a wɔn a wɔma adeɛ yɛ hu sene sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ no nya no na ɛma wɔhyehyɛɛ nnawɔtwe biara PA nhyiamu no na ɛnyɛ abotow ne ehu ntira.`
F2: `Atoyerɛnkyɛm ho nsonsuanso nkoaa na ɛnhwehwɛ sɛ wobekɔ PA asetra a wɔn ahyehyɛ no bere biara na ɛnyɛ adwenemhaw ne ehu.`
---------------------- (565) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ yɛreka adwene pa a wonni wɔ ɛyeaa ho a ɛne sɛ wobehu nsonsonoe a eda ɛyeaa koankorɔ ne honam yeaa esaine ahokeka no a, wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma berɛ nyinaa no‪ behia mmoa yie.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔyɛ daadaa dwumedie no hiaa mmoa pii wɔ adwene bɔne a na wɔwɔ fa nsonsonoe a ɛwɔ ɔyaw a ɛwɔ atenka koanokoro mu ne ateetee a ɛwɔ honam mu ahokeka mu no.`
---------------------- (566) ----------------------
F1: `Hunu a yehunu adeɛ no gyina yɛn akwaa a ɛma yehunu adeɛ no anaa aniwa no so.`
F2: `Ade hu, anaa sɛ wobetumi ahu ade no gyina aniso adeyɛ ho akwanso atenka akwaa no so anaa ani no.`
---------------------- (567) ----------------------
F1: `Nneɛma ahodoɔ a ɛda nsow na wɔde ayɛ aniwa no, na emu ntiaseɛ yɛtumi yɛ nworanworan denam nkwaboa no ahiadeɛ so.`
F2: `Ani sibea ahorow pii na ɛwɔ hɔ, a efiri sɛnea ɛyɛ nwonworann mu na agyina nkwanoa no ahiade so.`
---------------------- (568) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛdeɛ wɔyɛɛ emu biara ɛnna ahoɔden soronko ɛwɔ, ehu han ahodoɔ ntɛm na ne namyɛ nso nyɛ pɛ. Afei nso, ɛsono deɛ ebehunu biara ne sɛdeɛ ɛbɛte aseɛ na sɛ ɛbɛyɛ adwuma yie a, ehia nɔma ahodoɔ.`
F2: `Sibea ahorow a ɛwɔ hɔ no wɔ akwan ahorow a wɔtumi de yɛ adi, wɔwɔ wave-length ahorow ho atenka ne anoden ho dibeae ahorow, afei nso wɔ hia akwan ahorow a wɔfa so nya biribi ho ntease ne nkontahyɛde ahorow na w,ɔde ayɛ adwuma wɔ ɔkwan pa so.`
---------------------- (569) ----------------------
F1: `Population yɛ abɔdeɛ no dodoɔ a wɔn nnyinaa te asaase ne fa pɔtee bi so.`
F2: `Ɔman bi mu fo yɛ nkwanmmoa titiriw bi kuw a wɔwɔ beae titiriw bi mu no.`
---------------------- (570) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ akorankoro nnyinaa a wɔte asaase no beae pɔtee bi no di nsɛ paa wɔ nipadua no su ahodoɔ a ani tumi hu ho a, wɔfrɛ wɔn abɔdeɛ a wɔn suban yɛ baako.`
F2: `Sɛ ankorankoro a wɔwɔ ɔman bi mu no di nsɛ wɔ su titiriw bi mu a wɔferɛ wɔn monomorphic.`
---------------------- (571) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ akorankoro biara da su pɔtee bi adi akwan ahodoɔ ahodoɔ so a, wɔfrɛ wɔn abɔde a wɔn suban gu ahodoɔ.`
F2: `Sɛ ankorankoro no da su a ɛnnsɛ adi a wɔferɛ wɔn polymorphic.`
---------------------- (572) ----------------------
F1: `Ntatea bom sɛ ekuo nante na wɔhome wɔ akwan ahorow pii so.`
F2: `Asraafo ntatea kuw nantew na wɔyɛ berebu wɔ mmere ahorow mu ntwahohyia mu nso.`
---------------------- (573) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ a wɔretwa kwan no, ntatea yi nante anwumerɛ na wɔhome bereɛ a ade akye.`
F2: `Wɔ nomadic ntwahohyia bere mu no, asraafo ntatea nantew anadwo na wɔgyina gye wɔ ahome adekyee.`
---------------------- (574) ----------------------
F1: `Kuo no fi ase twa kwan berɛ a aduane a ɛwɔ hɔ no so ateɛ. Eduru saa berɛ yi a, da biara kuo no yɛ esie ahodoɔ na ɛnkyɛ na wɔasesa no.`
F2: `Ntatea kuw no firi nomadic ntwahohyia bere yi ase sɛ wɔn nnuan a wɔwɔ no so tew a. Wɔ saa ntwahohyia bere yi mu no, ntatea kuw no yɛ berebu a ɛntena hɔ nnkyɛ na wɔ sesa no dabiara da.`
---------------------- (575) ----------------------
F1: `Saa akwantwa anaa nanteɛ yi di bɛyɛ nna 17 berɛ biara.`
F2: `Saa nomadic basabasayɛ anaa nante yi tena hɔ wɔ nna bɛyɛ 17 mu.`
---------------------- (576) ----------------------
F1: `Dɛn ne nkwammoaa? Asɛmfua nkwammoaa firi Latin asɛmfua "cella", a deɛ ɛkyerɛ ne "ɔdan ketewa bi", na wodii kan de saa asɛmfua yi dii dwuma berɛ a na obi a ɔhwɛ nneɛma nketenkete a aniwa ntumi nhnuu mu no rehwɛ sɛdeɛ wɔahyehyɛ nsatire no mu no.`
F2: `Dɛn ade ne nkwanmmoa? Asɛmfua nkwanmmoa firi Latin asɛmfua "cella" mu, a ɛkyerɛ "dan ketewa" na wɔdii kan nya firii nsati a wɔde hyɛɛ afiri a wɔde hwɛ neama nketewa paa no ase no.`
---------------------- (577) ----------------------
F1: `Nkwammoaa no ne ade titiriw a abɔdeɛ a nkwa wɔ mu nkwa nyinaa gyina so, na abɔdeɛ nyinaa wɔ nkwammoaa yi baako anaa deɛ ɛboro saa.`
F2: `Nkwanmmoa no yɛ ade biako a ɛwɔ neama a nkwa wɔm mu, na nkwanmmoa biako anaa mmienu na ɛka bom yɛ neama a nkwa wɔmu nyinaa.`
---------------------- (578) ----------------------
F1: `Nkwammoa ho hia paa titire berɛ a yeresua nkwa ho adeɛ no, kyerɛ sɛ, wɔtaa frɛ wɔn "ntayaa a wɔde hyehyɛɛ nkwa".`
F2: `Nkwanmmoa yɛ fapem na ɛho hia paa wɔ nkwa ho adesua mu, kyerɛ sɛ, wɔtae ferɛ wɔn "dufɔkye a wɔde si nkwa ".`
---------------------- (579) ----------------------
F1: `Amemene no hwɛ ma biribiara kɔ so pɛpɛɛpɛ wɔ nipadua no mu. Na ɛyɛ saa berɛ a ɛde anyinam nketenkete fa ntini no mu na ama mogya adi aforosiane a biribiara nsi ne kwan wɔ nipadua no mu.`
F2: `Nkate a ɛwɔ nnipadua mu a ɛkanyan no na ɛyɛ adwuma no kura homeostasis so denam atenka a apia fa nipadua no nyinaa mu na ama mogya atumi edi afrosane yie a hwee rensiw ne kwan.`
---------------------- (580) ----------------------
F1: `Anyinam nketenkete a ɛfa ntini no mu no tumi kɔ ntɛm paa wɔ nipadua no mu na eyi bɔ nipadua no ho ban fi ɛyea biara a ɛbɛsɔre ho.`
F2: `Saa nkate a apia fa nipadua mu no betumi de ntɛmpɛ aterɛw afa nipadua no mu na ɛboa bɔ nipadua no ho ban firi mpo bi a ebetumi aba mu no ho.`
---------------------- (581) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wode atɔyerɛnkyɛm ahodoɔ toto ho a, mframa gyampantrudu si wɔ beaeɛ ketewa bi nanso ɛsɛe biribiara a ɛda ne kwan mu no.`
F2: `Ahum tu wɔ beae ketewa bi na ɛnte sɛ mframa a ɛbɔ dennenen, nanso ebetumi sɛi biribiara a ɛwɔ ne kwan mu.`
---------------------- (582) ----------------------
F1: `Mframa gyampantrudu tutu nnua a esisi hɔ, ɛwae nnua a ɛbobɔ dan so, na ɛma kaa so to kɔ wiem. Mframa gyampantrudu a ano yɛ den paa no mu ɔha mu nkyem mmienu pɛ tumi di boro nnɔnhwere mmiɛnsa.`
F2: `Ahum tu nnua ase, etu taabo firi adan ho, na ɛma ahyɛn tu kɔ wim. Ahum a edi awu ɔha mu nkyekyɛmu mu mmienu no mo tena hɔ bɛboro nnɔnhwerew mmiɛnsa.`
---------------------- (583) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ ahum akɛse paa mu no, mframa no anoɔden no tumi duru 480 km/h (133m/s; 300 mph).`
F2: `Saa mframa a ɛbɔ dennenen a ɛho yɛ hu yi bɔ bɛyɛ ko du 480 km/h (133 m/s; 300 mph).`
---------------------- (584) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa akɔso ayɛ ahwehwɛniwa na aboa ma wɔahu nneɛma nketenkete mfeɛ mpempem pii nie.`
F2: `Nnipa yɛ nhwehwɛ na wɔde nhwehwɛ na ɛma neama yɛ akɛse bɛyɛ mfe mpem mpem beberee.`
---------------------- (585) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, wodii kan yɛɛ ahwehwɛniwa a wɔde hwɛ wiem ankasa wɔ Europa wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 16 no awieiɛ no mu hɔ.`
F2: `Nanso, adwinnade a wɔde hwɛ neama wɔ akyirikyiri no na wɔyɛ wɔ Europe wɔ 16th century akyiri.`
---------------------- (586) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde ahwehwɛniwa ahodoɔ mmienu na ɛbom yɛ saa ahwehwɛniwa a wɔde hwɛ wiem no na etumi ama nneɛma a ɛwowɔ akyire no abɛn na ayɛ akɛseɛ nso.`
F2: `Saa adwinnade a wɔde hwɛ neama wɔ akyirikyiri yi kaa nhwehwɛ mmienu boomu na ɛtwee neama bɛne na ɛyɛɛ akɛse nso.`
---------------------- (587) ----------------------
F1: `Adwuma a yɛyɛ no bɛnkorɔ no kyerɛ sɛ, sɛ nnipa dodoɔ no ara nya so mfasoɔ a wobetumi anya pii berɛ tiawa mu sɛ wɔyɛ pɛsɛmenkomenya a. Ɛno nti adufudepɛ ne pɛsɛmenkomenya ne yɛn bɛtena daa.`
F2: `Anibere ne pɛsɛmenkomenya bɛwɔ yɛn nkyɛn bere nyinaa na ne nkabom a ɛne sɛ sɛ fa kɛse nya so mfaso a wɔbenya pii afiri mu wɔ mmere tia bi mu sɛ woyɛ neama wɔ pɛsɛmenkomenya kwan so a.`
---------------------- (588) ----------------------
F1: `Yɛhwɛ kwan sɛ, nnipa dodoɔ no ara behunu sɛ deɛ ɛbɛboa ne sɛ wɔne afoforɔ bɛbom ayɛ adwuma.`
F2: `Wɔ anidaso mu no, nnipa pii bɛba abɛ hu sɛ gyinae a ɛbɛ boa wɔn mmere tenten mu ne sɛ wɔne afoforo bɛyɛ adwuma abɔ mu.`
---------------------- (589) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa pii daeɛ so ne sɛ wobetumi atukwan akɔhwɛ nsoroma foforɔ ne wiase foforɔ, ebinom dwennwen dea ɛwɔ hɔ ho ebinom gye di sɛ amanfrafoɔ anaa adeɛ foforɔ a nkwa wɔ mu na ɛwɔ okyinsoroma foforɔ bi so.`
F2: `Nkurɔfo pii so da a nnipa betumi atukwan akɔ nsoroma foforo so na wɔn akɔ hwɛ wiase foforo no, ebinom dwennwen nea ɛwɔ hɔ ho ebinom gyedi sɛ amanfrafo anaa ade foforo a nkwa wɔ mu te nsoroma foforo so.`
---------------------- (590) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, sɛ wei bɛsi mpo a ɛbɛkyɛ paa ansa na esi. Nsoroma no ntɛm atete ma akwansin ɔpepemhuhaa na ɛda nsoroma a wɔye "efipamfoɔ" ntam.`
F2: `Nanso, sɛ eyi besi mpo a ɛnde ɛbɛkyɛ paa ansa na esi. Nsroma no ntam atete wɔ soro hɔ ma akwansin apepepepem na ɛwɔ nsoroma a wɔyɛ ‘afipamfo’ ntam.`
---------------------- (591) ----------------------
F1: `Ebia dakorɔ, wo nanankansewanom begyina amanfrafoɔ wiase bi so na wɔbɛ dwennwene wɔn nananom ho?`
F2: `Ebia da koro bi, wo mma nananom bɛgyina amanfrafo wiase bi so adwennwen wɔn nananom a wɔtenaa ase tete no ho?`
---------------------- (592) ----------------------
F1: `Nkwanmoa pii na ɛwɔ mmoa mu. Wɔdi biribiara na ɛyam no wɔ nipadua no mu. Mmoa pii tumi keka wɔn ho.`
F2: `Nkwanmoa pii na ɛwɔ mmoa mu. Wɔ di neama na wɔ yam wɔ wɔn nipadua no mu. Mmoa pii tumi keka wɔn ho.`
---------------------- (593) ----------------------
F1: `Mmoa nkoaa na wɔ wɔ adwene (nanso ɛnyɛ wɔn nyinaa na wɔ wɔ bi; jellyfish, sɛ nhwesoɔ no, enni adwene).`
F2: `Mmoa nkoaa na wɔwɔ adwene (nanso ɛnyɛ mmoa nyinaa na wɔwɔ bi; jellyfish, sɛ nhwɛso no, wɔnni adwene).`
---------------------- (594) ----------------------
F1: `Yehu mmoa wɔ wiase yi mu baabiara. Wotutu fam, wodware wɔ ɛpo mu, na wotu wɔ ewiemu.`
F2: `Mmoa wɔ wiase yi mu babiara. Wɔtutu fam, wɔguare wɔ po mu. na wotu wɔ wim.`
---------------------- (595) ----------------------
F1: `Nkwanmoa yɛ abɔdeɛ (nnoɔma) a nkwa wɔmu fa ketewa bi.`
F2: `Nkwanmoa yɛ abɔde (neama) a nkwa wɔmu no fa ketekete bi.`
---------------------- (596) ----------------------
F1: `Nkwammoa (cells) fi Latin asɛmfua cella mu a ɛkyerɛ ɔdan ketewa.`
F2: `Asɛmfua nkwanmoa firi Latin asɛmfua cella mu a ɛkyerɛ dan ketewa.`
---------------------- (597) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wohwɛ nkwammoa wɔ microscope aseɛ a, wobehu sɛ ahinanan anaa kukuruwa na ayɛ no ma.`
F2: `Sɛ wohwe abɔde a nkwa wɔmu wɔ anwinade a wɔdehwɛ neama nketenkete ase a, wobɛhu sɛ ahinanan anaa bɔɔlo na ayɛ no ma.`
---------------------- (598) ----------------------
F1: `Abɔdeɛ a nkwa wɔmu ho adesuani, Robert Hooke a ofi England, de microscope huu ahinanan nketewa a ɛwɔ cork mu.`
F2: `Robert Hooke, a ɔsua abɔde ho ade a ɔfiri England, no huu ahinanan nketewa wɔ ntuaano mu wɔ anwinade a wɔdehwɛ neama nketenkete ase.`
---------------------- (599) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔte sɛ adan. Ɔno ne nipa a odi kan a ohuu nkwanmoa a wɔn awuwu.`
F2: `Na ɛte sɛ adanmu. Ɔno ne nipa a odi kan a ɔhuu nkwanmoa a wɔn awuwu.`
---------------------- (600) ----------------------
F1: `Nnoɔma ne nnoɔma afrafra betumi asesa efiri tebea baako mu akɔ foforɔ mu a ɛnsesa.`
F2: `Nnoɔma ne neama afrafra betumi afiri tebeae biako mu akɔ foforo mu a ɛrensesa sɛnea ɛte.`
---------------------- (601) ----------------------
F1: `Nitrogen yɛ ogyamframa a ɛsan tesɛ nitrogen a ɛsen. Ne nsesen mu no emu yɛ duru nanso emu nnoɔma no yɛpɛ.`
F2: `Nitrogen a ɛyɛ mframagya no daso wɔ su tesɛ nitrogen a ɛsen. Wɔ tebeae a ɛsen mu no ɛyɛ duru nanso molecules da so te sɛnea ɛte.`
---------------------- (602) ----------------------
F1: `Nsuo nso yɛ nhwɛsoɔ foforɔ. Hydrogen atoms ne oxygen atoms na ɛwɔ nsuo mu.`
F2: `Nsu yɛ nhwɛso foforo. Neama afrafraa a ɛwɔ nsu mu no yɛ hydrogen atɔm mmienu ne oxygen atɔm biako.`
---------------------- (603) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwɔ saa nhyehyɛ no pɛpɛɛpɛ sɛ ɛyɛ ogyamframa, dea ɛsen, anaa nea ɛyɛ den.`
F2: `Saa ara na ɛte wɔ molecular yɛbeae mu ɛmfa ho sɛ ɛyɛ mframagya, ade a ɛsen, anaa ade a ɛyɛ den.`
---------------------- (604) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ sɛdeɛ ɛte betumi asesa no, n'aduru mu deɛ ɛnsesa.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ ne yɛbea a yɛhu no betumi asesa no, ne nnuru mu yɛbeae no te sɛnea ɛte.`
---------------------- (605) ----------------------
F1: `Mmerɛ yɛ adeɛ a ɛwɔ yɛnkyɛn aberɛ biara, na ɛka deaɛ yɛyɛ biara, nanso yɛntumi nte aseɛ.`
F2: `Mmere yɛ ade a atwa yen ho ahyia , na ɛnya biribiara so nsunsuanso, nanso ɛyɛ den sɛ yɛbɛte ase.`
---------------------- (606) ----------------------
F1: `Nyamesomfoɔ, nyansapɛfoɔ ne nyansahufoɔ de mfe boro ɔpepem na asua mmerɛ ho adeɛ.`
F2: `Nyamesomfo, nyansapɛfo, ne abɔde mu nyansapɛfo de mfe apepem pii na asua mmere ho ade.`
---------------------- (607) ----------------------
F1: `Yehu sɛ mmerɛ yɛ nnoɔma a esisi mmɔho abakɔsɛm a efi nnɛ berɛ mu de kosi tete berɛ mu.`
F2: `Yɛnya mmere ho osuahu sɛ neama a ɛsisi tuatua so efiri daakye mu de fa nnɛ mu de kosi bere a atwam mu.`
---------------------- (608) ----------------------
F1: `Mmerɛ nso yɛ sɛdeɛ yɛ de nnoɔma a esisi bɛtoto sɛdeɛ ɛkyɛ (tenten) ho.`
F2: `Mmere san nso yɛ sɛnea yɛde dwumadi be tenten (ade tenten) toto foforo ho.`
---------------------- (609) ----------------------
F1: `Wo ankasa wobetumi asusu sɛdeɛ mmerɛ kɔ sɛ wohwɛ sɛdeɛ nnoɔma pɔtee sisi a. Nnoɔma pɔtee a esisi ntuatua so yɛ nnoɔma a ɛkɔ so sisi bere ne bere mu.`
F2: `W’ankasa wobetumi ahyɛ mmere a ɛretwam agyirae denam hwɛ a wobɛhwɛ sɛnea dwumedi bi sisi tuatua so. Dwumedi a esisi tuatua so no yɛ ade a esi na ɛsan si biom.`
---------------------- (610) ----------------------
F1: `Kɔmputa a ɛwɔ hɔ nnɛ no wɔde yɛ sini nketewa ne mfoni ho adwuma.`
F2: `Kɔmputa a ɛwɔ hɔ nnɛ no wɔde danedane mfonini ne video mu.`
---------------------- (611) ----------------------
F1: `Sinitwa a aba soɔ no wɔde kɔmputa na ɛyɛ, na saa sinitwa a ɛte saa nu woyi no paa wɔ TV so ne sini ahodoɔ mu.`
F2: `Sinitwa a ɛyɛ kuntann no wobetumi ayɛ wɔ kɔmputa so, na sinitwa a ɛte saa no wɔde yɛ adwuma wɔ TV ne sini mu.`
---------------------- (612) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔtae de kɔmputa ahodoɔ a aba so no na etwa nnwom na wɔkeka ngyigyeɛ ahodoɔ bɔmu.`
F2: `Wɔtae de kɔmputa a ɛyɛ kuntann na etwa nnwom na wɔkeka ngyigye ahorow bɔ mu.`
---------------------- (613) ----------------------
F1: `Efiti bere tenten wɔ mfe ɔpepem akrɔn ne mfe ɔpepem aduonu bere mu no, na wɔgyedi sɛ nnipa a wɔdii kan tenaa New Zealand yɛ Maorifoɔ, a na nnoma akɛseɛ a wɔferɛ wɔn moas na wɔkyere wɔn sɛ wɔkɔ ahayɔ a.`
F2: `Efiri bere tenten wɔ mfe ɔpepem akrɔn ne mfe ɔpepem aduonu bere mu no, na wɔgyedii sɛ nnipa a wɔdii kan tenaa New Zealand no yɛ Maorifo, a na nnoma akɛse a wɔferɛ wɔn moas na wɔkyere wɔn sɛ wɔkɔ ahayɛ a.`
---------------------- (614) ----------------------
F1: `Nsɛm no san kyerɛɛ sɛ Maorifoɔ no to fii Polynesia wɔ Great Fleet na wɔ bɛgyee New Zealand fii Moriorifoɔ no nsam, na wɔbɛtee akuafoɔ asafo.`
F2: `Nsɛm no san kyerɛɛ sɛ Maorifo no to firi Polynesia wɔ Great Fleet na wɔ bɛgyee New Zealand firi Moriorifo no nsam, na wɔbɛtee akuafo asafo.`
---------------------- (615) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso no, adanseɛ foforɔ kyerɛ sɛ na Moriorifoɔ no yɛ Maori asaase no fa kɛseɛ mu foɔ a wɔfi New Zealand kɔɔ Chathan Nsuopoɔ so, na wɔfii aseɛ yɛɛ wɔn nnoɔma foforɔ, amammerɛ a asomdwo wɔmu.`
F2: `Nanso no, adanse foforo kyerɛ sɛ na Moriorifo no yɛ Maori asase no fa kɛse mu fo a wɔfiri New Zealand kɔɔ Chathan Nsupɔ so, na wɔfiri ase yɛɛ wɔn neama foforo, amammerɛ a asomdwo wɔ mu.`
---------------------- (616) ----------------------
F1: `Na abusuakuo foforɔ bi nso wɔ Chathan nsuopɔ no so wei yɛ Maorifoɔ a wɔtu fii New Zealand.`
F2: `Na abusuakuo foforo bi nso wɔ Chathan nsupɔ no so eyi yɛ Maorifoɔ a wɔtu firi New Zealand.`
---------------------- (617) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔferɛɛ wɔn ho Moriorifoɔ na abenne die kakra wɔ hɔ na ewi aseɛ no, wɔpopaa Moriorifoɔ no fi hɔ.`
F2: `Wɔferɛɛ wɔn ho Moriorifo na abenne die kakra wɔ hɔ na ewi ase no, wɔpopaa Moriorifo no firii hɔ.`
---------------------- (618) ----------------------
F1: `Ankorɛankorɛ a na wɔka ho bɛyɛ mfenhyia du bi no boaa yɛn ma yɛn ani sɔɔ nea yetumi yɛ ne dea yɛn ani gye ho aberɛ a yɛsusu yɛn akwansideɛ ne mpo nkuguodie ho no.`
F2: `Ankorankoro a na wɔka ho bɛyɛ mfenhyia du bi no boaa yɛn ma yɛn ani sɔɔ nea yetumi yɛ ne nea yɛn ani gye ho bere a yɛsusu yɛn akwanside ne mpo nkuguodi ho no.`
---------------------- (619) ----------------------
F1: `Aberɛ a yɛɛtie ankorɛankorɛ sɛ wɔka wɔn ho, wɔn abusua, ne wɔn adwumayɛbea ho nsɛm no, yɛbɛnyaa nhumu a edi mu fa tete ho ne nnipa bi a wɔnyaa kuo no ho nneɛma pa ne nneɛma bɔne ho nkɛntɛnsoɔ.`
F2: `Abere a yɛretie ankorankoro sɛ wɔka wɔn ho, wɔn abusua, ne wɔn nhyehyɛe ho nsɛm no, yɛbɛnyaa nhumu a edi mu fa tete ho ne nnipa bi a wɔnyaa kuw no ho neama pa ne neama bɔne ho nkɛntɛnso.`
---------------------- (620) ----------------------
F1: `Aberɛ a wore te obi abakɔsɛm aseɛ no nkyerɛ sɛ wote n'amammerɛ aseɛ, nanso no ɛboa ma wonya baabi a wɔgyina wɔ kuo no mo abakɔsɛm ho adwene.`
F2: `Aberɛ a wore te obi abakɔsɛm ase no ɛnkyerɛ sɛ wote n'amammerɛ ase, anyɛ yie koraa no ɛboa nkurɔfo ma wɔnya baabi a wɔgyina wɔ kuw no mo abakɔsɛm ho adwene.`
---------------------- (621) ----------------------
F1: `Aberɛ a wɔ susu wɔn nkunimdie na wɔhu wɔn nkuguodie ho no, ankorɛankorɛ ne kuo no mu foɔ a wɔgusu sua adeɛ no nyinaa behu kuo no so mfasoɔ, kuo no botaeɛ ne deɛ ɛma kuo no kɔ so.`
F2: `Abere a wɔ susu wɔn nkunimdi na wɔn nkuguodi ho no, ankorankoro ne kuw no mu fo a wɔgusu sua ade no nyinaa behu kuw no so mfaso, kuw no botaeɛ ne nea ɛma kuw no kɔ so.`
---------------------- (622) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ saa tebeaɛ wei mu no, kae a wɔ kae adwuma ho suban a esisi atwam ne nkunimdie a ɛde baeɛ no boaa nkuroɔfoɔ ma wɔ buee nsesaeɛ foforɔ ne nkyerɛkyerɛ foforɔ maa kuro no mu asɔre no.`
F2: `Wɔ saa tebeae yi mu no, kae a wɔ kae adwuma ho suban a esisi atwam ne nkunimdi a ɛde bae no boaa nkuroɔfo ma wɔ buee kwan maa nsesae fofor ne nkyerɛkyerɛ foforo maa kuro no mu asɔre no.`
---------------------- (623) ----------------------
F1: `Saa nkunimdie ho asɛm wei maa nsakraeɛ ho hu no kɔɔ fam, aberɛ nso a na ɛreda daakye ho nsakraeɛ adi wɔ wɔn mu.`
F2: `Saa nkunimdi ho asɛm yi maa nsakrae ho suro no kɔɔ fam, aber nso a na ɛreda daakye ho nsakrae adi wɔ wɔn mu.`
---------------------- (624) ----------------------
F1: `Adwenkoro nhwɛsode ye ɔhaw anosɔ kwan a ɛka nsusuii ahorow anaa nimdeɛ ahorow bom de sɔ ɔhaw ano.`
F2: `Akwan a ɛwɔ hɔ a yɛfa so siesie ɔhaw yɛ kwan a yɛfa so siesie ɔhaw a ɛka adwene ahorow anaa akwan ahorow bom de ano pomasiberɛ.`
---------------------- (625) ----------------------
F1: `Saa adwenpɔ yi botae ye amirika, enidiso, nokwasɛm, bio nso nokwasɛm a wɔbɛhyɛ no nsow, akwan ahorow a wɔbɛsan de adi dwuma bio, ne nsɛm a wɔbɛboaboa ano.`
F2: `Deɛ na ɛhyɛ wɔn adwenem ara ne ntɛmso, nsɛm a edidiso ne pɛpɛɛpɛyɛ, afei nso bɛhunu nsɛmpɔ no yiye, de nhehyɛeɛ a ɛwɔ hɔ no reyɛ adwuma, boaboa nsɛm ano.`
---------------------- (626) ----------------------
F1: `Adeɛ a ɛho hia paa fa saa adwenpɔ yi ho ne sɛ: mmuae baako pɛ na ɛwɔ hɔ. Wodwen mmuae mmienu pɛ ho, a ɛne woatwa anaa woaten.`
F2: `Ade biako a ɛho hia wɔ saa adwenesusu yi mu ne: mmuae a ɛteɛ biako pɛ na ɛwɔ hɔ. Wodwene anoyi abien pɛ ho: ɛne ɛwom anaa ɛnnim.`
---------------------- (627) ----------------------
F1: `Saa kwan a wɔfa so dwen no hyɛ nyansahu anaa gyinapɛn bi ase.`
F2: `Saa kwan a yɛfa so dwene yi ne nyansahunu wɔ twaka anaa nhyehyɛe kwan pɔtee bi.`
---------------------- (628) ----------------------
F1: `Nkrɔfo a wɔwɔ saa adwene no dwen nnidisonnidiso, no wɔtumi kyere ade a ɛyɛ sɔnnahɔ gu wɔn tirim, sɔw ɔhaw ano, na wɔtumi yɛ nyansahu mu nhwehwɛmu ho adwuma.`
F2: `Nnipa a wɔwɔ saa adwene wei tumi dwene kɔ akyi, wɔtumi kaekae nneɛma, di ɔhaw ho dwuma na wɔsu nyansahunu nhwehwɛmu hwɛ.`
---------------------- (629) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa na ɛyɛ mmoa a wɔwɔ adom akyɛdeɛ a wɔ de hu deɛ afoforɔ dwene.`
F2: `Nnipa na ɛyɛ mmoa a wɔwɔ adom akyɛdeɛ a wɔ de hu nea afoforo dwene.`
---------------------- (630) ----------------------
F1: `Wei kyerɛ sɛ yetumi de yɛn adwene bu deɛ afoforɔ susu ho, deɛ wɔn abɔ wɔ tirimu sɛ wɔbɛyɛ, deɛ wɔgyedi, deɛ wɔnim anaa deɛ wɔpɛ.`
F2: `Eyi kyerɛ sɛ yetumi de yɛn adwene bu ne aafoforo susu ho, nea wɔn abɔ wɔ tirimu sɛ wɔbɛyɛ, nea wɔgyedi, nea wɔnim anaa nea wɔpɛ.`
---------------------- (631) ----------------------
F1: `Deɛ ɛka saa nnoɔma a yɛetumi yi ho no, afoforɔ nsusuyɛ a yɛbɛte aseɛ no ho hia paa. Ɛma yɛn kwan ma yɛtumi di nnoɔma a ɛsisi ma yɛhu a ɛho nteaseɛ yɛ akɛseɛ ho dwuma.`
F2: `Nea ɛka saa neama a yɛtumi yɛ ho no, afoforo nsusui a yɛbɛte ase no ho hia paa. Ɛma yɛn kwan ma yɛtumi di neama a ɛsisi ma yɛhu a ɛho ntease yɛ akɛse no ho dwuma.`
---------------------- (632) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ nhwɛsoɔ no, sɛ ɛba sɛ wuhu sɛ obi repae hyɛn bi mfɛnsere a, wobetumi asusu sɛ ɔrebɔ mmɔden awia obi a ɔnnim no hyɛn.`
F2: `Sɛ nhwɛso no, sɛ ɛba sɛ wuhu sɛ obi repae hyɛn bi mfɛnsere a, wobetumi asusu sɛ ɔrebɔ mmɔden awia obi a ɔnnim no hyɛn.`
---------------------- (633) ----------------------
F1: `Wobɛbu no atɛn wɔ ɔkwan foforɔ so sɛ wayera ne hyɛn no nsafoa na ɛyɛ ɔnoa ne hyɛn na ɔrebɔ mɔden sɛ ɔbɛbu awura mu a.`
F2: `Wobɛbu no atɛn wɔ ɔkwan foforo so sɛ w’ayera ne hyɛn no nsafoa na ɛyɛ ɔno ankasa hyɛn na ɔrebɔ mɔden sɛ ɔbɛbu awura mu.`
---------------------- (634) ----------------------
F1: `MRI gyina abɔdeɛ ho nimdeɛ a wɔferɛ no nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) gyinapɛn so, na Felix Bloch (ɔyɛ adwuma wɔ Stanford University) ne Edward Purcell (ofi Harvard University) na wɔ huu ho adeɛ wɔ 1930s mu.`
F2: `MRI gyina abɔde ho nimdeɛ a wɔferɛ no nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) gyinapɛn so, na Felix Bloch ( ɔyɛ adwuma wɔ Stanford University) ne Edward Purcell (ofi Harvard University) na wɔ huu ho ade wɔ 1930s mu.`
---------------------- (635) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ saa resonance wei mu no, baabi a tweboɔ wɔ ne akasafidie ho mframa ma atoms de akasafidie ho adafitwa sɛnkyerɛne nketenkete ma.`
F2: `Wɔ saa resonance yi mu no,baabi a twebo wɔ ne akasafidie ho mframa ma atɔm de akasafidie ho adafitwa sɛnkyerɛne nketenkete ma.`
---------------------- (636) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ afe 1970 mu no, Raymond Damadian, a ɔyɛ oduruyɛfoɔ ne nhwehwɛmu ho nyansapɛfoɔ, huu nea enti a wɔde tweboɔ ho dede ho mfonini yɛ adwinnade a wɔde yɛ nyarewa mu nhwehwɛmu.`
F2: `Wɔ afe 1970 mu no, Raymond Damadian, a ɔyɛ oduruyɛfo ne nhwehwɛmu ho nyansapɛfo, huu nea enti a wɔde twebo ho dede ho mfonini yɛ adwinade a wɔde yɛ nyarewa mu nhwehwɛmu.`
---------------------- (637) ----------------------
F1: `Mfe anan akyi no wɔde ɛho tumi maeɛ, ɛno na na ɛyɛ wiase nyinaa tumi a edi kan a wɔde maeɛ wɔ MRI adwumayɛ ho.`
F2: `Mfe anan akyi no wɔde ɛho tumi mae, ɛno na na ɛyɛ wiase nyinaa tumi a edi kan a wɔde mae wɔ MRI adwumayɛ ho.`
---------------------- (638) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ 1977 mu no, Dr, Damadian wie “whole-body” MRI nhwehwɛmu afidie a edi kan no ho adwumayɛ, na ɔferɛɛ no ”Indomitable”.`
F2: `Wɔ 1977 mu no, Dr. Damadian wie “nipadua-nyinaa” MRI nhwehwɛmu anwinade a edi kan no ho adwumayɛ, na ɔferɛɛ no ”Indomitable”.`
---------------------- (639) ----------------------
F1: `Nkɔmmɔbɔ a ɛnkɔ so wɔ berɛ baako mu no boa yi berɛ ma adwennwene ne sɛdeɛ yɛne afoforɔ di.`
F2: `Nkɔmmɔbɔ a ɛnkɔ so wɔ berɛ baako mu no boa yi berɛ ma adwennwene ne sɛnea yɛne afoforo di.`
---------------------- (640) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛma kwan ma asuafoɔ tumi yɛ adwuma wɔ wɔn ankasa berɛ mu na wɔn ankasa di berɛ a wɔde yɛ ɔkasa ho nkyerɛkyerɛ.`
F2: `Ɛma kwan ma asuafo tumi yɛ adwuma wɔ wɔn ankasa bere mu na wɔn ankasa di bere a wɔde yɛ ɔkasa ho nkyerɛkyerɛ so.`
---------------------- (641) ----------------------
F1: `Deɛ ɛka ho no, anohweteɛ kakra wɔ mmerɛ a yebetumi de ayɛ adwuma no so. (Bremer, 1998)`
F2: `Nea ɛka ho no, anohwete kakra wɔ mmere a yebetumi de ayɛ adwuma no so. (Bremer, 1998)`
---------------------- (642) ----------------------
F1: `Wiase ntontan kɛseɛ a yɛde yɛ adwuma no ma adesuafoɔ kwan ma wɔnsa tumi ka nsɛm aberɛ biara.`
F2: `Intanεt no ne wiase ntontan kɛse a yɛde yɛ adwuma no ma adesuafo kwan ma wɔnsa tumi ka nsɛm bere biara.`
---------------------- (643) ----------------------
F1: `Adesuafoɔ nso betumi de wɔn nsɛmmisa ama akyerɛkyerɛfoɔ aberɛ biara wɔ da no mu na wɔbetumi ahwɛ kwan sɛ wɔbenya muaeɛ ntɛm, sen sɛ wɔbɛtwɛn akosi da foforɔ a wɔde behyia bio.`
F2: `Adesuafo nso betumi de wɔn nsɛmmisa ama akyerɛkyerɛfo bere biara wɔ da no mu na wɔbetumi ahwɛ kwan sɛ wɔbenya muae ntɛm, sen sɛ wɔbɛtwɛn akosi da foforo a wɔde behyia bio no.`
---------------------- (644) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔkwan a wɔfa so sua adeɛ a ɛbaeɛ wɔ ɛnnɛ berɛ yi mu akyi no ma yɛde yɛn ho fi deɛ obiara gye di sɛ ɛyɛ ho. Yenni ɔkwan pa baako a yɛfa so sua adeɛ.`
F2: `Ɔkwan a wɔfa so sua ade a ɛbae wɔ nnɛmmere yi mu akyi no ma yɛde yɛn ho firi nea obiara gye di sɛ ɛyɛ ho. Yenni ɔkwan pa biako a yɛfa so sua ade.`
---------------------- (645) ----------------------
F1: `Nokorɛ ne sɛ, yenni ade baako a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛ sua. Adesua kɔ so wɔ osuahunu a ɛkɔ so wɔ osuani ne nimdeɛ a ɛda n'anim.`
F2: `Nokware ne sɛ, yenni ade biako a ɛsɛ sɛ yɛ sua. Adesua kɔ so wɔ osuahunu a ɛkɔ so wɔ osuani no ne nimdeɛe a ɛda n'anim no.`
---------------------- (646) ----------------------
F1: `Osuahunu a yɛwɔ wɔ wankasa-yɛ ne nsɛm a yɛde ma, TV so dwumadie a agyina adesua so kyerɛ sa gyinapɛn wei.`
F2: `Osuahunu a yɛwɔ nansa yi wɔ wankasa-yɛ ne nsɛm a yɛde ma, TV so dwumadi a agyina adesua so kyerɛ sa gyinapɛn yi.`
---------------------- (647) ----------------------
F1: `Yɛn mu pii hwɛ TV so dwumedie a ɛma yɛhu sɛdeɛ nnoɔma kɔ so anaa yɛnya osuahunu a yɛremfa yɛn ho nhyɛ mu anaa yɛremfa saa nimdeɛ no nyɛ adwuma.`
F2: `Yɛn mu pii hwɛ TV so dwumedi a ɛma yɛhu sɛnea neama kɔ so anaa yɛnya osuahunu a yɛremfa yɛn ho nhyɛ mu anaa yɛremfa saa nimdeɛe no nyɛ adwuma.`
---------------------- (648) ----------------------
F1: `Yɛrentumi ɛnsiesie hyɛn, ensi nsuti wɔ yɛn dan akiyi, yɛrentu kwan ɛnkɔ Peru nkɔ hwɛ tete nnoɔma a asɛi, anaa yɛbɛ siesie yɛn fiepamfoɔ dan.`
F2: `Yɛrentumi nnsiesie hyɛn, ensi nsuti wɔ yɛn dan akiyi, yɛrentu kwan ɛnkɔ Peru nkɔ hwɛ tete neama a asɛi, anaa yɛbɛ siesie yɛn fiepamfo dan.`
---------------------- (649) ----------------------
F1: `Nnaase nkɔ ma nsuo aseɛ fiber optic cable links a ɛkɔ Europe ne broadband satellite no, Greenland man no wɔ so bi na emu nnipa bɛyɛ 93% na wɔwɔ wisae ntotan kɛseɛ no so.`
F2: `Nnaase nkɔma nsu ase fiber optic cable links a ɛkɔ Europe ne broadband satellite no, Greenland man no wɔ so bi na emu nnipa bɛyɛ 93% na wɔwɔ wisae ntotan kɛse no so.`
---------------------- (650) ----------------------
F1: `Wo ahɔhoɔdan (sɛ wɔ te ahɔhoɔdan nketewa mu anaa wɔn ankasa wɔn fie mu) mu no wɔ betumi anya wifi anaa kɔmputa a ɛwɔ wiase ntontan kɛseɛ no so, na ɛhɔ foɔ nyinaa wɔ wiase ntontan kɛseɛ adan anaa mmeaeɛ bi a wɔwɔ amansan wifi.`
F2: `Wo ahɔhodan (sɛ wɔte ahɔhodan nketewa mu anaa wɔn ankasa wɔn fie) mu no wɔbetumi anya wifi anaa kɔmputa a ɛwɔ wiase ntontan kɛse no so, na ɛhɔ fo nyinaa wɔ wiase ntontan kɛse adan anaa mmeae bi a wɔwɔ amansan wifi.`
---------------------- (651) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛdeɛ yeadi kan ahu no, ɛmfa ho sɛ w’agye asɛmfua "Eskimo" atom wↄ United States no, wↄ Canada no, arcticfoↄ a wↄnnyɛ United Statesfoↄ hu no sɛ ɛyɛ atɛmdidie.`
F2: `Sɛnea yɛaka dedaw no, ɛmfa ho sɛ w’agye asɛmfua “Eskimo” atom wↄ United States no, wↄ Canada no, arcticfo a wↄnnyɛ United Statesfo hu no sɛ ɛyɛ mpoatwa.`
---------------------- (652) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ wobɛte sɛ "Greenland" ↄmanfoↄ no de asɛmfua no redi dwuma no, ɛsɛ sɛ ahↄhoↄ kwati sɛ wↄbɛbↄ.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ wobɛte sɛ "Greenland" ↄmanfo no de asɛmfua no redi dwuma no, ɛsɛ sɛ wↄn a wↄyɛ ahↄho gyae sɛ wↄbɛyɛ saa.`
---------------------- (653) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄn a wofi Greenland no frɛ wↄn ho Inuit ne kalaalleg (duduoↄ kabea: Kalaallit) wↄ Canada, na wↄn man mu deɛ, wↄfrɛ wↄn Greenlandfoↄ.`
F2: `Wↄn a wofi Greenland no frɛ wↄn ho Inuit ne kalaalleg (dodow kabea:kalaallit) wↄ Canada, nanso wↄn man mu de, wↄfrɛ wↄn Greenlandfo.`
---------------------- (654) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ Greenland no, wonnim sɛ sɛdeɛ wobedi ahɔhoɔ bɔne anaa wɔbɛdwene ne ho adwene bɔne. Wɔ kuro no mu mpo, "beaeɛ a ɛhɔ nyɛ" nni hɔ.`
F2: `Wɔ Greenland no, wonnim sɛ sɛnea wɔbɛyɛ ahɔho bɔne anaa wɔbɛdwen ne ho adwen bɔne. Wɔ kuro no mu mpo, "baabi a ɛhɔ nyɛ" nni hɔ.`
---------------------- (655) ----------------------
F1: `Awɔ ne tebea a ɛnyɛ a onii a ɔmmoaboaa ne ho no behyia.`
F2: `Awɔw ne tebea a ɛnyɛ a onii a ɔmmoaboaa ne ho no behyia.`
---------------------- (656) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wokɔ Greenland awɔw mmerɛ a (berɛ a worekɔ atifi fam no, na awɔw no mu reyɛ den), ɛho hia sɛ wode ntadeɛ ɛka hye ba.`
F2: `Sɛ wokɔ Greenland awɔw mmere mu a (bere a worekɔ atifi fam no, na awɔw no mu reyɛ den), ɛho hia sɛ wode ntade a ɛka hye ba.`
---------------------- (658) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ ɔhyew mmerɛ ba a, hwɛ wo ho yie wɔ Nordic ntontom ho. Ɛmfa ho sɛ wɔmma yareɛ biara no, wotumi ha adwen paa.`
F2: `Sɛ ɔhyew mmere ba a, hwɛ wo ho yie wɔ Nordic ntontom ho. Ɛmfa ho sɛ wɔmmma yare biara no, wotumi ha adwen paa.`
---------------------- (659) ----------------------
F1: `Berɛ a wɔkyerɛ sɛ San Francisco sikasɛm gyina nsrahwɛ mmeaeɛ a ɛkyɛn so a ɛwɔ hɔ no so no, onya sika firi mmeaeɛ ahodoɔ pii.`
F2: `Bere a San Francisco sikasɛm ka ne yɛ a ɛyɛ wiase-gyinapɛn a edi mu nsrahwɛbeae, ne sikasɛm gu ahorow.`
---------------------- (660) ----------------------
F1: `Ne fa a ɛde adwuma ba paa ne wɔn a wɔyɛ ɔfese, aban, sikasɛm, adwadie na nsrahwɛ nnwuma no.`
F2: `Adwumayɛ ɔfa kɛse no yɛ animdefo ɔsom nnwuma, aban, sikasɛm, aguadi ne nsrahwɛ.`
---------------------- (661) ----------------------
F1: `Da a wɔtaa da no adi wɔ wɔn nnwom, sini, nwoma, ɛne amammerɛ a agye din mu no ama kuro no ne nneɛma a ɛyɛ fɛ wo mu no ama ne din ahyeta wɔ wiase afanan nyinaa.`
F2: `Sɛnea ɛda ne ho adi wɔ nnwom mu, sini mu, kasadwini ne amammerɛ a agye din no aboa ma wɔm ahu kuro no ne n’asase so ahyɛnsode wɔ wiase nyinaa.`
---------------------- (662) ----------------------
F1: `San Francisco asisi nsrahwɛ mmeaeɛ akɛseɛ a ahɔhogyebea ahodoɔ, adidibea, ɛne nhyiamu asa a ɛho twa.`
F2: `San Francisco ayɛ nsrahwɛbea mpontu kɛse ne ahɔhodan, adidi meae ne nhyiamu meae a ɛyɛ papa paa bebree.`
---------------------- (663) ----------------------
F1: `San Francisco yɛ mmeaeɛ a ɛyɛ sene biara wɔ ɔman no mu baako a wobenya a Asiafoɔ nnuane: Koreafoɔ, Thailandfoɔ, Indiafoɔ, ne Japanfoɔ.`
F2: `San Francisco nso yɛ mmea papapaa no mu biako wɔ ɔman no mu ma Asiafo nnuane ahorow: Koreafo, Thaifo,Indiafo, ne Japanfo.`
---------------------- (664) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔkwan a wotu kɔ Walt Disney World yɛ akwantuo a ɛho hia pa ara wɔ Amerikafoɔ mmusua beberee mu.`
F2: `Kwan a wɔtu kɔ Walt Disney Wiase no gyina hɔ ma akwantu titiriw ma Americafo mmusua beberee.`
---------------------- (665) ----------------------
F1: `Nsrahwɛ a "yɛhwɛ kwan" ne sɛ yɛde wiemhyɛn bɛkɔ Orlando Wiemhyɛn gyinabea, yɛbɛtena bɔɔso mu akɔ Disney ahɔhogyebea a ɛwɔ hɔ ara, yebedi bɛyɛ nnawɔtwe wɔ Disney asase so, na yɛasan aba fie.`
F2: `Ewiemuhyɛn mu tena d ewura Orlando Amanaman Wimhyɛn gyinabeae mu, Disney ahɔhodan a enni adagye, wo bedi bɛyɛ nnawɔtwe a woremmfi Disney agyapade, ne sɛ wosan w'akyi kɔ fie no ka nsrahwɛ "ankasa" ho.`
---------------------- (666) ----------------------
F1: `Nkyerɛkyerɛ mu no gu ahodoɔ, nanso yei ne deɛ nnipa dodoɔ no ara kyerɛ berɛ a wɔka sɛ "wɔrekɔ Disney World no".`
F2: `Nsonsonoe a enni ano a ɛbɛyɛ yie pii wɔ hɔ, nanso eyi ne nea nkurɔfo kyerɛ sɛ wɔka "Disney Wiase kɔ" ho asɛm a.`
---------------------- (667) ----------------------
F1: `Tekiti beberee a wɔtɔn wɔ intanɛt so denam badwam adetɔn wɛbsaet bi te sɛ eBay anaa Craigslist so no yɛ tekiti a wɔde edi dwuma kakra a wo nso wobetumi de edi dwuma boro da baako akɔ mmeaeɛ ahodoɔ.`
F2: `Akwannya nkrataa bebree a wɔtɔn wɔ abɛɛfo ntontan so denam badwam adetɔn wɛbsyte te sɛ eBay anaa Craigslist yɛ multi-day park-hopper akwannya nkrataa a wɔde di dwuma wɔ nyiyimu kwan so.`
---------------------- (668) ----------------------
F1: `Berɛ a yei yɛ biribi a ɛkɔ so wɔ hɔ paa no, Disney bra saa adeyɔ yi: wɔmfa tekiti a obi de edi dwuma nsan mma obi foforɔ.`
F2: `Bere a eyi yɛ dwumadi a obiara nim no, Disney abara no: worentumi mfa akwannya krataa no mma obi foforo.`
---------------------- (669) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wobɛpɛ sɛ woda ntomadan mu wↄ' Grand Canyon ɛhyeɛ no akyi a, ɛho behia sɛ wonya tumi krataa a wↄde kↄ nkuro nketewa a ɛwↄ akyiri no bi.`
F2: `Sɛ wopɛ sɛ woda ntamadan mu wↄ 'Grand Canyon' hye no akyi a, ɛbehia sɛ wonya tumi krataa a wↄde kↄ nkurow nketewa a ɛwↄ akyiri no bi.`
---------------------- (670) ----------------------
F1: `Tumi krataa a wↄde ma no sua sɛdeɛ ɛbɛbↄ canyon no ho ban, na wo nsa beka tumi krataa yi bosome da edi kan, abosome anan a ansaana saa bosome no ahyɛase.`
F2: `Wↄde tumi krataa kakraa bi pɛ ma sɛnea ɛbɛbↄ canyon no ho ban, na wo nsa betumi aka krataa yi bosome no da a edi kan, abosome anan ansa na saa bosome no mfiase.`
---------------------- (671) ----------------------
F1: `Ne saa nti, ↄpɛpↄn da a edi kan na wobenya tumi krataa a wↄde kↄ nkuro nketewaa ansa na woatumi akↄ hↄ kotonimma bosome mu.`
F2: `Eyi nti, ↄpɛpↄn da a edi kan na wobenya tumi krataa a wↄde kↄ nkurow nketewa (backcountry) ansa na woatumi akↄ hↄ kotonimma bosome mu.`
---------------------- (672) ----------------------
F1: `Beaeɛ a wosi ntomadan da mu a agye din bi te sɛ "Bright Angel Campground "a ɛwↄ "Phantom Ranch" nkyenmu no taa yɛ mã ntɛm da a edi kan a wↄma hokwan sɛ nsrahwɛfoↄ betumi abegye ato hↄ no.`
F2: `Baabi a wosi ntamadan da mu a agye din bi te sɛ "Bright Angel Campground" a ɛbɛn "Phantom Ranch" no taa yɛ ma ntɛm, da a edi kan a wↄma kwan sɛ nsrahwɛfo betumi abegye ato hↄ no.`
---------------------- (673) ----------------------
F1: `Tumi krataa a ɛwↄ hↄ ma wↄn a wↄba hↄ begye yɛ kakraa bi; nea odi kan ba na ɛnya.`
F2: `Tumi krataa a ɛwↄ hↄ ma wↄn a wↄba hↄ bɛgye no yɛ kakraa bi; nea odi kan ba na onya.`
---------------------- (674) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wode kaa bewura Southern Africa yɛ ɔkwan pa a wode behunu sɛdeɛ mantam no fɛ teɛ ne mmeaeɛ ahodoɔ a enni nsrahwɛ kwan ankasa no so.`
F2: `Hyɛn a wɔde wura Africa Anafofam yɛ anwanwa kwan a wode behu ɔmantam no ahoɔfɛ nyinaa ne afei nso sɛ wobɛkɔ mmeae a atwe ne ho afiri nsrahwɛ kwan a wɔnim no daa no so.`
---------------------- (675) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ woyɛ wo nhyehyeɛ yiye a, wobetumi de kaa biara ayɛ saa nanso wotu fo sɛ wode 4x4 bedi dwuma na mmeaeɛ bi deɛ 4x4 a n'ase wɔ soro nkoaa na wobetumi de akɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Wobetumi ayɛ eyi wɔ hyɛn biara sɛ woyɛ ahwɛyie ho nhyehyɛe a nanso 4×4 na wɔ kamfo paa na 4×4 nkoaa na etumi akɔ mmeae pii.`
---------------------- (676) ----------------------
F1: `Hyɛ no nso berɛ a woreyɛ nhyehyeɛ no sɛ ɛmfa ho sɛ Southern Africa wɔ asomdwoe no, ɛnyɛ aman a etwa ne ho ahyia no nyinaa na ɛte saa.`
F2: `Bere a woyɛ nhyehyɛe no fa hyɛ w’adwenem sɛ ɛmfa sɛ Africa Anaafofam adwo na ɛnyɛ aman a atwa ho ahyia no nyinaa na ɛte saa.`
---------------------- (677) ----------------------
F1: `Visa ho ahwehwɛdeɛ ne ɛho ka da nso wɔ ɔman biara mu, na ɔman a wofiri muo no nso nya ɛso nkɛntɛnsoɔ.`
F2: `Visa ho ahiade ne ne bo da nsow efiri ɔman biako mu kɔ ɔman foforo mu na ɔman a wofiri mu no nya so nkɛntɛnso.`
---------------------- (678) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔman biara nso wɔ mmara soronko a ɛkyerɛ mpofirim nneɛma a wohia wɔ wo kaa mu.`
F2: `Ɔman biara nso wɔ mmra soronko a ɛhwehwɛ sɛ wonya mprofiri mu akwanhyia ho neama wɔ wo hyɛn mu.`
---------------------- (679) ----------------------
F1: `Victoria Falls yɛ kuro a ɛda Zimbabwe atɔeɛ fam, ɛwɔ Livingstone, Zambia hyeɛ no agya na ɛbɛn Botswana.`
F2: `Victoria Falls yɛ kuro a ɛwɔ Zimbabwe atɔefam, ɛtwa ɔhye no firi Livingstone, Zambia, ne ɛbɛn Bostwana.`
---------------------- (680) ----------------------
F1: `Kuro no da nsuo a ebu fa soɔ no nkyɛn pɛɛ, na ɛno ne beaeɛ a ɛyɛ fɛ titire a ɛtwetwe nkurɔfoɔ, na saa nsrahwɛbea a agye din yi ma wɔn a wɔn ani gye anigyedeɛ a esaine wɔ mu ho ne bɛhwɛadefoɔ hokwan ma wɔtena hɔ kyɛ.`
F2: `Kuro no da nsu a ɛworow no nkyɛn pɛɛ, na wɔyɛ ade a ɛtwe adwene titiriw, nanso nsrahwɛbeae yi ma wɔn wɔhwɛ ade kwan ne adehwɛfo nyinaa na ɛma wɔn hokwan bebree sɛ wɔbɛtena hɔ akyɛ.`
---------------------- (681) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ osutɔberɛ (Obubuo kosi Ɔbɛnem) mu no, nsuo no dodoɔ kɔ soro na nsuo a ebu fa soɔ gye ntrɛha.`
F2: `Wɔ nsutɔbere mu no (Obubuo kosi Ɔbenem), nsu no dodow bɛkɔ soro na Nsu a ɛworow no bɛyɛ nea ɛkyɛn so paa.`
---------------------- (682) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛyɛ deɛ wo ho bɛfɔ ɔkwan biara so sɛ wobetwa nsamsoɔ no anaasɛ wobɛfa anammɔn kwan a akyiakyia a ɛbɛn nsuo a ebu so no.`
F2: `Yɛhyɛ wo bɔ sɛ wo ho bɛfɔw sɛ wo twa ɛtwene no anaa sɛ wonantew tentene no so wɔ nsu a ɛworow no ho a.`
---------------------- (683) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ ɔkwan foforɔ soɔ no, esaine nsuo no dodoɔ a ɛkɔ soro paa nti ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ wobehunu nsuo a ɛrebu fa soɔ no yie—nsuo no bebrebe ntira!`
F2: `Wɔ ɔkwan foforo so no, ade titiriw nti a ɛte saa ne sɛ nsu no volume no wɔ soro dodo ma worenhu sɛnea Falls no te ankasa - wɔ nsu no nyinaa!`
---------------------- (684) ----------------------
F1: `Tutankhamun Nna (KV62). KV62 betumi ayɛ nna a agye din sene biara wɔ subɔn no mu, sɛdeɛ wɔ 1922 Howard Carter hwehwɛ hunuu ɔhene kumaa no ahenfo afunsieɛ a na ɛte sɛ deɛ wɔmfaa nsa nkaaɛ no.`
F2: `Tutankham ɔboda (KV62), KV62 bɛyɛ ɔboda a ɛwɔ agye din wɔ Bɔnka no mu, beae a Howard Carter 1922 adiyi a ɛfa ɔhene kumaa adehye ayi no ho no.`
---------------------- (685) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ yɛde toto ahenfo a aka no nna no mu dodɔ no ho dea, ɛho nhyɛda nhia sɛ wɔbɛkɔ Tutankhamun nna hɔ nsrahwɛ, esaine sɛ esua koraa na deɛ wɔde asiesie mu no nnɔɔso nti.`
F2: `Sɛ wɔde toto adehye ɔboda a aka no ho a, nkantom mu no, Tutankhamun ɔboda ntae mfata sɛ woka sra, esiane sɛ esua paa na ɛhɔ nsiesie nso ɔhye da ho.`
---------------------- (686) ----------------------
F1: `Obi biara a ɔbɛpɛ sɛ ohunu sɛdeɛ afunu a wɔakora so no asɛe akoduru berɛ a wɔbɔɔ mmɔden sɛ wobeyi afiri afunu adaka no mu no abam bebu efiri sɛ ne ti ne n'abatire nkoa ara na obehunu.`
F2: `Obiara a n'anigye ho sɛ obehu adanse a ɛfa efunu a wɔn akora so a ɛsɛi bere a wɔyɛe sɛ wobeyi no afi funu adaka no mu no bɛnya huammɔdi esiane sɛ ne ti ne ne mmati pɛ na wɔhu.`
---------------------- (687) ----------------------
F1: `Sika a na wɔde ahyehyɛ nna no nni hɔ bio, na wɔde ne nyinaa kɔ Egyptfoɔ Akoradebea a ɛwɔ Cairo.`
F2: `Ɔboda no mu ahonyade a ɛyɛ nwonwa no nni mu bio, mmom no wɔn ayi akɔ Egyptfo Tete neama akorae wɔ Cairo.`
---------------------- (688) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛbɛyɛ papa sɛ nsrahwɛfoɔ a wonni mmerɛ no bɛkɔ mmeaeɛ afoforɔ akɔhwɛ hɔ.`
F2: `Ahɔho a wɔn bere sua no ɛbɛyɛ papa sɛ wɔbɛsɛe wɔn bere wɔ baabi foforo.`
---------------------- (689) ----------------------
F1: `Phnom Krom da Siem Reap anaafoɔ atɔeɛ fam 12 km. Wosii saa asɔredan a ɛwɔ koko no so wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 9 mu, berɛ a na Ɔhene Yasovarman di adeɛ no.`
F2: `Phnom Krom, 12 km anaafo-atɔefam wɔ Siem Reap. Wosii saa nkoko so asɔredan yi wɔ 9th century awie, bere a Ɔhene Yasovarman redi ade no.`
---------------------- (690) ----------------------
F1: `Beaeɛ a asɔredan no wɔ no kusuuyɛ ɛne sɛdeɛ wohu no hɔ berɛ a wohwɛ hɔ firi Tonle Sap ɔtadeɛ no ma kokoɔ no foro yɛ deɛ mfasoɔ wɔ so.`
F2: `Asɔredan no wim tebea a ɛyɛ kusuu ne ɔhwɛ a ɛwɔ Tonle Sap ɔtare no so no ma nkoko no foro yɛ nea mfaso wɔ so.`
---------------------- (691) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wokɔsra beaeɛ hɔ a, wobetumi de kodoɔ nso atu kwan akɔ beaeɛ a ɔtadeɛ no wɔ.`
F2: `Nsrahwɛ kɔ bea hɔ no wobetumi de ɔkoro so akwantu aka ho a ɔhaw biara mma.`
---------------------- (692) ----------------------
F1: `Wohia Angkor Pass na woatumi awura asɔredan no mu. Eno nti ɛnsɛ sɛ wo werɛ firi sɛ wobɛfa wo paspɔt berɛ a worekɔ Tonle Sap.`
F2: `Angnkor Pass no hia sɛ wobetumi awura asɔredan no mu a ɛno nti mma wowerɛ mfi sɛ wode wo akwantu ho nkrataa bɛka wo ho sɛ worekɔ Tonle Sap a.`
---------------------- (693) ----------------------
F1: `Yerusalem yɛ Israel kuropɔn ne kuro a ɛso paa, ɛmfa ho sɛ aman afoforɔ ne Amanaman Nkabom no nnye ntom sɛ ɛhɔ yɛ Israel kuropɔn.`
F2: `Jerusalem yɛ Isreal ahenkuro ne kuro kɛse, ɛmfa ho sɛ aman afoforo ne Aman Nkabom no mmu no sɛ ɛyɛ Isreal ahenkuro.`
---------------------- (694) ----------------------
F1: `Tete kuro a ɛwɔ Yudafoɔ nkokoɔ no mu no abakɔsɛm a ɛyɛ anika no edi mfeɛ mpempem pii.`
F2: `Tete kuro a ɛwɔ Judean Nkoko no so no wɔ abakɔsɛm a ɛyɛ anika mfe apem a atwam yi mu.`
---------------------- (695) ----------------------
F1: `Kurow no yɛ kronkron ma ɔsom ahodoɔ mmieɛnsa a wɔgye di sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ baako - Yudasom, Kristosom, ne Kramosom. Na ɛha abɛyɛ honhom, ɔsom, ne amammerɛ beaeɛ ama wɔn.`
F2: `Kuro no yɛ kronkron ma nyamesomfo a wɔgye onyame biakopɛ di asom abiɛsa no - Judafosom, Kristofosom ne Islamfosom, na ɛsom sɛ honhom, nyamesom ne amammerɛ mfimfini.`
---------------------- (696) ----------------------
F1: `Esaine hia a kuro no ho hia wɔ ɔsom adeyɔ mu ne ne titire no mmeaeɛ a ɛwɔ Old City mpɔtam hɔ no nti, Yerusalem yɛ beaeɛ a nsrahwɛfoɔ kɔ paa wɔ Israel.`
F2: `Esiane nyamesom ho mfaso a ɛwɔ kuro no ho nti, ne titiriw no Kuro Dedaw no mmeae a ɛdɔɔso wɔ mpɔtam hɔ no, Jerusalem yɛ mmeae atitiriw a nsrahwɛfo kɔ sera wɔ Isreal no mu biako.`
---------------------- (697) ----------------------
F1: `Yerusalem wɔ abakɔsɛm, fam tutu ne amammerɛ mmeaeɛ, na wɔsan wɔ sotɔɔ akɛseɛ, annoneɛtɔnbea, ne adidibea a nkorɔfoɔ ayɛ mu ma na ahokeka ne anigyeɛ wo mu wɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Jerusalem wɔ abakɔsɛm, atetesɛm ne amammerɛ mmeae pii, ne aguadi meae a ɛyɛ ahokeka na nnipa abɔ apee so wɔ, anonnebeae, ne adidibeae.`
---------------------- (698) ----------------------
F1: `Ecuador hwehwɛ sɛ Cuba manfoɔ no nya nsatoɔ krataa ansa na woafa amanaman wiemhyɛnbea anaa ɛhyeɛ ahodoɔ so ewura Ecuador.`
F2: `Ecuador hwehwɛ sɛ Cuban manfo benya nsato krataa ansa na wɔn aba Ecuador denam amanaman ewimhyɛn gyinabea anaa kurotia akwannya beae.`
---------------------- (699) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsɛ sɛ Ecuador Suafoɔ a ɔhwɛ Amannɔne Nsɛm so no de ne nsa hyɛ saa krataa yi ase.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ Ecuadorfo Asoafohwɛfo ma Amanfoforo so Nsem no gye nkrataa yi tom wɔ mmra kwan, na ɛsɛ sɛ wo ne wɔn yɛ adwene wɔ ahwehwɛde bi ho.`
---------------------- (700) ----------------------
F1: `Woayɛ saa ahwehwɛdeɛ yi na ama akwantuo ho nhyehyeɛ a ɛda aman mmienu yi ntam no ayɛ deɛ nhyehyeɛ da ho.`
F2: `Wɔn asiesie saa ahwehwɛde yi sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɛbɛ ma wɔn asraafo akɔ ne aba a nhyehyɛe da ho wɔ aman abien no ntam.`
---------------------- (701) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsɛ sɛ Cuba manfoɔ a wokura US krataa a ɛma wɔn kwan ma wɔtena hɔ no kɔ Ecuadorfoɔ nanmusini no asoeɛ hɔ na woyi no firi saa ahwehwɛdeɛ yi mu.`
F2: `Cuban manfo a wɔyɛ nkurɔfo a wɔwɔ US green kaade no ɛsɛ sɛ wɔ kɔ Ecuadorfo Consulate hɔ sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛyi saa ahwehwɛde yi efiri mu ama wo.`
---------------------- (702) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsɛ sɛ wo paspɔt no da ne kwan mu na abosome nsia san gu mmerɛ a ɛsɛ sɛ wotena hɔ no akyi. Wohia tekiti a ɛde wo kɔ san ba anaa tekiti a edi mmerɛ dodoɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ wotena hɔ no ho adanseɛ.`
F2: `Ԑsԑ sԑ wo paspͻt no di mu na ԑboro nna a akwantu no bedi no so abosome 6.Wohia tekiti a etumi de wo kͻ na ԑsan de wo ba anaa tekiti a ebedi nna a wobedi no ho adanse.`
---------------------- (703) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipakuo nsrahwɛ boɔ yɛ fo, eno nti sɛ ɛyɛ wo nkoaa anaa wo ne adamfo bi no, bɔ mmɔden hyia afoforɔ na monhyehyɛ ekuo a nnipa bɛyɛ anan kosi nsia wo mu na ama ɔbaakofoɔ boɔ ayɛ deɛ ɛwɔ fam.`
F2: `Nnipakuw nsrahwԑ bo yԑ fo, enti sԑ ԑyԑ wo pԑ anaasԑ wo ne adamfo baako pԑ no, bͻ mmͻden sԑ mobehyia nnipa afoforo na moayԑ kuw a nnipa anan kosi nsia wom ama ͻbaakofo bo aba fam.`
---------------------- (704) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, ɛnsɛ sɛ yei ha wo, esaine sɛ mpɛn pii no wɔka nsrahwɛfoɔ no hyɛ kaa mu dodoɔ mu.`
F2: `Nanso, ԑnsԑ sԑ wei ha wo, esaine sԑ mpԑn pii no wͻka nsrahwԑfo no bom sԑnea kaa ahorow no bԑyԑ ma.`
---------------------- (705) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛte sɛ deɛ wɔde daadaa nkurɔfoɔ ma ɛyɛ wɔn sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wotua sika pii.`
F2: `Ԑte sԑ nea wͻde daadaa nkurofo ma ԑyԑ wͻn sԑ wobetua sika pii no.`
---------------------- (706) ----------------------
F1: `Bepɔ a emu dɔ na ɛware bi wɔ Machu Picchu atifi fam awiei hɔ, mpɛn pii no wobehunu sɛ ɛwɔ amanfo no mfonini akyi.`
F2: `Bepɔw a emu dɔ na ɛware bi wɔ Machu Picchu atifi fam awiei hɔ, mpɛn pii no wobehu sɛ ɛwɔ amanfo no mfonini akyi.`
---------------------- (707) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛte sɛ deɛ ɛyɛ den berɛ a wogyina aseɛ no, na emu dɔ na ɛyɛ den sɛ wobɛforo akɔ soro, nanso nnipa a wɔwɔ ahoɔden betumi de sima 45 aforo akɔ soro.`
F2: `Ɛte sɛ nea ɛyɛ den bere a wogyina ase no, na emu dɔ na ɛyɛ den sɛ wobɛforo akɔ soro, nanso nnipa a wɔwɔ ahoɔden betumi de sima 45 aforo akɔ soro.`
---------------------- (708) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde aboɔ no ayɛ anammɔnkwan no atrapoe no mu dodoɔ no ara, na wɔ beaeɛ a emu dɔ no wɔde dadeɛ ayɛ adeɛ woso mu de foro kɔ soro.`
F2: `Wɔde aboɔ ayɛ anammɔnkwan no atrapoe no mu dodow no ara, na wɔ baabi a emu dɔ no, wɔde dade ayɛ nea woso mu de foro kɔ soro.`
---------------------- (709) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ deɛ yɛaka yi mu no, hwɛ kwan sɛ wobɛhome hyeehyee, na hwɛ wo ho yie wɔ mmeaeɛ a emu dɔ, ne titire no berɛ a woafɔ, esaine sɛ ebetumi ayɛ hu nti.`
F2: `Wɔ nea yɛaka yi mu no, hwɛ kwan sɛ wohome bԑte, na hwɛ wo ho yie wɔ baabi a emu dɔ, ne titiriw no bere a woafɔ, esaine sɛ ebetumi ayɛ hu nti.`
---------------------- (711) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ worekɔhwɛ mmeaeɛ ahodoɔ ne mmoa ne mfudeɛ wɔ Galapogos a, ɛbɛyɛ papa sɛ wode kodoɔ, sɛdeɛ Charles Darwin yɛe wɔ 1835 mu no.`
F2: `Sɛ worekɔhwɛ beae ahorow ne mmoa ne mfude wɔ Galapogos a, ɛbɛyɛ papa sɛ wode ͻkorow bԑyԑ saa, sԑnea Charles Darwin yɛe wɔ 1835 mu no.`
---------------------- (712) ----------------------
F1: `Po so ahyɛn bɛboro 60 na ɛfa Galapagos nsuo no so - a wotumi fa nnipa dodoɔ firi 8 kosi 100.`
F2: `Po so ahyɛn bɛboro 60 na ɛfa Galapagos nsu no so - a wotumi fa nnipa dodow fi 8 kosi 100.`
---------------------- (713) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa dodoɔ no ara di kan kora beaeɛ a wɔbenya no so (esaine sɛ kodoɔ no taa yɛ ma paa wɔ).`
F2: `Nnipa dodoɔ no ara di kan kora baabi a wɔbenya no so (esaine sɛ korow no taa yɛ ma wɔ bere a nnipa ba hͻ paa no).`
---------------------- (714) ----------------------
F1: `Hwɛ hunu sɛ onii a wobɛfa ne so akora no yɛ Galapagos nimdefoɔ a ɔwɔ ahyɛn ahodoɔ ho nimdeɛ.`
F2: `Hwɛ hu sɛ onii a wobɛfa ne so akora no yɛ Galapagos nimdefo a ɔwɔ ahyɛn ahorow ho nimdeɛ.`
---------------------- (715) ----------------------
F1: `Yei bɛma woagyina deɛ w'ani gye ho ne deɛ wompɛ so apaw ɛhyɛn a ɛne no behyia.`
F2: `Wei bɛma woagyina nea w'ani gye ho ne nea wompɛ so apaw po so hyɛn a ɛne no behyia.`
---------------------- (716) ----------------------
F1: `Ansa na Spainfoɔ no reba wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 16 mu no, na Inca di Chile atifi fam no so berɛ a kuromma a wɔfrɛ wɔn Araucanians (Mapuche) no te Chile mfimfini ne anaafoɔ fam.`
F2: `Ansa na Spainfo no reba wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 16 mu no, na Incafo no di Chile atifi fam no so, bere a kuromma a wɔfrɛ wɔn Araucanians (Mapuche) no te Chile mfimfini ne anaafo fam.`
---------------------- (717) ----------------------
F1: `Mapuchefoɔ no yɛ tete Amerikafoɔ kuo a wɔade wɔn ho no mu baako a woanfa wɔn ho anhyɛ wɔn a wɔka Spainfoɔ kasa no tumidie ase kosi berɛ a Chile nyaa fawohodie.`
F2: `Mapuchefo no yɛ tete Amerikafo kuw a wɔade wɔn ho no mu baako a woanfa wɔn ho anhyɛ wɔn a wɔka Spainfo kasa no tumidi ase kosi bere a Chile nyaa fawohodi.`
---------------------- (718) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ Chile nyaa fawohodie wɔ 1810 (berɛ a Napoleon ko no maa Spain bɛdaa hɔ a na onni aban a edi so bɛyɛ mfeɛ bi no), wɔantumi anye wɔn ho amfiri Spainfoɔ no nsam kosi 1818.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ Chile nyaa fawohodi wɔ 1810 (bere a Napoleon ko no maa Spain bɛdaa hɔ a na onni aban a edi so bɛyɛ mfe bi no), wɔantumi anye wɔn ho amfi Spainfo no nsam kosi 1818.`
---------------------- (719) ----------------------
F1: `Dominican Republic (Spainfoↄ kasa: Republica Dominicana) yɛ Caribeanfo kurow a ɛda hispaniola apuei mantam, na ɛne Haiti na ɛbↄ hyeɛ.`
F2: `Dominican Republic (Spainfo kasa: Republica Dominicana) yɛ Caribbeanfo kurow a ɛda hispaniola apuei mantam, na ɛne Haiti na ɛbↄ hye.`
---------------------- (720) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ yɛde ne mpoano a anwea fitaa aye so ma ne mmepↄw a atwa ho ahyia no to nkyɛn a, ehↄ na wubehu Europe kuro keseɛ a akye yie wↄ Americas hↄ, a afei eka Santo Domingo ho.`
F2: `Sɛ yɛde ne mpoano a anwea fitaa ayɛ so ma ne mmepↄw a atwa ho ahyia no to nkyɛn a,ɛhↄ na wubehu Europe kuro kɛse a akyɛ yie wↄ Americas hↄ, a seesei ɛka San Domingo ho no.`
---------------------- (721) ----------------------
F1: `Tainofoↄ ne Caribefoↄ na wodii kan bɛtenaa supo no so. Na Caribefoↄ ka Arawakan kasa no, na wↄbaa hↄ wↄ afe 10,000 ansaana yɛn berɛ yi mu.`
F2: `Tainofo ne Caribbeanfo na wodii kan bɛtenaa supↄw no so. Na caribbeanfo no ka Arawakan kasa, na wↄbaa hↄ wↄ afe 10,000(mpem du) ansa na yɛn bere yi mu.`
---------------------- (722) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ Europe nhwehwɛmufoↄ no mmaeɛ, mfeɛ kakra bi akyiri no, Spainfoↄ a wobedii Tainosfoↄ no so no maa wↄn dodoↄ no so tee koraa.`
F2: `Wↄ abɔrehufo a wofi Europe no mmae mfe kakra bi akyi no, spainfo a wobedii tainofo no so no maa wↄn dodow so tee koraa.`
---------------------- (723) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛdeɛ Fray Bartolome de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) kyerɛ no, efiri afe 1492 kosi 1498 mu no, Spainfoↄ a wobedii wↄn soↄ no kumkum Tainofo bɛyɛ 100,000.`
F2: `Sɛnea Fray Bartolome de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) kyerɛ no, efi afe 1492 kosi 1498 mu no, spainfo a wobedii wↄn so no kumkum Tainofo bɛyɛ 100,000.`
---------------------- (724) ----------------------
F1: `Jardin de la Union. Wɔyɛɛ saa beaeɛ yi sɛ asa maa ahotefoɔ fie no wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 17, nanso Templo de San Diego pɛ ne dan a aka si hɔ.`
F2: `Jardin de la Union. Wɔyɛɛ saa beae yi sɛ asa maa ahotefo fie no wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 17, nanso Templo de San Diego pɛ ne dan a aka si hɔ.`
---------------------- (725) ----------------------
F1: `Seesei wɔde ɛhɔ ayɛ adwadibea kɛseɛ, na dwumadie kɔ so wɔ hɔ ɛberɛ biara, anɔpa ne anadwo.`
F2: `Seesei wɔde ɛhɔ ayɛ aguadibea kɛse, na dwumadi kɔ so wɔ hɔ bere biara, ɛda no mu ne anadwo.`
---------------------- (726) ----------------------
F1: `Adidibea ahodoɔ etwa turo no ho ahyia, wɔyɛ kɔnsɛte a wongye hwee awiaberɛ ne anwummerɛ biara firi central gazebo.`
F2: `Adidibea ahorow etwa turo no ho ahyia , wɔyɛ kɔnsɛte a wonnye hwee awiabere ne anwummere biara fi central gazebo.`
---------------------- (729) ----------------------
F1: `Bowen Island yɛ da akwantuo anaa nnawɔtwe awieɛ nsrahwɛ a wɔma kayak so akwantuo, hiking, aguadie beaɛ, adidie beaeɛ ne mmeaɛ ahodoɔ pii.`
F2: `Bowen supɔw no yɛ da mu akwantu anaa nnawɔtwe awiei nsrahwɛ a wɔka kayak wɔ nsu so, wɔtwa kwan tenten, sotɔɔ ahorow wɔ hɔ, adidibea ahorow ne bebree a ɛka ho.`
---------------------- (730) ----------------------
F1: `Mpɔtam a edi mu yi wɔ Howe Sound wɔ Vancouver nkyɛn, na wotumi kɔ hɔ a wommerɛ denam nsuo so hyɛn ho nhyehyɛe efiri Granville Nsuopɔ so wɔ downtown Vancouver.`
F2: `Saa mpɔtam ɛda mu fua wɔ Howe Sound a ɛne Vancouver ntam nware na ɛnyɛ den sɛ wode kodoɔ a efi Granville supɔw no so wɔ Vancouver kuro no mu.`
---------------------- (731) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔn anigye abɔntennim agorɔdie ho no, Sea to Sky corridor ho nanteɛ no hia wɔn paa.`
F2: `Wɔn nso a wɔpɛ anigyede a wɔyɛ no abɔnten no, ebehia sɛ wɔnantew fa abrannaa a ɛwɔ wim a ɛfa ɛpo no so.`
---------------------- (732) ----------------------
F1: `Whistler (dɔnhwerew 1.5 hyɛnka afi Vancouver) asetena boɔ yɛ den nanso agye din paa esane 2010 Winter Olympics no enti.`
F2: `Whistler (wode kaa fi Vancouver rekɔ hɔ yɛ nnɔnhwerew 1.5) bo yɛ den yiye nanso agye din paa esaine 2010 Olympics a wɔyɛ no awɔw bere mu no nti.`
---------------------- (733) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ awɔbereɛ mu no, fa wo ho hyɛ nsuokyerɛma so agorɔdie a ɛyɛ paa no bi mu wɔ North America, na ahohuruberɛ mu no sɔ bepɔ so sakre twe a ɛyɛ papapaa no bi nso hwɛ.`
F2: `Wɔ awɔw bere mu no, nya ski a wɔde hyɛ nan ase sane fa bepɔw a sukyerɛma wɔ so wɔ North America mu mfaso, na wɔ ɔhyew bere mu no sɔ bepɔw so sakre twi a ɛda mu fua no hwɛ.`
---------------------- (734) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsɛ sɛ wogye hokwan to hɔ ansa. Ɛsɛ sɛ wonya hokwan no ansa na wobetumi atena Sirena ama adeɛ akye.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ wodi kan gye akwammisa krataa to hɔ. Ɛsɛ sɛ wonya akwanmisa krataa ansa na woatumi atena Sirena ma ade kye.`
---------------------- (735) ----------------------
F1: `Sirena nkoaa na ɛyɛ kwaeɛhwɛfoɔ atenaeɛ a ɛma kwan ma nnipa mmienu anaa deɛ ɛboro saa da na wɔma aduane a ɛyɛ hye na abɔnten nsraban mu da ka ho. La Leona, San Pedrillo, ne Los Patos ma abɔnten nsraban mu da a aduane nnka ho.`
F2: `Sirena nko ara ahomegyebea abammɔfo atenae a ɛma adan a wobɛda mu ne aduane a ɛyɛ hye ka beae a wobetumi asoeɛ wɔ abɔnten no ho. La Leona, San Pedrillo, ne Los Patos ma beae a wobetumi asoeɛ wɔ abɔnten a aduane nka ho.`
---------------------- (736) ----------------------
F1: `Wobetumi agye turo ho kwan tee afi Kwaeɛhwɛfoɔ Atenaeɛ wɔ Puerto Jiménez, nanso wɔngye credit cards`
F2: `Wobetumi anya ahomegyebea akwammisa krataa tee efi wɔn a wɔbɔ hɔ ban no atennae wɔ Puerto Rico Jiménez, nanso wɔnnye kaade a wɔde tua ade ka no.`
---------------------- (737) ----------------------
F1: `Turo Adwumayɛbea (MINAE) no mma turo hokwan nto hɔ ma no nntra bosome baako a wɔsusu sɛ obi de bɛba no.`
F2: `Ahomegyebea Adwumakuw (MINAE) remma wo akwammisa krataa bosome baako ansa na da a wobɛba no aduru so.`
---------------------- (738) ----------------------
F1: `CafeNet El Sol ma kwan ma wo kora beaeɛ no so to hɔ na wɔgye US$30, anaa $10 ma wo twa da-koro; ɛho nsɛm wɔ Corcovado kratafa no so.`
F2: `CafeNet El Sol gye US$30 na woama wo hokwan sɛ wobetumi akora akwammisa krataa so, anaa $10 sɛ wopɛ sɛ wohwɛ hɔ da mu no a; ɛho nsɛm pii wɔ wɔn Corcovado afa hɔ.`
---------------------- (739) ----------------------
F1: `Cook nsuopɔ no yɛ nsuopɔ ɔman a ɛne New Zealand bɔ fekuo, ɛwɔ Polynesia, wɔ Anaafoɔfam Pacific Ɛpo no mfinimfini.`
F2: `Cook Islands yɛ supɔw man a ɛne New Zealand ntam yɛ, a ɛwɔ Polynesia, wɔ South Pacific Ocean no mfinfini.`
---------------------- (740) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛyɛ nsuopɔ kuo a ɛwɔ nsuopɔ 15 a apete ɛpo 2.2 million km2 so.`
F2: `Ɛyɛ supɔwkuw a supɔw 15 a apete afa ɛpo no so bɛboro ɔpepem 2.2 km² na ɛwɔ mu.`
---------------------- (741) ----------------------
F1: `Esane sɛ wɔne Hawaii wɔ berɛ baako mu nti, wɔ tae ferɛ nsuopɔ no "Hawaii down under".`
F2: `Esaine sɛ wɔne Hawaii da beae koro no nti, ɛtɔ da a wɔfrɛ wɔn “Hawaii ase hɔ”.`
---------------------- (742) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ esua no, ɛkae ahɔhoɔ a wɔn mfe akɔ anim no sɛdeɛ na Hawaii teɛ ansa na ɛdee ne ho ne ahɔhoɔdan akɛseɛ ne mpuntuo ahodoɔ.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ esua no, Hawaii nsrahwɛfo a wɔn mfe akɔ anim no kae bere a etwam a na enni nsrahwɛ ahɔhogyebea akɛse ne nkɔanim ahorow.`
---------------------- (743) ----------------------
F1: `Kuropɔn biara nni Cook nsuopɔ no so na ɛmom nsuopɔ 15 na ɛwɔ so. Deɛ ɛyɛ emu titire yɛ Rarotonga ne Aitutaki.`
F2: `Cook Island nni nkuro ahorow mmom no ɛyɛ supɔw ahorow 15 a aka abom.Nea edi mu akoten ne Rarotonga ne Aittutaki.`
---------------------- (744) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ aman a atu mpɔn nnɛ so, a wɔma ɛmpa a ɛyɛ papa ne anɔpaduane nso no wɔn ama no anya nkɔanim ama abɛyɛ soronko.`
F2: `Wɔ aman a akɔ wɔn anim mu no, wɔama nhyehyɛe a wɔayɛ sɛ wobenya mpa ne anɔpa aduane papa a ne bo yɛ den no abɛyɛ biribi a obiara di akyi.`
---------------------- (745) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ soro hɔ pɛɛ no, B&Bs si akan wɔ neama titire mmienu ho: ɛmpa ne anɔpaduane.`
F2: `Wɔ ne fa kɛse no ara mu no, wɔn a wɔyɛ B&B no si akan wɔ nneɛma mmienu ho: mpa a wobɛda so ne anɔpa aduane.`
---------------------- (746) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ no, ɛwɔ mmeaeɛ a ɛtete saa no ɛsɛ sɛ obi si gyinaeɛ sɛ obenya ɛmpa a ne boɔ yɛ den, ebia mpasotam a wɔde nsa ayɛ anaa tete ɛmpa a ne boɔ yɛ den.`
F2: `Sɛnea ɛte no, wɔ saa mmeae yi mu nea ɛyɛ fɛ paa no, ɛnkyɛ na woanya mpa a wobɛda so a ahotɔ wom, ebia nnaso a wɔde nsa ayɛ anaa tete mpa a ne bo yɛ den.`
---------------------- (747) ----------------------
F1: `Nnuane a ɛba berɛ ne berɛ mu wɔ ɔmantam no mu no wɔtumi de yɛ anɔpaduane anaa aduane a ɔhɔhoɔ no pɛ.`
F2: `Anɔpa aduane no betumi ayɛ mpɔtam hɔ nnuane a wɔpɛ paa anaasɛ ahɔhogyefo no aduane a ɛda nsow.`
---------------------- (748) ----------------------
F1: `Beaɛ no betumi ayɛ tete ɔdan a agye din a wɔde tete neama asiesie mu, saare a wɔn atwa no kama ne beaɛ a wɔdware nsuo.`
F2: `Ɛhɔ betumi ayɛ tete dan bi a agye din wɔ abakɔsɛm mu a wɔde tete nneɛma a ne bo yɛ den asiesie hɔ, fam a wɔatwa ma ayɛ fɛ ne nsu a ɛtaa hɔ a woguare mu.`
---------------------- (749) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wobɛtu w'ankasa wo hyɛn de atu kwan tenten wɔ lɔre kwanso no yɛ adeɛ a ɛho hia obiara esani sɛdeɛ ɛnyɛ kyɛnkyerɛkyɛnn no nti.`
F2: `Wobɛtena wo kaa mu na woasim akɔ kwan tenten akwantu yɛ ade a ɛyɛ anika kɛkɛ na ɛnyɛ kyɛnkyerɛkyɛnn biara.`
---------------------- (750) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnte sɛ hyɛn akɛseɛ no, wo nim sɛdeɛ woka wo hyɛn no deda na wonim hyɛn no ahoɔden.`
F2: `Wonim w’ankasa kaa a woka no yiye ne nea etumi yɛ ne nea entumi nyɛ, nanso ɛnte saa wɔ kaa akɛse ho.`
---------------------- (751) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wosi ntomadan wɔ w'asase so anaa wɔ kuro mu a ɛmfa ho sɛdeɛ ne kɛseɛ te no ɛnyɛ den sɛ ɛbɛ twetwe nkurɔfoɔ adwene aba wo so.`
F2: `Ntamadan a wobesi wɔ ankorɛankorɛ agyapade so anaasɛ wɔ kurom, ɛmfa ho sɛnea ne kɛse te no betumi atwetwe adwen a ɛmfata aba wo so.`
---------------------- (752) ----------------------
F1: `Ne tia twa mu no, w'ankasa wo hyɛn a wode bɛ fa lɔre kwan so atu kwan a ɛnyɛ adeɛ a nkurɔfoɔ tae yɛ no yɛ ɔkwan a wɔfa so "camp".`
F2: `Ne tiatwa mu no, sɛ wode w’ankasa wo kaa no yɛ ɔkwan pa a wobetumi afa so de atu saa kwan yi nanso ɛtɔ mmere bi a eno ara nso yɛ ɔkwan a wɔfa so “soeɛ wɔ abɔnten”.`
---------------------- (753) ----------------------
F1: `Hyɛn mu akwantuo betumi ayɛ yie sɛ wo wɔ minivan kɛseɛ, SUV, Sedan anaa Station Wagon a wotumi bu nkɔnnua no mu ma no da hɔ a.`
F2: `Sɛ wobɛsoeɛ wɔ wo kaa mu no betumi ayɛ yiye bere a wowɔ bɔɔso ketewa bi, SUV, Sedan anaa station wagon a emu nkonnwa tumi da hɔ.`
---------------------- (754) ----------------------
F1: `Ahɔhoɔ dan no bi wɔ abakɔsɛm a afi sika kɔkɔɔ bere mu wɔ keteke kwan so ahuruhuro ne ɛpo so hyɛn akɛseɛ berɛ so; ansana Wiase Nyinaa Ko a ɛtɔ so mmienu no, wɔ 19th anaa 20th centuries mfitiaseɛ no.`
F2: `Ahɔhogyebea binom nyaa wɔn nhyiase fii bere a na wɔde keteke a ɛde ntutu yɛ adwuma ne po so hyɛn akɛse di dwuma no;ansa na Wiase Ko a ɛtɔ so Mmienu reba no, wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 19 ne 20 mu no.`
---------------------- (755) ----------------------
F1: `Na saa ahɔhoɔ dan wei yɛ beaɛ a na asikafoɔ a wɔn agye din no tena, na wodi nnuane pa na wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ anigyediɛ a ɛkɔ so anadwo mu.`
F2: `Saa ahɔhogyebea yi ne baabi a na asikafo ne wɔn a wɔagye din tena, na mpɛn pii no na wodi nnuane pa na wɔgye wɔn ani anadwo no nso.`
---------------------- (756) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn tete fittings a atwam, neama a aba soɔ a wɔnni bi, ne wɔn tetesɛm a anuonyam wɔ mu no nyinaa ka wɔn suban no ho.`
F2: `Tete nneɛma a etwam a wɔde asiesie hɔ, nnɛyi nneɛma ahorow a na enni hɔ saa mmere no ne sɛnea akyɛ nso ɛyɛ fɛ no ka sɛnea na ɛte no ho.`
---------------------- (757) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwɔ mu sɛ ɛnyɛ ɔman adeɛ deɛ, nanso ɛtɔ da bi a wɔgye ahɔhoɔ bi tesɛ aman mpanyinfoɔ na atitire ahodoɔ.`
F2: `Bere a na ɛyɛ ankorɛankorɛ de no, na ɛtɔ da a, aman mpaninfo a wɔaba nsrahwɛ ne atitiriw tena hɔ.`
---------------------- (758) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔkwantofoɔ a ɔwɔ sika paa no betumi asusu ho sɛ obetu kwan akɔ wiase nyinaa, na watena tena saa ahɔhoɔ dan ahodoɔ pii wei mu.`
F2: `Ɔkwantufo a ɔwɔ sika bebree bɛpɛ sɛ ɔfa wimhyɛn a ɛbɛkɔ wiase afanan nyinaa, na egyina mmeae ma wɔtena saa ahɔhogyebea ahorow yi mu.`
---------------------- (759) ----------------------
F1: `Ahɔhoyɛ adwumayɛbeaɛ kuo yɛ bi kuo a wɔ ka akwantufoɔ ne ɔmanfoɔ a wɔwɔ nkuro a wɔ kɔ so no bɔ mu.`
F2: `Ahɔhoyɛ nsesae kuw no yɛ kuw bi a wɔka akwantufo ne kuro a wɔrekɔ hɔ nsrahwɛ no mufo bom.`
---------------------- (760) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wɔ de wo ho ka kuo wei ho a deɛ ahia ne sɛ wo bɛ hyehyɛ krataa bi wɔ wiase nyina ntontan so; nanso ebia wɔde nhyehyɛeɛ foforɔ bɛ ma wo anaa wɔ bɛ hia neama bi aka ho ansa na adi mu.`
F2: `Sɛ wobɛdom saa kuw yi a, nea wobɛyɛ ara ne sɛ wobɛhyehyɛ intanɛt so kratawa bi; ɛwom sɛ kuw ahorow bi ma anaa wɔhwehwɛ adanse bi aka ho.`
---------------------- (761) ----------------------
F1: `Afei wɔbɛma wo ahɔhoɔ dan ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ no nyinaa din wɔ krataa so anaa wɔ wiase nyinaa ntontan so, ɛtɔ da bi a wɔbɛma wo ntotoho ne mpɛnsɛnpɛnsɛnmu a ahɔhoɔ afoforɔ ayɛ nso.`
F2: `Afei wɔtintim wɔn a wobenya hokwan agye ahɔho wɔ krataa so ne/anaasɛ wɔ intanɛt so, na ɛtɔ da a, wɔde wɔn a wobetumi abisa wɔn ase wɔ wɔn hɔ ka ho ne nea akwantufo afoforo aka afa ho no ka ho.`
---------------------- (762) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ firi couchsurfing aseɛ wɔ Ɔpɛpɔn 2004 mu aberɛ a kɔmputa so dwumedieyɛfoɔ Casey Fenton nyaa ewiemuhyɛn mu akwantuo a ne boɔ wɔ fam de kɔɔ Iceland akyire no nanso na onni baabi a ɔbɛ tena no.`
F2: `Bere tiaa mu asetena hyɛɛ ase wɔ Ɔpɛpɔn 2004 bere a kɔmputa mu nimdefo Casey Fenton nyaa wimhyɛn bi a ne bo yɛ fo kɔɔ Iceland nanso woanya baabi antena no.`
---------------------- (763) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔde email maa asuafoɔ a wɔwɔ ɔman no suapɔn no mu na onyaa wɔn mu beberee a wɔpenee so sɛ ɔmɛ tena wɔn nkyɛn a wɔrengye no hwe.`
F2: `Ɔtoo nkra faa intanɛt so kɔmaa sukuufo a wɔwɔ sukuupɔn a na ɛwɔ hɔ no na onyaa baabi a ɔbɛda a wonye hwee pii a na ɛboro adwen ne ntiase so.`
---------------------- (764) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔ hwɛ ahɔhoɔ dan so no tae yɛ mmranteɛ ne mmbabaawa – a wɔn adi bɛyɛ mfe aduonu – nanso wobetumi ahu ahɔhoɔ a wɔyɛ mpanyinfoɔ nso wɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Asukuufo dabere ahorow no taa hwɛ mmerante ne mmabaawa ̶ wɔn a wɔtaa fa wɔn no wɔ wɔn mfe aduonu mu ̶ nanso wobɛtaa ahu akwantufo a wɔn mfe akɔ anim wɔ hɔ nso.`
---------------------- (765) ----------------------
F1: `Worentae nhu abusua a mɔfra ka ho wɔ hɔ, nanso ahɔhoɔ dan bi ma wɔn hokwan wɔ adan a ɛyɛ kokoamu dan mu.`
F2: `Wontaa nhu mmusua a mmofra ka ho, nanso asukuufo dabere binom ma kwan ma wɔtena ankorɛankorɛ dan mu.`
---------------------- (766) ----------------------
F1: `Beijing kuro a ɛwɔ China no na ɛyɛ kuro a Olympic Winter Games wɔ 2022 no bɛkɔ so wɔ mu, na ɛno bɛma no ayɛ kuro a adi kan a ahohuruberɛ ne awɔberɛ mu Olympics bɛkɔ so wɔ mu.`
F2: `Beijing kuro a ɛwɔ China na Olympic Awɔw bere Agodi a ɛbɛba so wɔ 2022 mu no gyina ne nan so,na wei ɛbɛma abɛyɛ kuro a edi kan a wɔayɛ Olympic no mmienu, ɔhyew ne awɔw mmere mu de no nyinaa.`
---------------------- (767) ----------------------
F1: `Mfitiaseɛ ne awieɛ dwumadie no bɛkɔ so wɔ Beijing na dan mu nsuokyene dwumedie no nso bɛ kɔ so wɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Beijing na dwumadi a wɔde bɛhyɛ ase na wɔde bɛpɔn no si ne nan so na dwumadi a wɔyɛ no nsukyeneso wɔ ɔdan mu no nso ka ho.`
---------------------- (768) ----------------------
F1: `Nsuokyɛrɛma so agudie ahodoɔ bɛ kɔ so wɔ Taizicheng nsuokyɛrɛma agudiebeaɛ hɔ wɔ Zhangjiakou, bɛyɛ 220 km (140 miles) fi Beijing.`
F2: `Ski a wɔde hyɛ nan ase sane fa sukyerɛma so dwumadi ahorow no bɛkɔ so wɔ Taizicheng beae a wɔyɛ ski wɔ Zhangjiakou, bɛyɛ 220 km ( akwansini 140) fi Beijing.`
---------------------- (769) ----------------------
F1: `Asɔredan no pii yɛ afahyɛ afe biara afi Obubuo awieɛ kosi Kotonima mfinimfini, na ne sesa a ɛsesa no gyina asɔredan biara ne n'afe biara abunna nhoma so.`
F2: `Asɔredan no mu dodow no ara yɛ afahyɛ afe biara a ɛhyɛ ase Obubuo awiei kosi Kotonimma mfinfini. na nsonsonoe wɔ mu esaine asɔredan biara kalɛnda a odi di dwuma no nti.`
---------------------- (770) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔdi asɔredan no afakyɛ pii ka asɔredan no afidie ho anaa onyame a ɔhwɛ asɔredan no awoɔda anaa dwumedie titire biara a ɛfa asɔredan no ho no.`
F2: `Asɔredan no afahyɛ no mu dodow no ara kɔ so bere a wɔredi asɔredan no afeda anaasɛ onyame a ɔda so no awoda anaa dwumadi titiriw bi a ɛfa asɔredan no ho.`
---------------------- (771) ----------------------
F1: `Kerala asɔredan afahyɛ yɛ anika paa, ne asono a wɔn asiesie wɔn fɛfɛɛfɛ a wɔ sa wɔn santene, asɔredan adwontofoɔ ne afahyɛ afoforɔ.`
F2: `Kerala asɔredan afahyɛ no yɛ anika paa sɛ worehwɛ a, bere a asono a wɔasiesie wɔn to santen fa kurom, asɔre no adwontofo ne dwumadi ahorow.`
---------------------- (772) ----------------------
F1: `World's Fair (a wɔtae ferɛ no World Exposition, anaa ne teawa mu no Expo) yɛ amanaman ntam adwinni ne abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɛ ho afahyɛ.`
F2: `Wiase Aguabɔ (a wɔtaa frɛ no World Exposition, anaa Expo) yɛ afahyɛ kɛse a ɛfa nneɛma a yetumi de yɛn nsa yɛ ne abɔde mu nyansapɛ.`
---------------------- (773) ----------------------
F1: `Aman a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ mu no de adwinideɛ ne adesuadeɛ ba ɔman ntamadan aseɛ de kyerɛ wiase nsɛm anaa ɔman bi amammerɛ ne n'abakɔsɛm.`
F2: `Aman ahorow a wɔde wɔn ahyɛ mu no de nneɛma a yɛde nsa ayɛ ne nea ɛfa adesua ho wɔ national pavilion de da wiase no mu nsɛm ho anaa wɔn man amammerɛ ne history.`
---------------------- (774) ----------------------
F1: `International Horticultural Expositions yɛ dwumadie soronko a ɛda nhwiren, afifideɛ turo ne biribiara a ɛfa nnua ho adi.`
F2: `International Horticultural Exposition yɛ dwumadi soronko a wɔde da nhwiren adi, turo ahorow ne biribiara a ɛfa mfifide ho.`
---------------------- (775) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwɔ mu sɛ wɔ nsɛmka mu no wɔbetumi ayɛ no afe biara (aberɛ a wɔwɔ aman afoforɔ so), nanso wɔntae nnyɛ.`
F2: `Sɛ yɛreka a, ebetumi aba so afe biara (nea ehia ara ne sɛ wɔwɔ aman ahorow so), nanso sɛ yɛba ne yɛ mu a, ɛnte saa.`
---------------------- (776) ----------------------
F1: `Saa dwumadie ahodoɔ wei tae kɔso wɔ abosome mmiɛnsa ne nsia ntam, na wɔyɛ wɔ asase bɛyɛ 50 hectares so.`
F2: `Saa dwumadi ahorow yi di fi abosome mmiɛnsa kosi nsia, na wɔyɛ wɔ mmeae a ne kɛse bɛyɛ sɛ hɛkta 50.`
---------------------- (777) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔwɔ sini yie ho akwan pii a wɔde adi dwuma mfe a atwa mu yi. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) yɛ deɛ obiara nim.`
F2: `Yɛwɔ akwan ahorow a wɔde twa mfoni a wɔde adi dwuma mfe bebree ni.Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 negative) na wɔde di dwuma paa.`
---------------------- (778) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ ɛsa pɛ wobetumi ahyɛ no ma biom sɛ ɛsa a, na ɛho mfonini bɛyɛ tesɛ DSLR a aba so no.`
F2: `Wobetumi de foforo ahyɛ mu sɛ ɛsa a, na wode ato senea ɛsɛ sɛ ɛda a wobetumi de atoto nnɛyi DSLR ho.`
---------------------- (779) ----------------------
F1: `Medium-format sini ho mfonintwa mfidie de 6 by 6 cm yɛbea na ɛyɛ adwuma, te sɛ 56 by 56 mm negative pɛpɛɛpɛ.`
F2: `Kamɛra no bi de 6 by 6 cm format na edi dwuma, sɛ yɛbɛka no yiye a 56 by 56 mm negative.`
---------------------- (780) ----------------------
F1: `Wie ma nsakraeɛ bɛyɛ mpɛn anan te sɛ nea ɛyɛ 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).`
F2: `Wei ma baabi a ɛda no yɛ papa sen 35 mm negative (3136 mm² versus 864) mmɔho nan.`
---------------------- (781) ----------------------
F1: `Mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu ka mfonini ho adwuma a ɛyɛ den paa ma mfoninitwafoɔ, na ɛhia nsiadeɛ papa, aboterɛ, suahunu ne adwinnadeɛ ɛyɛ papa a wɔn aka abɔ mu.`
F2: `Wuram mmoa ne afifide ne adwuma a ɛyɛ den paa ma mfonintwafo, na ohia akraye, ntoboase, suahu ne mfidie a ɛyɛ papa a yɛaka abom.`
---------------------- (782) ----------------------
F1: `Mpɛn pii no wɔnkyerɛ mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu ho mfonini twa ho anisɔ, nanso tesɛ mfoninitwa biara no, mfonini biara som bo tesɛ nsɛmfua apem.`
F2: `Ɛyɛ nea wɔato wuram mmoa ne afifide mfonintwa agyagyamu, nanso sɛnea mfonintwa nyinaa te no, mfoni baako ka nsɛm pii.`
---------------------- (783) ----------------------
F1: `Mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu ho mfonini twa ɛtaa hia telephoto ahwehwɛ, ɛmfa ho sɛ nneama bi tesɛ nnomaa kuo anaasɛ abɔdeɛ nketewa bi hia ahwehwɛ afoforɔ.`
F2: `Wohia kamɛra soronko bi a wɔde twa wuram mmoa ne afifide mfonin, ɛwom sɛ biribi te sɛ nnomaa a ɛretu abom anaa aboa ketewaa bi hia kamɛra foforo de.`
---------------------- (784) ----------------------
F1: `Mmoa a wɔfiri aman foforɔ so pii ho yɛ nna, na ɛtɔ da a turo no wɔ mmra a ɛfa mfonin a wotwa ma aguadi botae no ho.`
F2: `Ɛyɛ den sɛ wobenya mmoa a wofri amanɔne no, na beae ahorow a mmoa no wɔ no, wɔ mmara wɔ mfonin a obi betwa sɛ orekɔtɔn ho.`
---------------------- (785) ----------------------
F1: `Mmoa a wɔn ani so yɛ den betumi afɛre adeɛ anaa wɔn ayɛ keka. Mpɔtam hɔ betumi ayɛ nwunu, hyehyeehye, anaasɛ ɛdɔm.`
F2: `Wuram mu mmoa betumi afɛre adeɛ anaa w’atow ahyɛ wo so.`
---------------------- (786) ----------------------
F1: `Wiase no wɔ kasa ahodoɔ bɛboro 5,000, a akasafoɔ bɛboro aduonu ne ɔpepem 50 ka ho.`
F2: `Kasa ahorow bɛboro 5000 na ɛwɔ wiase nyinaa, na nnipa bɛyɛ ɔpepem 50 anaa nea ɛboro saa ka emu aduonu.`
---------------------- (787) ----------------------
F1: `Mpɛn pii no ɛyɛ mmerɛ sɛ wobɛte nsɛm a wɔtwerɛ aseɛ sen nsɛm a wɔka, nso. Wei yɛ nokorɛ titire wɔ akwankyerɛ ho, a ɛtaa yɛ den sɛ wobɛbɔ din no wɔ nteaseɛ mu.`
F2: `Ɛnyɛ den nso sɛ wobɛte nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw ase sen nea wɔaka.Wei yɛ nokware bere a worekyerɛ obi w’akyirikwan, a mpɛn pii no ɛyɛ den sɛ wobɛka ma emu ada hɔ.`
---------------------- (788) ----------------------
