F1: `Amanfoɔ no nyinaa dodoɔ naa ka Borɔfo kasa yie, nea ɛsen saa no wobetumi ahwɛ nimdeɛ a ɛwɔ ɔhye kwan - ne titire wɔ nnipa a wɔsusua mu.`
F2: `Aman mu bebree ka Borɔfo yiye ankasa; na wɔ bebree mu nso wobetumi ahwɛ kwan sɛ nimdeɛ a wɔwɔ wɔ ho no sua - titiriw no wɔ mmabun no mu.`
---------------------- (789) ----------------------
F1: `Fa no sɛ, sɛ wo bɛyɛ a, Manchester ni, Bostwana ni, Jamaica ni ne Sydney ni a wɔte adiediepon ho redi anwummerɛ aduane wɔ adiediebea bi mu wɔ Toronto.`
F2: `Susuw ho hwɛ, sɛ wobɛyɛ a, Manchesterni, Bostonni,Jamaicani ne Sydneyni te ɔpon ho atwa ahyia redi anwunmmere aduane wɔ adidibea bi wɔ Toronto.`
---------------------- (790) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ de anansesɛm a efiri wɔn kuro mu gyegye wɔn ani, wɔka wɔ wɔn kasa a ɛda nsow mu ne wɔn kokoam kasa titire mu.`
F2: `Wɔn mu biara reseresere esaine wɔn kurom nsɛm a wɔreka no nti, na wɔreka no sɛnea wɔka no wɔ kuro kasa mu ne sɛnea wɔbɔ nsɛmfua no.`
---------------------- (791) ----------------------
F1: `Aduane a wɔtɔ wɔ aguadibea a abaso no taa yɛ ɔkwan a ɛyɛ fo a wobɛtumi anya aduane adi. Sɛ aduane yɛ akwannya ɛnni hɔ a, aduane a wɔasiesie deda na wɔpaw.`
F2: `Aduane a wobɛtɔ wɔ supermarket ne ɔkwan a ɛyɛ fo koraa a wobenya biribi adi.Esaine sɛ hokwan pii nni hɔ a wode bɛnoa aduane nti, hokwan a wowɔ ara ne sɛ wobɛtɔ nea wɔanoa dedaw.`
---------------------- (792) ----------------------
F1: `Aguadiebea a abaso no nya nduane a wɔn asiesie no deda ahodoɔ pii ho nkɔsoɔ. Ebinom nso ma afidie a wɔde ka aduane hye anaa wɔ fa akwan foforɔ so ka aduane hye.`
F2: `Supermarket ahorow no anya afa ahorow a aduane a wɔanoa dedaw wɔ hɔ mu nkoanim. Ebinom mpo wɔ afidie a wɔde ka aduane hye anaa ɔkwan foforo a wobetumi afa so aka w’aduane hye.`
---------------------- (793) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ aman bi so anaasɛ adekoradan ahodoɔ mu no anyɛ yie koraa no adidibea baako wɔ hɔ, mpɛn pii no nea nhyehyɛe ɛnni ho a wɔn boɔ wɔ fam.`
F2: `Wɔ aman bi mu anaa sotɔɔ ahorow mu no, anyɛ yiye koraa no wobenya adidibea wɔ hɔ, mpɛn pii no ɛhɔ nyɛ katee na ne bo nso yɛ.`
---------------------- (794) ----------------------
F1: `Yɛ na fa wo amansɛm ho nsɛsoɔ ne nipa a ɔyɛ nsiakyibaa no ɔfrɛ ho nsɛm ka wo ho.`
F2: `Yɛ wo nsiakyibaa nhyehyɛe no ne wɔn ho nsɛm a ɛbɛma wo nsa aka wɔn no sɛso pii fa hyɛ wo ho.`
---------------------- (795) ----------------------
F1: `Ehia sɛ wɔde nipa ko a ɔyɛ nsiakyibaa no e-mail akwankyerɛ ne amanaman ahomatorofoɔ akontahyɛdeɛ kyerɛ na wɔma wo ɛho afuotuo/tumi ne ade pere.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ wohu wɔn a wɔyɛ nsiakyibaa no intanɛt so ekyirikwan ne wɔn tɛlɛfon nɔma ahorow a wotumi frɛ wɔ baabiara na wɔatumi agye akwankyerɛ/hokwan na wɔatumi nso agye wɔn sika.`
---------------------- (796) ----------------------
F1: `Nya ne sɛso foforɔ wɔ wo bɔtɔ mu ne wiase nyinaa ntontan so (mane wo ho fa e-mail so fa akadeɛ no ka ho, anaa kora so wɔ "cloud").`
F2: `Fa krataa no sɛso no bi hyɛ wo nneɛma mu ne intanɛt so (wobetumi de bi ato wo email mu, anaa wobɛkora so wɔ “cloud”).`
---------------------- (797) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wode laptop anaa tablet retu kwan a, kora ne sɛso no bi wɔ ne nkaeɛ anaasɛ ne nkaeɛ afidie so (wonhia wiase ntontan keseɛ ansa na wonsa aka).`
F2: `Sɛ wode wo laptɔp anaa tablɛt retu kwan no a, wobetumi akora bi wɔ n’adwene no mu anaa nea wɔkyere nsɛm gu so no (wo nsa betumi aka bere a intanɛt nni hɔ no).`
---------------------- (798) ----------------------
F1: `Afei nso fa ɔmansem/ɔfrɛ sɛso ma akwantuo mu ayɔnkofoɔ ne abusuafoɔ anaasɛ nnamfoɔ a wɔwɔ fie na wɔwɔ ɔpɛ sɛ wɔbɛboa no.`
F2: `Fa wo nsiakyibaa ho nhyehyɛe/wɔn ho nsɛm a ɛbɛma wo nsa aka wɔn no ma nnamfo a wone wɔn retu kwan, abusuafo anaa nnamfo a wɔwɔ fie a wɔbɛpɛ sɛ wɔboa.`
---------------------- (799) ----------------------
F1: `Torɔn (ɔsan nso de Ɔforɔteɛ kɔkɔɔ) ɛnyɛ keka firi awoɔ mu, nanso wɔbɛbɔ wɔn ho ban sɛ wɔte nka sɛ biribi bɔ wɔn hu a.`
F2: `Torɔn (a wɔsan frɛ no elk) nyɛ mmoa a wɔn ani so yɛ hye, nanso wɔbɛbɔ wɔn ho ban bere a wosusuw sɛ esiane bi reba no.`
---------------------- (800) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ nnipa nnhu sɛ torɔn ho betumi ayɛ hu a, ebia wɔ bɛ bɛn no dodo na wɔ de wɔn ho bɛ to amaneɛ mu.`
F2: `Bere a nkurɔfo nhu sɛ Torɔn no ho betumi ayɛ hu no, wɔbɛtwe abɛn wɔn dodow na wɔde wɔn nkwa bɛto asiane mu.`
---------------------- (801) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ worenom nsa a susu. Nsa ho nsunsuasoɔ gyina onipa ko no so nti sԑ wohunu deԑ wohia a, ԑho hia pa ara.`
F2: `Nom nsa a ano yɛ den kakraa bi. Ɛsono sɛnea obiara yɛ n’ade bere a woanom nsa no, ɛno nti hu a wobehu nea wobetumi anom no ho hia ankasa.`
---------------------- (802) ----------------------
F1: `Nsanom mmorosoɔ ho nsunsuasoɔ a wobԑtumi anya no daakye ne bi ne sԑ wo brԑboɔ bԑsԑe, w’ani bԑfira anaa wobԑwu. Sԑ wonom nsa a ne yԑ no tia mmara a, ԑma saa ɔhaw no yԑ kԑse.`
F2: `Akwahosan nsɛmsɛm a ebetumi asɔre esaine nsa a wɔnom boro so no bi ne brɛbo a ɛbɛsɛe ne mpo anifurae ne owu. Ɔhaw a yebetumi anya wo mu no yɛ kɛse bere a nsa a wɔyɛ a womfa mmara kwan so no.`
---------------------- (803) ----------------------
F1: `Nsa a ne yԑ tia mmara no bԑtumi awɔ nneԑma a ԑnyԑ bi te sԑ, ‘methanol’ wom a ԑbԑtumi ama anifira anaa owuo asi wɔ berԑ a wobԑfa ketewa bi mpo.`
F2: `Nsa a womfa mmara kwan so na wɔyɛ no wɔ nneɛma bi a ɛnyɛ koraa te sɛ methanol, a ebetumi ama obi ani afura anaa woawu nkakrakakra.`
---------------------- (804) ----------------------
F1: `Ahwehwԑniwa boɔ bԑtumi ayԑ fo wɔ amannɔne aman so, ne titire ne aman a sikasԑm ne akatua wɔ fam.`
F2: `Ahwehwɛniwa bo tumi yɛ fo wɔ ammanɔne aman so, ne titiriw no aman a wɔn sikasɛm ba fam a adwuma ho nsɛm wɔ fam no.`
---------------------- (805) ----------------------
F1: `Hwԑ sԑ wobԑsɔ w’ani ahwԑ wɔ fie, ne titire ne sԑ nsiakyibaa bi wɔ hɔ na fa ԑho akwankyerԑ no ka wo ho na wɔde ayԑ biribi wɔ baabi foforɔ.`
F2: `Susuw ho sɛ wobɛyɛ w’ani no mfeefeemu wɔ baabi a wofi, ne titiriw no sɛ nsiakyibaa no betua a, na fa krataa a wɔakyerɛw nnuru no wɔ so no kɔ baabi foforo ma wɔmfa nto hɔ.`
---------------------- (806) ----------------------
F1: `Ahwehwԑniwa a agye din a ԑwɔ saa mmeaeԑ no bԑtumi anya haw mmienu; ԑbi nyԑ papa, ԑnna deԑ ԑyԑ papa a wɔakra no boɔ yԑ den sene deԑ wɔayԑ wɔ ɔman no mu no.`
F2: `Ade a wɔde ahwehwɛ no hyɛ mu a ɛyɛ papa a agye din wɔ saa mmeae betumi anya ɔhaw mmienu; ebi renyɛ papa, na nea ɛyɛ papa a wɔakra aba no nso bo betumi ayɛ den sen baabi a wofi no.`
---------------------- (807) ----------------------
F1: `‘Kɔfe’ yԑ adeԑ baako a wɔdi ho dwa wɔ wiase yi mu na wotumi ahunu n’ahodoɔ wɔ wo mpɔtam hɔ.`
F2: `Kɔfe yɛ nneɛma a wodi ho dwa wɔ wiase paa no mu baako, na wobetumi anya emu ahorow ahorow wɔ mpɔtam a wofi no.`
---------------------- (808) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, akwan ahodoɔ soronko bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfa so nom kɔfe wɔ wiase afanan nyinaa a ԑho hia sԑ wohunu.`
F2: `Nanso, yɛwɔ akwan ahorow a eda nsow a wɔde nom kɔfe wɔ wiase afanan nyinaa wonnu wo ho sɛ wo sɔ hwɛ a.`
---------------------- (809) ----------------------
F1: `‘Canyoning (anaa: canyoneering) yԑ sԑ wobԑkɔ ‘canyon’ ase, a ԑbԑtumi aba sԑ awo anaa nsuo wom.`
F2: `Canyoning (anaa: canyoneering) ne sɛ wobɛkɔ canyon ase, a ɛhɔ awo anaasɛ nsu ayɛ mu ma no.`
---------------------- (810) ----------------------
F1: `‘Canyoning’ ka yeinom bom, nsudware, adeforo, ԑne huri--nanso ԑhia atenetene kakra bi anaa wo tebea na woatumi ahyԑ aseԑ (sԑ wode toto mmepɔ foforɔ, ‘scuba’ twi anaa ‘alpine skiing’, sei ho a).`
F2: `Canyoning ka nsu mu aguare, adeforo ne adehuru mu nneɛma bi bom--nanso ehia ntetee kakraa bi pɛ anaa apɔmuden na woatumi ahyɛase (sɛ yɛde toto abotan a wɔforo,nsu ase a wodware anaa ski a wɔde hyɛ nan ase sane fa sukyerɛma so, sɛ mfatoho no).`
---------------------- (811) ----------------------
F1: `‘Hiking’ yԑ dwuma a wɔdi wɔ abɔntene a ԑyԑ nanteԑ wɔ atenaeԑ a ԑnyԑ nnipa na ayԑ, mpԑn pii wɔ ‘hiking trails’ so.`
F2: `Hiking yɛ dwumadi a wɔyɛ wɔ abɔnten a wɔnantew fa nwuram, mpɛn pii no wɔ akwan a wɔapaepae ato hɔ sɛ wɔnantew so no.`
---------------------- (812) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛda ‘Hiking’ yԑ beaeԑ a ԑnsua nsene kwansini baako kɔsi kwan tenten a wobԑtumi de da baako atwa.`
F2: `Wɔ anɔpa nante mu no wotwa kwan a ennu akwansini baako kosi kwan a emu wa a ebetumi adi da baako.`
---------------------- (813) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ ԑyԑ da ‘hike’ a wobԑyԑ no kwan a ԑnyԑ den so a, ahoboa kakra bi na wohia, ԑnna obi a ne ho yԑ den kakra bi bԑtumi atwi.`
F2: `Da mu nantew a wɔfa kwan a ɛso nyɛ den no nhia ahosiesie pii, na obi a ɔwɔ ahoɔden kakra biara mpo betumi ayɛ.`
---------------------- (814) ----------------------
F1: `Abusua a wɔwɔ mma a wɔsusua no bԑhia ahoboa bebree, nanso da koro abɔntene pue no, mmɔfra nketewa ne wɔn a wɔahyԑ sukuu ase no bԑtumi.`
F2: `Mmusua a wɔwɔ mmofra nkumaa behia ahosiesie pii, nanso wobetumi de mmofra ne wɔn a afei na wɔahyɛ sukuu ase no adi da mu no wɔ abɔnten a ɛnyɛ den koraa.`
---------------------- (815) ----------------------
F1: `Wiase mu no, ‘tour’ adwumakuo a wɔyԑ adwuma bԑyԑ sԑ 200 na ԑwɔ hɔ. Dodoɔ no ara na wɔn a wɔyԑ wɔn adwuma.`
F2: `Wɔ wiase nyinaa no, wobenya ahyehyɛde a wɔhwɛ ammirika nsrahwɛ ahorow bɛyɛ 200. Wɔn mu dodow no ara yɛ adwuma a wɔnhyɛ abiara ase./wɔn ankasa adwuma.`
---------------------- (816) ----------------------
F1: `‘Global Running Tours’ nsiananmu no, ‘Go Running Tours’ wɔ nkorabata bebree wɔ beaeԑ a aman bebree wɔ ahodoɔ nan mu.`
F2: `Wiase nyinaa Ammirikatu Nsrahwɛ nanmusini, Go Running Tours ka wɔn a wɔhwɛ wɔn a wotu mmirika de hwɛ kurom no bebree bom wɔ asasetam anan so.`
---------------------- (817) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn ase firi ‘Barcelona Running Tours Barcelona ԑne Copenhagen Running Copenhagen’ akyԑre na ‘Running Tours Prague’ a ԑwɔ Prague ԑne afoforɔ bԑkaa wɔn ho.`
F2: `Ɛhyɛɛ ase fii Barcelona Ammirikatu Nsrahwɛ a ɛwɔ Barcelona ne Copenhagen Ammirikatu a ɛwɔ Copenhagen, na ankyɛ na Prague Ammirikatu Nsrahwɛ a ɛwɔ Prague ne afoforo bɛdomee.`
---------------------- (818) ----------------------
F1: `Nneԑma bebree wɔ hɔ a ԑsԑ sԑ wohwԑ ansa na woatu kwan akɔ baabi.`
F2: `Yɛwɔ nneɛma ahorow a ɛsɛ sɛ wudwen ho ansa na wobetu kwan ne bere a woretu kwan akɔ baabi no.`
---------------------- (819) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wotu kwan a, nhwԑ anim sԑ wobԑnya no te sԑ deԑ "ԑwɔ fie no". Obuo, mmara, aduane, ‘trafike’, baabi a wobԑda, deԑ ԑyԑ, kasa, ne deԑ ԑkeka ho bԑsesa afiri deԑ ԑwɔ baabi a wofiri no ho.`
F2: `Sɛ wotu kwan a, nhwɛ kwan sɛ nneɛma bɛyɛ te sɛ “wo kurom” de. Ntetee, mmara, aduane, kaa ahorow, dabere, gyinapɛn ahorow, kasa ne nea ɛkeka ho no bɛyɛ soronko wɔ baabi a wote no.`
---------------------- (820) ----------------------
F1: `Wei yԑ adeԑ bi a ԑsԑ sԑ ԑhyԑ w’adwene mu, sԑdeԑ ԑbԑyԑ a w’abam mmu anaa wo bo mfu sԑdeԑ wɔyԑ nneԑma wɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Wei yɛ biribi a ɛsɛ sɛ wode to w’adwen mu, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a w’abam remmu anaa sɛnea wɔyɛ wɔn ade no renyɛ wo tan.`
---------------------- (821) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔboa akwantufoɔ awɔ hɔ firi ‘19th century’. Wɔn a wɔboa akwantufoɔ no yԑ sԑ ԑboro ɔkwantuni no suahunu ma abɔdeԑ, amammerԑ, kasa anaa aman a adwumayԑfoɔ sika wɔ fam a so.`
F2: `Akwantu asoeɛ awɔ hɔ fi afeha a ɛtɔ so 19 no mu. Obi a ɔhwɛ akwantu so no taa yɛ ɔkwan pa a wobetumi afa so sɛ woretu kwan a ɛsen nea etwaam a wotui wɔ abɔde mu, amammerɛ, kasa anaa aman a wɔn sikasɛm ba fam mu a.`
---------------------- (822) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwom sԑ wɔn a wɔboa akwantufoɔ bebree wɔ ɔpԑpa sԑ wɔbԑgye kwan a ԑwɔ fam, nanso bebree hwԑ akwantuo soronko bi so, sikasԑm a ԑwom anaa baabi a worekɔ.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ asoeɛ ahorow no mu dodow no ara ayɛ krado sɛ wɔbɛgye nea wɔadi kan akora so no, wɔn a wɔhwɛ akwantu so no, wakwadare wɔ akwantu bi te sɛ.`
---------------------- (823) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛyԑ sԑ wobԑfa obi a ɔtaa di akwantuo a ԑte sԑ wo deԑ no ho dwuma.`
F2: `Ɛbɛyɛ papa sɛ wode obi a ɔhwɛ akwantu so a ɔtaa kora mmeae a ɛte sɛ wode no bedi dwuma.`
---------------------- (824) ----------------------
F1: `Hwԑ akwantuo a ɔrebɔ ho dawuro no, wɔ wԑbsate so anaa wɔ ‘shop window’ so.`
F2: `Hwɛ akwantu ahorow a nea ɔhwɛ akwantu so no rebɔ ho dawuro,sɛ wobɛhwɛ wɔ wɛbsaet so anaa wɔn sotɔɔ no mpoma no so.`
---------------------- (825) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wopԑ sԑ wohunu wiase no wɔ berԑ a wommrԑ ho, sԑ ԑhia nti, sԑdeԑ woyԑ nneԑma, anaa akan bi a, akwan bi wɔ hɔ a wofa so yԑ saa.`
F2: `Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wohu wiase no a wonsɛe sika pii a, sɛ ɛyɛ ahiade, sɛnea wo te anaa nkyia to no, akwan ahorow wɔ hɔ a wobetumi afa ayɛ saa.`
---------------------- (826) ----------------------
F1: `Saa nneԑma no gu ahodoɔ mmienu: Sԑ wobԑyԑ adwuma wɔ berԑ a woatu kwan anaa hwԑ sԑ wobԑte wo ka no so. Saa atwerԑ yi fa deԑ ԑtwa toɔ no ho.`
F2: `Ne tiatwa mu no, ɛwɔ afa mmienu:Sɛ wobɛyɛ adwuma bere a woretu kwan no anaa wobɛbɔ mmɔden ate nea wobɛtɔ so.`
---------------------- (827) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔbԑtumi atwa ahotɔ mu, ԑberԑ, ԑne deԑ ԑba daa sԑdeԑ wɔbԑte ka no so no, hwԑ ka a anyԑ hwee no wobԑbɔ wɔ akwantuo no mu.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn ahotɔ, wɔn bere ne nea ebesi daakye bɔ afɔre sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn ka bɛkɔ fam koraa no, hwɛ akwantu a ɛho ka nnɔɔso.`
---------------------- (828) ----------------------
F1: `Afotuo no ne sԑ, akwantufoɔ nwia adeԑ, nkɔ obi agyapadeԑ so, mfa wɔn ho nhyԑ dwadie a ԑnyԑ mu, nsrԑ adeԑ, anaa mmu nkurɔfoɔ mfa so.`
F2: `Afotu yi fa no sɛ akwantufo nwia ade, nkɔ baabi a ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔkɔ, mfa wɔn ho nhyɛ aguadi a ɛmfa mmara kwan so, nsrɛsrɛ ade, anaa ɔkwan foforo so no nnaadaa afoforo nya wɔn ho.`
---------------------- (829) ----------------------
F1: `Baabi a wɔhwԑ akwantufoɔ no yԑ baabi a ԑdi kan a wobԑhunu wɔ berԑ a woresi afiri wiemhyԑn, suhyԑn, anaa kaa foforɔ mu no.`
F2: `Abammɔfo gyinabea ahorow taa yɛ beae a wobedi kan agyina bere a woasi afi wimhyɛn, po so hyɛn, anaa kaa foforo mu no.`
---------------------- (830) ----------------------
F1: `Ketekye a ԑtumi wura ɔman foforɔ mu no, ԑmu no ara na wɔhwehwԑ nnipa no nti ԑsԑ sԑ wowɔ ID bi a ԑdi mu wɔ wo ho ansa na woaforo saa ketekye no mu baako.`
F2: `Wɔyɛ keteke a efi ɔman foforo so kɔ ɔman foforo so no mu binom nhwehwɛmu bere a etu nam kwan so no na ɛsɛ sɛ wowɔ ID a edi mu wɔ wo ho bere a worekɔforo saa keteke no mu baako no.`
---------------------- (831) ----------------------
F1: `Ketekye a wɔda mu no, deԑ ɔte ho no bԑgye ‘w’akwantuo krataa’ no sԑdeԑ ԑbԑyԑ a wɔnsԑe wo nna.`
F2: `Wɔ keteke a wɔda wɔ so no, onii a ɔgyegye sika wɔ so no betumi agye mo paspɔt sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɔnsɛe mo nna no.`
---------------------- (832) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wobԑtwerԑ wo din no ka visa no gyeԑ ho. Aman binom so no, ԑsԑ sԑ wokyerԑ mpɔtam hɔ mpanimfoɔ no sԑ woaba hɔ na woma wɔn baabi a woteԑ no addrԑsse.`
F2: `Din kyerɛw yɛ ahwehwɛde a ɛka ho bere a worekɔyɛ visa no.Wɔ aman ahorow bi so no, ɛsɛ sɛ wokɔ kyerɛw sɛ wowɔ hɔ ne beae a wote wɔ wɔn mpaninfo no hɔ.`
---------------------- (833) ----------------------
F1: `Wei ho bԑhia sԑ wohyehyԑ ‘fɔm’ bi wɔ apolisifoɔ a wɔwɔ hɔ no hɔ anaa wɔn a wɔhwԑ akwantufoɔ nsԑm so no ɔfese hɔ.`
F2: `Wei bɛhwehwɛ sɛ wobɛhyehyɛ nhoma bi wɔ wɔn polisifo asoeɛ anaa wokɔsra atubrafo ɔfese ahorow.`
---------------------- (834) ----------------------
F1: `Aman bebree a wɔwɔ saa mmara no, ahɔhogyebea no na wɔbԑhwԑ saa nhyehyԑeԑ no so (hwԑ sԑ wobԑbisa).`
F2: `Wɔ aman bebree a wɔwɔ saa mmara yi no, ahɔhogyebea ahorow a ɛwɔ hɔ no hwɛ din kyerɛw no so (bɔ mmɔden bisa).`
---------------------- (835) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑwom koraa ne sԑ, wɔn a wɔnte baabi a akwansrafoɔ teԑ no na wɔbԑ twerԑ wɔn din. Nanso, ԑmma wɔnhunu mmara no so nti pԑ ansa na woaduru.`
F2: `Wɔ tebea foforo mu no, wɔn a wɔte baabi a ɛnyɛ nsrahwɛ dabere no hia sɛ wɔkyerɛw wɔn din.Nanso wei ma wonhu mmara no ani so yiye, enti di kan hwehwɛmu ansa.`
---------------------- (836) ----------------------
F1: `‘Architecture’ hwԑ kwan a wɔfa so yԑ ‘nhyehyԑeԑ’ sane si adan so. Sԑdeԑ wɔasi asi dan bi no koraa tumi yԑ baabi a akwasrafoɔ tumi bԑhwԑ.`
F2: `Adanwinni no yɛ sɛnea wɔnwinni dan na wosi no no. Sɛnea wosi fa nwinni dan na wosi no no mpo yɛ nea ɛtwe nkurɔfo ma wɔbɛhwɛ hɔ.`
---------------------- (837) ----------------------
F1: `Adan bebree yԑ fԑ na sԑ wohwԑ firi dan tenten bi so anaa mpoma bi a ԑwɔ baabi yie a, ԑyԑ fԑ pa ara.`
F2: `Adan ahorow pii yɛ fɛ sɛ worehwɛ a , na sɛ wogyina ɛdan tenten so anaa mpoma bi a ɛda yiye a, sɛnea wohu no no yɛ fɛ kɛkɛ.`
---------------------- (838) ----------------------
F1: `‘Architecture’ adwumayԑ no ne ebinom te sԑ ‘urban planning’, ‘civil engineering’, ‘decorative arts’, ‘interior design’ ԑne ‘landscape design’deԑ no na ԑkɔ.`
F2: `Adanwinni ne nwuma ahorow binom te sɛ wɔn a wɔhyehyɛ nkuraa, mfididwumayɛfo, wɔn a wɔdrɔm nneɛma, wɔn a wosiesie dan mu ne wɔn a wosiesie afifide ma no yɛ fɛ no bom yɛ adwuma.`
---------------------- (839) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wohwԑ sԑdeԑ ‘pueblos’ nkuraa no bebree teԑ a, wontumi nnya anigyeԑ biara wɔ hɔ gye sԑ wotu kwan kɔ Albuquerque anaa Santa Fe.`
F2: `Esaine sɛnea nkuro no wowɔ akyi nti, gye sɛ wo tu kwan kɔ Albuquerque anaa Santa Fe sɛ wopɛ sɛ wonya anigyede a etumi tua mu kosi anɔpa bi a.`
---------------------- (840) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, ‘casinos’ dodoɔ no ara a wɔabobɔ wɔ soro hɔ no ma anodeԑ, ԑnna wɔn mu bebree de anigyeԑ mu wɔn a wɔagye din ba (ahyԑaseԑ no na ԑyԑ wɔn a wɔatwa Albuquerque ԑne Santa Fe ho ahyia).`
F2: `Nanso, casino a wɔabobɔ din wɔ soro hɔ no mu dodow no ara ma nsa, na wɔn mu binom de anigyede a wɔn a wɔagye din ayɛ ( akɛse a na ɛwom a na etwa Albuquerque ne Santa Fe ho).`
---------------------- (841) ----------------------
F1: `Yԑ ahwԑyie: baabi nketewa a wɔtɔ nsa wɔ ha no nyԑ mma ɔhɔhoɔ sԑ ɔbԑkɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Hyɛ no nsow sɛ, beae a wɔtɔn nsa wɔ nkuro nketewa mu no ntaa nyɛ baabi papa ma wɔn a wofi baabi foforo na aba hɔ no sɛ wɔbɛtenatena.`
---------------------- (842) ----------------------
F1: `Adeԑ baako nso ne sԑ, New Mexico atifi fam no, wɔ haw pa ara wɔ adorɔbafoɔ a wɔnom nsa ka kaa ho, ԑnna adorɔbafoɔ a wɔaboro no taa wɔ baabi a wɔtɔ nsa nketewa no.`
F2: `Wɔ ɔkwan baako so no, New Mexico atifi fam hɔ wɔ wɔn a wɔnom nsa ka kaa ho nsɛmsɛm pii na ahyɛnkafo a wɔbo de ka kaa no dɔɔso wɔ mmeae a wɔtɔn nsa wɔ nkuro nketewa mu.`
---------------------- (843) ----------------------
F1: `Mfonin anaa adeԑ a wɔayԑ ato ban ho a wɔmpԑ na yԑfrԑ no ‘graffiti’.`
F2: `Wɔfrɛ nneɛma a w’adrɔm anaa w’akyerɛwkyerɛw wɔ afasu ho no sɛ graffiti.`
---------------------- (844) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwom sԑ ԑbae akyԑ deԑ, nnipa bebree fa no sԑ mmabunu de ‘spray paint’ resԑe ɔman no anaa ankorԑankorԑ agyapadeԑ.`
F2: `Bere a ɛnyɛ nnɛyi adeyɛ no, nnipa pii de kyerɛ sɛ ɛyɛ mmabun a wɔde aduro a wɔde ka dan ho sɛe ɔman ne ankorɛankorɛ agyapade no na wɔyɛ saa.`
---------------------- (845) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, seesei deԑ yԑwɔ ‘graffiti artists’, ‘graffiti events’ a wɔayԑ ԑne "mmara" ban. ‘Graffiti paintings’ wɔ saa nteaseԑ yi mu no sԑ ‘artworks’ sene ‘tags’ a wɔnhunu.`
F2: `Nanso, nnansa yi mu no yɛwɔ wɔn a wɔdrɔm nneɛma wɔ afasu ho a wɔagye wɔn atom, graffiti dwumadi ahorow ne “mmara kwan so” afasu.Nneɛma a wɔka ho wɔ saa dwumadi yi mu sɛ ade a wɔahyɛda adrɔm no yiye sen biribi a wɔayɛ a wonhu so.`
---------------------- (846) ----------------------
F1: `‘Boomerang’ toɔ yԑ nimdeԑ baako a akwansrafoɔ bebree pԑ sԑ wɔnya.`
F2: `Dua a akoa a wɔtow no yɛ nsa ano dwuma a agye din a nsrahwɛfo pii pɛ sɛ wonya.`
---------------------- (847) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wopԑ sԑ wosua sԑdeԑ wɔto ‘boomerang’ a ԑsane ba wo nsam a, hwԑ sԑ wowɔ ‘boomerang’ a ԑyԑ ma ne ba.`
F2: `Sɛ wobɛpɛ sɛ wosua sɛnea wɔtow dua no ma ɛsan ba wo nsam a, hwɛ hu sɛ wowɔ dua a woayɛ no yiye a ebetumi asan n’akyi.`
---------------------- (848) ----------------------
F1: `‘Boomerangs’ a ԑwɔ Australia no bebree nyԑ deԑ ԑsane ba. Ɛyԑ sԑ wɔn a wɔrehyԑ aseԑ no nto no ‘windy’`
F2: `Dua a akoa a wɔtow no mu dodow a ɛwɔ Australia yɛ nea ɛnsan mma n’akyi.`
---------------------- (849) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔnoa ‘Hangi’ Aduane wɔ tokuro a ԑyԑ hye wɔ asase no mu.`
F2: `Wɔnoa aduane a wɔfrɛ no Hangi wɔ tokuro a emu yɛ hye a wɔatu wɔ fam mu.`
---------------------- (850) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde aboɔ a wɔayi afiri gyam na ԑma tokuro no mu yԑ hye anaa baabi wɔ hɔ a ‘geothermal heat’ ma baabi yԑ hye.`
F2: `Wɔde aboɔ a wɔde agu gya mu ma ayɛ hye na wɔde gu tokuro no mu, anaa wɔ mmeae bi no wɔde ɔhyew a efi asase no mu a ɛma fam yɛ hye no na ɛyɛ.`
---------------------- (851) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔtaa de ‘hangi’ no noa anwummerԑ aduane a wɔtoto.`
F2: `Wɔde Hangi no noa anwummere aduane a wɔde tete kwan so toto no.`
---------------------- (852) ----------------------
F1: `Mmeaeԑ bebree wɔ Rotorua ma ‘geothermal hangi’, wɔ berԑ a ‘hangi’ afoforɔ wɔ Christchurch, Wellington ԑne baabi foforɔ.`
F2: `Wobenya hangi a ɔhyew a efi asase no mu anoa wɔ mmeae ahorow pii wɔ Rotorua, na wobetumi anya hangi a aka no nso wɔ Christchurch, Wellington ne mmeae afoforo.`
---------------------- (853) ----------------------
F1: `‘MetroRail’ wɔ nkyekyԑmu mmienu wɔ ketekye a ԑwɔ anaa ԑbԑne Cape Town: ‘MetroPlus’ (a wɔsane frԑ no First Class) ԑne Metro (wɔfrԑ no Third Class).`
F2: `MetroRail wɔ kuw mmienu wɔ keteke a wɔde fa nkurofo wɔ Cape Town mu ne ɛho no: MetroPlus (a wɔsan frɛ no Adefo Afa) ne Metro (a wɔsan frɛ no nea ne bo wɔ fam).`
---------------------- (854) ----------------------
F1: `‘MetroPlus’ yԑ baabi a ahotɔ wɔ ԑnna nnipa no nnɔso wɔ hɔ nanso ne boɔ yԑ den kakra, nanso ԑyԑ fo sene metro tikiti a ԑwɔ Europe.`
F2: `MetroPlus no mu wɔ ahotɔ paa na nnipa no nnɔɔso nanso ne bo yɛ den kakra, ɛwom sɛ ne bo yɛ fo sen tekiti a wotwa ma metro no wɔ Europa no.`
---------------------- (855) ----------------------
F1: `Ketekye biara wɔ MetroPlus ԑne Metro beaeԑ nyinaa bi; MetroPlus beaeԑ no taa wɔ ketekye no ano no a ԑbԑne Cape Town no.`
F2: `Keteke biara wɔ adefo afa ne nea ne bo wɔ fam afa no nyinaa bi; bere biara no adefo afa no wɔ keteke ne fa a etwa to a ɛbɛn Cape Town.`
---------------------- (856) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wokuta ma afoforɔ - Mma w’ani mfiri wo baage so da ne titire ne sԑ morewura ɔman foforɔ mu.`
F2: `Nneɛma a wɔsoa ma afoforo - Nyi w’ani mfi wo nneɛma so, titiriw no bere a woretwa amanaman hye mu no.`
---------------------- (857) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔbԑma wo afa nnubɔne akuta wɔ berԑ a w’ani nna wo ho so na ԑba saa a, ɔbԑkɔ ɔhaw kԑseԑ pa ara mu.`
F2: `Woanhwɛ a wɔde wo bɛyɛ obi a ɔsoa nnubɔne a wonnim, na ebetumi de wo ato esaine kɛse paa mu.`
---------------------- (858) ----------------------
F1: `Wei yԑ baabi a modidi soɔ, wɔbԑtumi de nkraman a wɔte nnubɔne mpampan aba berԑ biara a wɔmmɔ nkaeԑ.`
F2: `Wobetumi ama moato santene, bere a wɔde nkraman a wohuahua nnubɔne di dwuma a worenhu.`
---------------------- (859) ----------------------
F1: `Aman bi wɔ asotwe kԑse ma saa adeԑ yi pa ara mpo sԑ ԑyԑ berԑ a ԑdi kan a; wei bԑtumi ayԑ sԑ wobԑkɔ afiase mfeԑ 10 anaa wɔbԑku wo.`
F2: `Aman ahorow bi wɔ asotwe a ano yɛ den paa ma wɔn, bere a edi kan a wɔafom no; ebetumi ayɛ afiase nna a ɛboro mfe 10 anaa owu.`
---------------------- (860) ----------------------
F1: `Baage a obiara nkɔ ho no, obi bԑtumi awia ԑnna ԑbԑma mpanimfoɔ ani aba ho ԑfiri sԑ wɔbԑsusu sԑ ԑyԑ topaeԑ.`
F2: `Wɔbetumi awia baage ahorow a obiara nni ho na ebetumi nso atwetwe abammɔfo a wɔn ani di topae ahunahuna akyi no adwen aba so.`
---------------------- (861) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnam sԑ da biara wo ne saa mmoawa yi di ahyia nti, biribiara kyerԑ sԑ wobԑtumi adi ahyia a wɔnnya nsunsuansoɔ biara.`
F2: `Wɔ baabi a wofi no, esaine sɛ mmoawa a wɔma yare wɔ hɔ no akɔ wo nnipaduam nti, ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ wobenya.`
---------------------- (862) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso wiase baabi foforɔ no, baabi a ‘bacteriological fauna’ no yԑ foforɔ ma wo no, wobԑtumi anya ɔhaw.`
F2: `Nanso wɔ wiase afa ahorow bi a mmoawammoawa no yɛ foforo ma wo nnipadua no, ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wobehyia ɔhaw ahorow.`
---------------------- (863) ----------------------
F1: `Bio nso, baabi a ԑhɔ yԑ hye no, ‘bacteria mmoawa’ no tumi nyini ntԑntԑm sane tena ase kyԑre wɔ berԑ a ԑnni nnipadua no mu.`
F2: `Afei, wɔ mmeae a ɛyɛ hye no, mmoawammoawa no nyin ntɛm na wotumi tena honam no ani kyɛ.`
---------------------- (864) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛno nti ne ɔhaw a ԑtoo Delhi Belly, Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, ԑne wɔn nnamfonom no.`
F2: `Ɛno na ɛde Delhi Belly, Pharoah’s Curse no, Montezuma’s Revenge, ne wɔn nnamfonom bebree haw no bae.`
---------------------- (865) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑdeԑ ahome mu haw nyԑ nna wɔ baabi a ԑhɔ yԑ nwunu no, saa ara nso na nsono mu haw nyԑ nna wɔ baabi a ԑyԑ hye ԑnna mpԑn bebree ԑyԑ abofu nanso ԑnyԑ hu pa ara.`
F2: `Sɛnea yenya home mu nyarewa wɔ mmeae a ɛhɔ yɛ awɔw no, nsono mu nyarewa nyɛ nna wɔ mmeae a ɔhyew wɔ no na mpɛn pii no ɛyɛ ahi ankasa nanso ɛnyɛ hu saa.`
---------------------- (866) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ woretu kwan wɔ ɔman a ɔretu mpɔn mu berԑ a ԑdi kan a, – anaa wiase yi mu baabi foforɔ a, – mԑnnwene sԑ wonhu biribi a ԑda nso firi w’amammerԑ ho.`
F2: `Sɛ ɛyɛ bere a edi kan a woretu kwan akɔ ɔman a ɛrenya nkoanim mu ̶ anaa wɔ wiase ne fa foforo biara no ̶ emmu ehu a ɛka obi bere a ɔkɔ amammerɛ foforo mu no abomfiaa.`
---------------------- (867) ----------------------
F1: `Akwantufoɔ a wɔdi mu bebree ahyia biribi foforɔ wɔ wiase baabi a ԑretu mpɔn no ma adi wɔn so, baabi a woresesa wo ho afa amammerԑ bi ntԑm hia.`
F2: `Akwantufo a wogyina pintinn na wɔn ho yɛ den mpo ama akwantu wɔ wiase a ɛrenya nkoanim yi mu anya so tumi, bere a amammerɛ mu nsakrae kakraa bi na ehia.`
---------------------- (868) ----------------------
F1: `Ne titire ne wo nna a ԑdi kan no, hwԑ sԑ wobԑsԑe sika wɔ ‘Western-kwan’ ne ahɔhogyebea papa, aduane, ԑne biribi foforɔ a wohia ho na ԑmma wo ne hɔ mfa.`
F2: `Ne titiriw no wɔ wo nna edi kan mu no, susuw ho sɛ wobɛsɛe sika wɔ aburokyire ahosiesie ne ahɔhogyebea ahorow a ɛyɛ papa, aduane, ne nneɛma a ɛbɛboa ma ɛhɔ ne wo agye.`
---------------------- (869) ----------------------
F1: `Mԑnna ‘mattress’ anaa ‘pad’ so wɔ fam wɔ beaeԑ a wonnim hɔ mmoa no.`
F2: `Nna matrase so anaa kɛtɛ so wɔ fam wɔ mmeae a wonnim mmoa a ɛwɔ hɔ.`
---------------------- (870) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wobԑda abɔntene a, fa ‘camp cot’ anaa ‘hammock’ ka wo ho sԑdeԑ ԑbԑbɔ wo ho ban afiri awɔwɔ, nyanyankyerԑ ne wɔn a wɔtete saa no ho.`
F2: `Sɛ wo soeɛ wɔ abɔten a, fa mpa a wɔda so wɔ abɔnten anaasɛ mpa a wɔde sɛn dua ho sɛnea ɛbɛbɔ ho ho ban afi awɔ, nyanyankyerɛ ne nea ɛtete saa ho.`
---------------------- (871) ----------------------
F1: `Ma kɔfe a ԑyԑ dԑ nwɔ wo fie hɔ anɔpa na ma ‘chamomile tea’ a yԑde dwodwo yԑn ho nwɔ hɔ anwummerԑ.`
F2: `Fa kɔfe a ɛyɛ papa hyɛ wo fi ma anɔpa no ne chamomile tii a ɛdwodwo no anadwo no.`
---------------------- (872) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ woregye w’ahome wɔ baabi a ԑbԑne wo fie a, wowɔ mmerԑ a wode bԑyԑ wo ho yie na woagye w’ani.`
F2: `Bere a wote wo fi na wokɔ nsrahwɛ wɔ wo man mu no, wonya bere hwɛ wo ho na wotumi nya sima kakra yɛ tii soronko ma wo ho.`
---------------------- (873) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wopԑ sԑ wohunu nneԑma bi ano so a, fa saa akwanya yi na yam biribi a ԑyԑ dԑ:`
F2: `Sɛ wo pɛ biribi a wonyɛɛ bi da a, fa hokwan no yɛ nnuaba mu nsu anaa yam nnuaba ahorow bi.`
---------------------- (874) ----------------------
F1: `ebia a wobԑhunu biribi anodeԑ bi a wobԑtumi ayԑ adi no anɔpa sԑ woba wo daadaa nneyɔeԑ mu a.`
F2: `ebia wobɛba abehu anonne a ne yɛ nyɛ kyekyerɛkyɛnn a wobetumi ayɛ no anɔpa bere a woasan akɔ wo dedaw mu bio no.`
---------------------- (875) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wowɔ kuro kԑseԑ a nkurɔfoɔ nom anodeԑ ahodoɔ wɔ hɔ a, kɔ baabi a wɔtɔn bi wɔ wo mpɔtam hɔ a wontaa nkɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Sɛ wote ɔman a nsa a wɔnom no gu ahorow a, kɔ nsanom beae ahorow wɔ wo mpɔtam hɔ a wontaa nkɔ hɔ no.`
---------------------- (876) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔnnim nsԑmfua a adɔkotafoɔ de di dwuma mu no, nsԑmfua ‘infectious’ ԑne ‘contagious’ nkyerԑaseԑ nyԑ pԑ.`
F2: `Wɔn a wonnim nsɛmfua a wɔde di dwuma wɔ ayarehwɛ adwuma no mu no, asɛmfua nsaneyare no gu mu ahorow.`
---------------------- (877) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ yԑka sԑ yareԑ bi yԑ ‘infectious’ a, ԑyԑ yareԑ a ‘pathogen’ bi te sԑ ‘virus, bacterium, fungus’ anaa mmoawammoawa nkaeԑ bi na ԑde ba.`
F2: `Mmoawmmoawa bi a wɔfrɛ wɔn pathogen, te sɛ virus, bacterium, apotobibire anaa aboawa a odidi mmoawa foforo ho tumi ma yare sane.`
---------------------- (878) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ yԑka sԑ yareԑ bi sae a, ԑyԑ yareԑ a wotumi nya bi wɔ berԑ a woabԑne obi a ɔwɔ bi.`
F2: `Yɛwɔ nsaneyare nso a wonya bere a wokɔ mpɔtam a obi a woanya yare no bi wɔ no.`
---------------------- (879) ----------------------
F1: `Aban bebree hwԑ sԑ ahɔhoɔ a wɔreba ne man mu ԑne te man mufoɔ a wɔrefiri hɔ no bԑwɔ panneԑ wɔ nyarewa bi ho.`
F2: `Aban pii hwehwɛ sɛ nsrahwɛfo a wɔreba hɔ, anaa wɔn man mufo a wɔrefi hɔ ɔman no mu no wɔ nnuru a ɛbɔ ban fi nyarewa ahorow bi ho no.`
---------------------- (880) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑsԑ sԑ ɔkwantuni bi yԑ no gyina ɔman a wakɔ so anaa ɔpԑ sԑ ɔkɔ so no so.`
F2: `Saa ahwehwɛde yi begyina ɔman ko a ɔkwantufo no akɔsra anaa ɔpɛ sɛ ɔkɔ hɔ so.`
---------------------- (881) ----------------------
F1: `Adeԑ a ԑdi tintim man ma Charlotte, North Carolina, ne sԑ ԑwɔ baabi pa bebree ma mmusua.`
F2: `Asɛntitiriw biako a “Charlotte”, “North Carolina”, da no adi ne sɛ, edi mu yiye wɔ ɔkwan pii so ma abusuafo.`
---------------------- (882) ----------------------
F1: `Nkurɔfoɔ a wɔfiri baabi foforɔ kyerԑ sԑ abusua nnamfofa ne adeԑ titire nti na wɔkɔ hɔ, ԑnna akwantufoɔ a mmɔfra ka wɔn ho ani gye wɔ kuro no mu.`
F2: `Nnipa a wɔtete mmeae ahorow no kyerɛ mu a, nea nti a wɔkɔ hɔ no gyina abusua ayɔnkofa so, ɛnna kurow no mu nso na wonya kwan ne mmofra bom gye wɔn ani.`
---------------------- (883) ----------------------
F1: `Mfeԑ 20 a atwam no, mmɔfra nnamfofa akɔ soro wɔ Uptown Charlotte pa ara.`
F2: `Mfe 20 ni no, mmofra ayɔnkofa a akɔ so wɔ “Uptown Charlotte” no anyin akɔ anim yiye.`
---------------------- (884) ----------------------
F1: `Abusua a wɔwɔ Charlotte ntaa mforo taxi, ԑwom sԑ ԑtaa boa wɔ kwan bi so.`
F2: `Amansan lɔre nyɛ ade a abusuafo a wɔwɔ Charlotte no taa de di dwuma, mmom ɛho tumi ba mfaso wɔ bere bi mu.`
---------------------- (885) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wɔfa akwantufoɔ a wɔn dodoɔ boro mmienu a, wɔgye sika no bi ka ho nti saa kwan yi boɔ bԑyԑ den asene sԑdeԑ ԑteԑ no.`
F2: `Sɛ lɔre no bɛfa apasengyafo a wɔboro 2 no ma bow no kɔ soro, ɛno nti ɛma amansan afiri fa no bow yɛ den sene sɛnea wɔrehwehwɛ no.`
---------------------- (886) ----------------------
F1: `Antartica ne beaeɛ a ɛhɔ yɛ nwunu pa ara wɔ asaase yi so, na atwa South Pole no ho ahyia.`
F2: `Antarctica ne baabi a ɛhɔ yɛ nnwunu pa ara wɔ asase so, na atwa Anafo fam poolu no ho ahyia.`
---------------------- (887) ----------------------
F1: `Nsrahwɛ akwantuo boɔ yɛ den sane ɛhia ahoɔden, na ɛtumi di mu wɔ Obubuo de kɔsi Ɔgyefoɔ bosome a ɛyɛ ɔpɛ berɛ mu, na ɛgyina Peninsula, Islands ne Ross Sea so nko ara.`
F2: `Ɛhɔ nsrahwɛ kɔ boɔ yɛ den, ɛhia ahoɔden, na wɔbɛtumi akɔ hɔ wɔ ahohuru bere no mu ɛfiri Obubuo-Ogyefuo, na deɛ ɛtaa yɛ Peninsula, Asaasetam ne Ross Po.`
---------------------- (888) ----------------------
F1: `Adwumayɛfoɔ ahodoɔ bɛyɛ apem na wɔtena ha wɔ ɔpɛ berɛ mu wɔ mmeaeɛ ahodoɔ mu; nnipa no mu fa kumaa bi na wɔtena ha kɔsi nsutɔberɛ mu.`
F2: `Adwumayɛfo mpepem pii tena hɔ wɔ ahohuru bere bere mu wɔ saa mmeae nnan; kakra bi nso tena wɔ awɔ bere no mu.`
---------------------- (889) ----------------------
F1: `Inland Antarctica yɛ baabi a obiara nteɛ na asukɔtwea afa asaase no ani bɛyɛ kwasini mmienu anaa mmiɛnsa.`
F2: `Antarctica yɛ asasetamaa beae bi obiara nte hɔ a ne kɛse bɛyɛ kilomita 2-3 na asukɔtwea agye hɔ afa.`
---------------------- (890) ----------------------
F1: `Ewiem nsrahwɛfoɔ a wɔba nsrahwɛ dapɔnna no kɔ asaase pradadaa so, sɛ wɔkɔ mmepɔ so anaa sɛ wɔbɛduru akɔnkɔ so a, wɔhwɛ nea aseɛ no trɛ.`
F2: `Ɛtɔ mmere bi a mframa bɔ kɔ asase no so, foro bepɔw anaasɛ ɛbɛduru poolu ade no yɛ kɛse no ho.`
---------------------- (891) ----------------------
F1: `South Pole Traverse no (anaa Highway) yԑ 1600 km ԑfiri McMurdo Station a ԑwɔ Ross Ɛpo no ho kɔsi Pole no.`
F2: `Kilomita no 1600 na ɛda “South Pole Traverse” (anaa “Highway”) no ne “McMurddo Station” no ntam a ɛkɔka “Pole” no wɔ “Ross Sea” no so.`
---------------------- (892) ----------------------
F1: `Sukyerԑma no sԑdeԑ ayԑ no ԑnna wɔde frankaa ahyԑ no nso. Tractor soronko, ‘hauling sleds’ a fango wom na nneԑma wom na ԑbԑtumi afa mu.`
F2: `Ɛyɛ asukɔtwea a wɔahyehyɛ no akuwakuw a wɔde frankaa ahyehyɛ no nso. Gye sɛ lɔre akɛse yi bi a wɔahyɛ da atu asi hɔ na ɛtwe lɔre nkumaa a wɔde asukɔtwea akuwakuw yi agu mu yi.`
---------------------- (893) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔtumi mfa mu ntԑm nti ԑsԑ sԑ ‘trail’ no kɔfa Transantarctic Mmepɔ no ho de ba asasetamaa no ho.`
F2: `Eyinom nkɔ ntɛm, ɛno nti ɛsɛ sɛ wofi kwan a wɔatwa ato hɔ no so kɔfa “Transantarctic Mountains” no ho de koduru asase no so.`
---------------------- (894) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑde akwanhyia ba wɔ osutɔ berԑ mu ne kwan a ԑso yԑ toro, baabi a wɔfa (kwan nkyԑn a wɔfa) ԑne ne titire ‘steps’.`
F2: `Nea ɛde akwanhyia ba pa ara wɔ awɔw bere mu ne kwantempɔn a ɛso yɛ toro, nantekwan (kwan nkyɛn nantekwan) a ɛso yɛ toro ne titiriw namɔn a ɛso yɛ toro.`
---------------------- (895) ----------------------
F1: `Woannya koraa no, wohia mpaboa a aseԑ nyԑ toro. Mpaboa a wɔhyԑ no ɔpԑ berԑ no ase taa yԑ toro wɔ ‘ice’ ne sukyerԑma mu, osutɔ berԑ mu mpaboa bi koraa mmoa.`
F2: `Anyɛ koraa no, ɛsɛ sɛ wunya mpaboa a nkotoo wɔ ase bi hyɛ. Ahuhuru bere mu mpaboa ase yɛ toro wɔ nsukyenee ne asukɔtwea mu, a mpo awɔw bere mu mpaboa binom nni dwuma yiye.`
---------------------- (896) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsԑ sԑ ԑmu dɔ sԑdeԑ ԑsԑ, 5 mm (1/5 inch) anaa deԑ ԑboro saa, na adeԑ a wɔde ayԑ no nso yԑ mmrԑ sԑdeԑ ԑsԑ wɔ awɔ berԑ mu.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaboa no mu dɔ bɛyɛ milimita no 5 (1/5 inch) anaa nea ɛboro saa, na akade a wɔde ayɛ no nso yɛ mmerɛw a ebetumi asɔw awɔw ano.`
---------------------- (897) ----------------------
F1: `Mpaboa no bi wɔ hɔ a ԑwɔ nnadeԑ wɔ aseԑ ԑnna yԑwɔ adeԑ a dadeԑ wɔ ho a ԑyԑ ma torotoro a mpaboa bebree bԑtumi de adi dwuma, a yԑde ma mpaboa a ԑtoɔ ware anaa nan no.`
F2: `Mpaboa no bi wɔ ahobammɔ akade bi a epue wɔ ho na ɛwɔ ahobammɔ akade yi bi a wɔde di beae a ɛyɛ toro so, na eye pa ara ma mpaboa binom, na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde bɛyɛ mpaboa no ase anaa wɔde bɛto mpaboa no ase.`
---------------------- (898) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsԑ sԑ mpaboa to no wɔ fam na ԑyԑ tԑtrԑtԑ. Wɔtaa de anwea, abosea anaa nkyene (calcium chloride) pete kwan no mu sԑdeԑ ԑbԑyԑ a mpaboa no bԑkye.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ mpaboa a wogyina so no wɔ fam na ɛyɛ nea ɛtrɛw. Wɔde anwea, abow anaa nkyene (“calcium chloride”) gu kwantempɔn anaa ɔkwan no so na ama nantew ayɛ mmerɛw.`
---------------------- (899) ----------------------
F1: `‘Avalanches’ nkyerԑ sԑ nyԑ; bepɔ no baabi a apagya no tumi gye no kakra, na deԑ ԑbԑboro so no aba fam sԑ ‘avalanches’.`
F2: `Asukɔtwea anaa nsukyenee a esian no nyɛ ade a ɛyɛ hu; mmeae a eisan no tumi som kakra, na afei nea ɛboro so no asian abegu fam.`
---------------------- (900) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔhaw no ne sԑ sukyerԑma kye adeԑ, ԑno nti ԑhia mpia bi ansa na aba fam ԑnna sukyerԑma no bi a ԑreba fam no bԑtumi apia deԑ ԑwɔ hɔ dada.`
F2: `Ͻhaw no ne sɛ, asukɔtwea yɛ ade a ɛkye, enti ehia ɔhyɛ bi ansa na asian, ɛnna asukɔtwea a edi kan sian no nso boa ma afoforo nso sian.`
---------------------- (901) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛtɔ da a, deԑ ԑpia no ne awia a ԑrebɔ ma sukyerԑma no mu ayԑ hye no, ԑtɔ da a sukyerԑma a ԑretɔ no, ԑtɔ da a biribi foforɔ a ԑfiri abɔdeԑ nkaeԑ no ԑnna ԑtɔ da a ԑyԑ nnipa.`
F2: `Ɛtɔ mmere bi a, ade a ɛma asukɔtwea no kye no ne awia, ɛtɔ mmere bi nso a asukɔtwea a ɛtɔ bebree no, ɛtɔ mmere bi nso a anammɔntu a efi nipa hɔ.`
---------------------- (902) ----------------------
F1: `Mmotia mframa yԑ mframa a ԑretware ne ho a ԑtwe mframa no kɔ mu na ԑde no kɔ soro.`
F2: `Anweatwahyia ahum yɛ ahum a etwa anwea hyia na ne mframa no anoden wɔ fam, na ɛsesa mframa a ɛwɔ hɔ no kɔ fam san nso de ba soro.`
---------------------- (903) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔyԑ mframa no tenten a ano yԑ den (mpԑn pii ԑyԑ 100-200 miles/hour) na ԑbԑtumi apagya nneԑma a ԑmu yԑ duru akɔ wiem, na ԑde no kɔ baabi a mframa no bԑkɔ biara.`
F2: `Ɛma mframa a ano yɛ den (a mpɛn pii no ɛyɛ kwansin anaa dɔnhwerew no 100 de kosi 200 so), na bere a anweatwahyia ahum no rekɔ so nyinaa no, na ɛretase nneɛma a emu yɛ duru kɔ mframa mu.`
---------------------- (904) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛhyԑ aseԑ feaa te sԑ tokuro na ԑfiri soro asiane fam na adane "mmotia mframa" no.`
F2: `Wɔhyɛ ase te sɛ hwiei a ɛresian afi ahum mununkum mu, na ɛka asase a, adane anweatwahyia ahum.`
---------------------- (905) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔma ‘Personal VPN (virtual private network)’ yԑ kwan papa a wɔfa so de si amannyɔfoɔ kwan bɔne a wɔde nsԑntwerԑfoɔ fa so ԑne ‘commercial IP-geofiltering’ ano kwan.`
F2: `Nnipa a wɔma “VPN” (“virtual private network”) no wɔ ɔkwan soronko a wɔfa so siw amanyɔ a ɛmma nnipa kwan mma wɔnkasa ne abɛɛfo kwantempɔn mu twitwa ano.`
---------------------- (906) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn nimdeԑ fa ‘web proxies’ ho wɔ soro ԑnam nneԑma bebree nti: Wɔtumi dane Intanԑte so dwumadie nyinaa ani, na ԑnyԑ http nko ara.`
F2: `Wɔn na wɔwɔ tumi wɔ “web proxies” so esiane nneɛma bi nti: Sɛ abɛɛfo kwantempɔn no so yɛ ma a, wɔn na woyi fa baabi foforo, a ɛnyɛ “http” nko ara.`
---------------------- (907) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔtaa ma ‘bandwidth’ a ԑwɔ soro ԑne ɔsom a ԑwɔ soro. Wɔasɔ ano nti obi ntumi ntetԑ wo.`
F2: `Wɔn na wɔma “bandwidth” a egyina so na wɔsom ɔmanfo nso yiye. Wɔabɔ ho ban a ɛyɛ den sɛ obi behu nea ewom.`
---------------------- (908) ----------------------
F1: `Nsԑntwerԑ dwuma no twa ntorɔ da biara fa dwumadie yi ho, wɔkyerԑ sԑ "wɔde resi kwan a wɔfa nkurɔfoɔ nimdeԑ" no ano kwan.`
F2: `Nsɛnkyerɛwfo taa twa atoro fa nea nti a wɔyɛ no saa, wɔ bere a wɔka se “ɛyɛ ade a wɔyɛ de bɔ korɔno”.`
---------------------- (909) ----------------------
F1: `Nokorԑ no ne sԑ, mantam mmara nni nsunsuansoɔ wɔ sԑ woretwe obi adeԑ a etia mmara so; ‘disk’ a woatwe no nkakrankakra bԑtumi abɔ wɔ afidie biara a deԑ ԑyԑ papa no bԑtumi abɔ wɔ so biara.`
F2: `Nokwasɛm ne sɛ, amantam ahyɛnsode nɔma no nni nsunsuanso biara wɔ ɔkwan bɔne a wɔfa so sua no: sɛ wɔbɛhwɛ ɔkwan a wɔfa so yɛ no asua ayɛ bi nkakrankakra no yɛ adwuma sɛnea akade no ankasa yɛ adwuma no.`
---------------------- (910) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ nti titire ne sԑ wɔbԑma saa nnwumakuo no tumi wɔ wɔn dwadie no so; ne nyinaa yԑ sika a ԑrekɔ ntwaaho.`
F2: `Nea nti a wɔyɛ saa no ne sɛ wɔbɛboa ama adwumakuw ahorow no kwan ama wɔn ankasa ahwɛ wɔn aguadi so; ne nyinaa yɛ sikasɛm nti na wɔyɛ saa.`
---------------------- (911) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnam sԑ wotumi frԑ wɔ Intanԑte so no nti, wonhia sԑ wode adwumamu fon a ԑwɔ wo mpɔtam no anaa baabi a wotu kwan kɔ no bԑdi dwuma.`
F2: `Esiane sɛ wotumi kasa wɔ abɛɛfo kwantempɔn no so nti, ɛho mpo nhia sɛ wobɛkɔ akɔkasa wɔ ahamatorofo adwumakuw bi mu a ɛwɔ baabi a wote anaa baabi a wubetu kwan akɔ.`
---------------------- (912) ----------------------
F1: `Biribiara nso nni hɔ sԑ ԑsԑ sԑ wonya nɔma firi mpɔtam a wote no; wobԑtumi anya ‘satellite’ Intanԑte a wode bԑdi dwuma wɔ ‘wilds of Chicken, Alaska’ na woafa nɔma bi a ԑbԑkyerԑ sԑ wowɔ ‘sunny Arizona’.`
F2: `Nhyehyɛe pɔtee biara nso nni hɔ a ɛsɛ sɛ wugyina so kotwa nɔma wɔ kurow a wote so no mu; wubetumi apɛ abɛɛfo kwantempɔn biara a ɛwɔ “Chicken”, “Alaska”, na woagyina so ayi nɔma a ɛkyerɛ sɛ wowɔ “Arizona”.`
---------------------- (913) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛtɔ da a wobԑhia sԑ wotɔ ‘wiase nɔma’ bi a ԑbԑma PSTN fon afrԑ wo. Baabi a nɔma no firi na ԑkyerԑ nnipa a wɔrefrԑ wo no nsonsonoeԑ.`
F2: `Mpɛn pii no, ɛsɛ sɛ wopɛ amansan nɔma wɔ nkyɛn a “PSTN” hamatorofo mpo betumi afrɛ wo. Baabi a nɔma no wɔ no ma nsakrae ba nkurɔfo frɛ a wɔbɛfrɛ wo no mu.`
---------------------- (914) ----------------------
F1: `‘Real-time text translator apps’ – yԑ ‘applications’ a ԑtumi kyerԑ kasa bi mu nsԑm ase de kɔ kasa foforɔ mu.`
F2: `“Real-Time apps” yɛ kɔmputa anaa ahamatorofo mu akade no mu bi a ɛkyerɛ nsɛm ase fi kasa bi mu kɔ kasa foforo mu.`
---------------------- (915) ----------------------
F1: `‘Applications’ a ԑwɔ saa kuo yi mu binom bԑtumi akyerԑ nsԑm a ԑwɔ kasa foforɔ mu a ԑfa nsԑnkyerԑnneԑ ho anaa nneԑma bi a ԑwɔ wiase yi mu ase sԑ deԑ ɔkuta ‘smartphone’ no de hwԑ adekorɔ no so a.`
F2: `Saa “aplikahyens” no mu bi mpo tumi kyerɛ nkyerɛwde ahorow ase kɔ kasa foforo mu anaa wotumi kyerɛ anituade nneɛma ase kɔ kasa foforo mu wɔ bere a wode ahamatorofo no akyerɛ dekode no so.`
---------------------- (916) ----------------------
F1: `Nkyerԑaseԑ afidie ayԑ yie pa ara, nti seesei ԑma wo nkyerԑaseԑ a ԑyԑ papa (kakra bi na ԑyԑ nwura), nanso ahwԑyie kakra wɔ ho, ԑfiri sԑ ebia na ne nyinaa nyԑ papa.`
F2: `Mfidi a edi kasa nkyerɛase ho dwuma no akɔ n’anim yiye, ɛnna seesei nso ɛtaa ma nkyerɛase a nkekaawa biara nni ho (ɛnna ɛmma nsɛnhunu bebree), nanso ehia ahwɛyiye, efisɛ ebetumi akɔba no sɛ ankyerɛ nsɛm no ase yiye.`
---------------------- (917) ----------------------
F1: `Saa ‘apps’ a ԑwɔ saa kuo yi mu a agye din pa ara ne Google Translate, ԑyԑ a ԑma kwan ma wotumi yԑ nkyerԑaseԑ a ‘wo data nsi so’ berԑ a wɔatwe kasa korɔ no ‘data’ no awie no.`
F2: `Akade ahorow no mu biako a edi mu a wɔde di kasa nkyerɛase ho dwuma ne “Google Translate”, a ɛboa ma obi tumi yɛ ɔkasa nkyerɛase adwuma wɔ bere a onni intanɛt so, na watwe kasa koro a ɔreyɛ nkyerɛase no wom no ho deeta.`
---------------------- (918) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wode ‘GPS navigation apps’ redi dwuma wɔ wo ‘smartphone’ so no yԑ kwan pa a wobԑtumi anante wɔ berԑ a wonni wo man mu.`
F2: `Sɛ wode “GPS” akade ahorow no mu biara wɔ w’ahamatorofo so no ma dwuma a woredi no yɛ mmerɛw ɛnna ɛsan nso ma wo ahotɔso wɔ bere a wunni wo man mu.`
---------------------- (919) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛbԑtumi ama woasie sika ԑfiri sԑ wontɔ ‘map’ foforɔ mma GPS bi, anaa ‘GPS afidie biara’ anaa wonhan bi mfiri wɔn a wɔde kaa ma ahan no hɔ.`
F2: `Ɛmma wonsɛe sika wɔ bere a woretɔ maapo ama “GPS” no, anaa woretɔ “GPS” akade anaa worefɛm bi afi adwumakuw a wɔde lɔre fɛm mu.`
---------------------- (920) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wonni ‘data’ wɔ wo fon no so anaa wonni baabi a ԑyԑ adwuma yie a, ne dwumadie so bԑte anaa ԑntumi nni dwuma koraa.`
F2: `Sɛ wunni deeta wɔ w’ahamatorofo no so, anaa sɛ deeta nni beae a wowɔ no a, ɛmma dwuma a woredi no nkɔ waano waano anaa etumi te kɔ koraa.`
---------------------- (921) ----------------------
F1: `Fon kaade a wɔde tɔ ‘credit’ gu fon so bebree ahyԑ mantwea sotɔɔ biara mu ma a wobԑtumi de ama fon anaa tetefon yi ara.`
F2: `Ahamatorofo kaade a wotua sika ansa na wɔanya kwan de adi dwuma a wobetumi nso de adi dwuma wɔ ahamatorofo a wotua sika tɔ no amonom anaa ahamatorofo biara so no abu so wɔ sotɔɔ a ɛhyehyɛ ntokuru mu.`
---------------------- (922) ----------------------
F1: `Berԑ a kaade no bi yԑ ma ɔfrԑ wɔ baabiara no, ebinom yԑ dwuma soronko ma wotumi frԑ aman bi nko ara.`
F2: `Kaade binom ye sɛ wode bɛfrɛ baabiara no, ebinom nso bɔ wɔn ho mmɔden de sika toto frɛ a wɔbɛfrɛ no ho wɔ aman binom mu.`
---------------------- (923) ----------------------
F1: `Saa dwuma yi ho akwannya taa nam tetefon nɔma a wofrԑ a wontua ka so.`
F2: `Sɛ wubenya kwan de eyinom biara adi dwuma no gyina ahamatorofo a wode di dwuma a wuntua sika na obiara betumi afrɛ afa so no so.`
---------------------- (924) ----------------------
F1: `Mmara a ԑfa mfonin twa ho nso kɔ ma sini twa nso, ԑkɔ ma no pa ara.`
F2: `Nhyehyɛe a ɛwɔ daadaa mfonitwa ho no bi ara na ɛwɔ sinitwa nso ho, a ebi mpo wɔ soro sen saa.`
---------------------- (925) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ woretwa biribi mfonin na ԑtia mmara a, ԑnneԑ mԑnnwene koraa sԑ wobԑtwa no sini.`
F2: `Sɛ wɔmma ho kwan sɛ wubetwa biribi mfoni a, ɛnde to w’adwene mu wɔ sɛ wubetwa dekode no sini.`
---------------------- (926) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wode ‘drone’ redi dwuma a, hwԑ hunu deԑ mmara ma ho kwan sԑ wotwa ԑne deԑ wohia tumi krataa ansa na woatumi atwa.`
F2: `Sɛ wode afiri a ɛfa wim twa mfoni anaa sini na ɛredi dwuma a, di kan gye akwannya wɔ nea ɛsɛ sɛ wutwa ho na hwɛ hu nea ɛma wo ho kwan saa anaa hwɛ sɛ tumi krataa bi ka ho ana.`
---------------------- (927) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wode ‘drone’ bԑfa wiemhyԑn gyinabea anaa nnipadɔm so no nyԑ sԑ mpo ԑntia mmara wɔ baabi a wowɔ no a.`
F2: `Sɛ wode afiri a ɛfa wim twa sini wɔ wimhyɛn gyinabea anaa wɔ amanfo ti so no nyɛ ade pa, mpo sɛ ɛyɛ ade pa wɔ wo mpɔtam a.`
---------------------- (928) ----------------------
F1: `Nansa yi akwantuo a wɔfa wiem no, wɔntaa nyԑ wiemhyԑn no ho nhyehyԑeԑ wɔ berԑ a wɔnhwehwԑ ho asԑm na wɔmfa ԑboɔ no ntoto ho.`
F2: `Seesei nnipa betu kwan afa wim a, wodi ho dwuma wɔ wimhyɛn adwumakuw no hɔ ankasa wɔ bere a wɔnyɛ nhwehwɛmu mfa bow no ntoto ho.`
---------------------- (929) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛtɔ da a, wiemhyԑn baako no ara bԑtumi anya boɔ a ԑnyԑ pԑ nti ԑhia sԑ wode boɔ no bԑtoto ho na afei no wobԑhwԑ wiemhyԑn no ankasa wԑbsate no so ansa na woatɔ wo tikiti.`
F2: `Ɛtɔ da a, wimhyɛn koro no ara kura bow a ɛda nso wɔ ntentanfiri so, a ehia sɛ wɔbɛyɛ nhwehwɛmu afa ho, na wɔasan nso ahwɛ ntentanfiri a saa wimhyɛn adwumakuw no wɔ so ansa na wɔagye ato mu.`
---------------------- (930) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwom sԑ ebia wopԑ sԑ wokɔ akwansra anaa wokɔyԑ adwuma bi wɔ aman binom so a, wonhia visa nanso sԑ worekɔ a sԑ osuani no, wokyԑre hɔ sene sԑ worekɔ akwansra kԑkԑ.`
F2: `Enhia sɛ wubegye akwantu krataa atu kwan akɔ aman binom so sɛ nsrahwɛni anaa sɛ oguadini de, nanso sɛ wobɛkɔ hɔ sɛ osuani a wufi ɔman foforo so no bɛma woakyɛ sen sɛ worekɔ nsrahwɛ bi kɛkɛ.`
---------------------- (931) ----------------------
F1: `Ne nyinaa ne sԑ, sԑ woretena ɔman foforɔ so berԑ tenten bi mu no, wohia sԑ wogye visa kane ansa.`
F2: `Ne nyinaa mu no, sɛ woretu kwan akɔkyɛre wɔ ɔman foforo so de a, ehia sɛ wubegye akwantu krataa.`
---------------------- (932) ----------------------
F1: `Nneԑma a wɔhia ne kwan a wɔfa so nya asuafoɔ ‘visa’ ԑne kwan a wɔfa so nya akwansrafoɔ anaa wɔn a wɔrekɔyԑ adwuma bi ‘visa’ nyԑ pԑ.`
F2: `Nhyehyɛe ahorow a wɔyɛ no akwantu krataagye mu no, asuafo akwantu krataagye no da nso fi nsrahwɛfo anaa aguadifo akwantu krataagye no ho.`
---------------------- (933) ----------------------
F1: `Aman bebree wɔ hɔ a, wohia krataa a ԑfiri suapɔn no a wopԑ sԑ wokɔsua adeԑ wom no hɔ, ԑne wo sikasԑm ho adansedie sԑ sԑ wokɔ a wobԑtumi ahwԑ wo ho wɔ afe a ԑdi kan wɔ w’adesua no mu.`
F2: `Aman pii mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ wunya akwannya krataa fi sukuu a worekosua ade wɔ hɔ no hɔ, ɛnna bio nso, ɛsɛ sɛ wunya adansedi krataa a ɛfa wo sikatua a ɛreboa wo sukuukɔ no wɔ afe a edi kan no mu ho.`
---------------------- (934) ----------------------
F1: `Hwehwԑ firi suapɔn no ԑne wɔn a wɔhwԑ akwantuo nsԑm so wɔ ɔman a wopԑ sԑ wokɔsua adeԑ wɔ mu no hɔ na gye nkyerԑmu.`
F2: `Bɔ mmɔden gye nhyehyɛe a ɛda w’akwantu no ho fi sukuu a worekosua ade wom no ne akwantubea no nkyɛn.`
---------------------- (935) ----------------------
F1: `Agye sԑ woyԑ aban ananmusini, ԑnte saa a, woreyԑ adwuma wɔ ɔman foforɔ so no kyerԑ sԑ ԑsԑ sԑ wotua ԑtoɔ ma ɔman no a wote mu no.`
F2: `Sɛ wonyɛ ɔman ananmusini de a, sɛ woretu kwan akɔ ɔman foforo so akɔyɛ adwuma a, ɛsɛ sɛ woyɛ towtua ho nkrataa wɔ ɔman a wote mu no mu.`
---------------------- (936) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛtoɔ tua ho nhyehyԑeԑ sesa wɔ aman ahodoɔ so, ԑnna ԑtoɔ dodoɔ a obi tua ԑne nnipa a wɔtua toɔ no sesa wɔ aman foforɔ so.`
F2: `Akatua ho towtua no da nso wɔ aman ahorow so, ɛnna towtua ho nhyehyɛe no nso da nso wɔ aman ahorow so.`
---------------------- (937) ----------------------
F1: `Aman a ԑwɔ nkyekyԑmu te sԑ United States ԑne Canada no, wɔgye toɔ no wɔ ɔman no ne mpɔtam hɔ no mmienu nti ԑtoɔ no ne nnipa a wɔtua no sesa firi mantam bi kɔ mantam bi mu.`
F2: `Aman akɛse mu te sɛ United States ne Canada mu no, wɔma soro hɔfo no ne asehɔfo no nyinaa tua akatua ho tow, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ na towtua ho nhyehyɛe no bɛda nso wɔ amantam ahorow no mu.`
---------------------- (938) ----------------------
F1: `Berԑ a wɔn a wɔhwԑ akwantufoɔ no nsi anaa bԑyԑ mmrԑ wɔ berԑ a woaduru wo man mu no, baabi a woyi nneԑma no deԑ ԑbԑtumi ama woabrԑ.`
F2: `Ebetumi akɔba no sɛ nhwehwɛmu a ɛwɔ sɛ wɔyɛ wɔ akwantubea a ɛwɔ wo man mu no nni hɔ anaa ɛyɛ ade a wɔnyere akwantufo no pii de, nanso akwantubea a wɔde nneɛma fa no de, wobetumi ahaw w’adwene pa ara.`
---------------------- (939) ----------------------
F1: `Hunu deԑ wobԑtumi de aba ne deԑ wontumi mfa mma na ka biribiara a ԑwom kyerԑ wɔn wɔ tumi krataa no so.`
F2: `Hwɛ sɛ wowɔ nneɛma a wopɛ sɛ wode ba anaa nea wompɛ sɛ wode ba no ho nimdeɛ, na fa nea ɛboro nea ɛsɛ sɛ wofa no so no kyerɛ.`
---------------------- (940) ----------------------
F1: `Kwan tiawa a wobԑfa so ahyԑ aseԑ wɔ ‘akwantuo mu atwerԑ’ dwumadie mu ne sԑ wobԑpԑ nimdeԑ wɔ ‘akwantuo blog’ wԑbsate bi a agye din so.`
F2: `Ͻkwan a ɛsɛ sɛ wofa so na wommerɛw wɔ adwuma a ɛfa kwan a wotu kyerɛwkyerɛw mu no ne sɛ wobɛpɛ nimdeɛ soronko afi ntentanfiri a akwantu ho nsɛm kɔ so wɔ hɔ.`
---------------------- (941) ----------------------
F1: `Berԑ a woahunu kwan a wɔfa so sesa nneԑma wɔ wԑb so no, afei akyire yi, wo nso bԑtumi ayԑ w’ankasa wo wԑbsate.`
F2: `Sɛ wunya nimdeɛ fa ɔkwan a wɔfa so di dwuma ahorow wɔ ntentanfiri no so wie a, w’ankasa betumi abue wo ntentanfiri.`
---------------------- (942) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wode wo ho bԑhyԑ dwumadie bi mu wɔ berԑ a woretu kwan ma woda nso nanso ԑnyԑ ɔma nko ara.`
F2: `Sɛ wubetu wo ho akyɛ akɔ mmoa wɔ bere a woretu kwan no ye de, nanso ɛnyɛ mmoa no nko ara na ehia.`
---------------------- (943) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wobԑtena na woayԑ dwumadie bi wɔ ɔman foforɔ so yԑ kwan kԑseԑ a wobԑtumi afa so ahunu amammerԑ foforɔ, ahyia nnipa foforɔ, ahu wo ho yie, ahunu kwan foforɔ a wɔfa so hwԑ biribi na woanya nimdeԑ foforɔ.`
F2: `Sɛ wobɛtena ɔman foforo so asan aboa ɔman no yɛ ɔkwan soronko a wubetumi afa so ahu amammere foforo, ahyia nnipa afoforo, anya nhunumu soronko asan anya nimdeɛ wɔ nneɛma binom yɛ ho.`
---------------------- (944) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛbԑtumi nso ayԑ kwan a wobԑfa so atwe wo sikasԑm mu na ama woatena baabi akyԑre ԑfiri sԑ saa adwuma no bebree ma wonya baabi da na kakra bi nso tua sika kakra ma wo.`
F2: `Ɛsan nso yɛ ɔkwan pa a wubetumi afa so ayɛ wo sika ho ntotoe ama woatena hɔ akyɛ, efisɛ atuhoakyɛ nnwuma pii no ara ma wo ɔdan ne akatua kakra.`
---------------------- (945) ----------------------
F1: `‘Vikings’ faa Russian nsuo no so na ԑkɔɔ Black Sea ԑne Caspian Sea. Saa kwan yi baabi wɔ hɔ a, wobԑtumi afa so seesei. Hwԑ sԑ wobԑnya tumi krataa, a ԑyԑ den sԑ wo nsa bԑka.`
F2: `Vikings nam Russia nsu so na wokoduruu “Black Sea” ne “Caspian Sea” no so.`
---------------------- (946) ----------------------
F1: `White Sea–Baltic Canal no fa Arctic Ocean no mu kɔ Baltic Sea, nam Lake Onega so, Lake Ladoga ԑne Saint Petersburg, mpԑn pii nam asubɔntene ne asutadeԑ so.`
F2: `“White Sea-Baltic Canal” nam “Lake Onega”, “Lake Ladoga” ne “Saint Petersburg” nsu ne ɔtare so na ɛka “Arctic Ocean” ne “Baltic Sea” bom.`
---------------------- (947) ----------------------
F1: `Lake Onega sane nso bɔ Volga mu, ԑno nti sԑ wofiri Caspian Sea ԑrefa Russia no bԑtumi ayԑ yie.`
F2: `“Lake Onega” nso ne “Volga” ka bom, enti sɛ ebefi “Caspian Sea” wɔ bere a ɔnam “Russia” no nso tumi yɛ ye.`
---------------------- (948) ----------------------
F1: `Hyԑ no nso sԑ berԑ a wobԑduru suhyԑn gyinabea no ara biribiara bԑyԑ fann. Wobԑhyia suhyԑn foforɔ ԑmufoɔ no bԑka wɔn nsԑm akyerԑ wo.`
F2: `Hu no sɛ wunya duru nsu no ano a suhyɛn nketewa no sisi no a, wubehu biribiara mu fann. Wubehyia nnipa a wɔn nso foro suhyɛn nketewa no bi ama wɔaka wɔn nsɛm akyerɛ wo.`
---------------------- (949) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ wobԑyԑ koraa ne sԑ wobԑboa abɔ nkurɔfoɔ nkaeԑ, nam baabi a suhyԑn gyina no ho, worekɔ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔrepopa wɔn suhyԑn ho, wo ne wɔn a wɔtwi suhyԑn no redi nkutaho ne ade.`
F2: `Nneɛma a wobɛhyɛ no nso bi ne nnipa a wohia mmoa, nnipa a wɔrepopa wɔn suhyɛn nketewa no ho, hyɛntwifo a wɔwɔ nsanombea, ne nea ɛkeka ho.`
---------------------- (950) ----------------------
F1: `Hwԑ sԑ wo ne nkurɔfoɔ bebree bԑkasa sԑdeԑ wobԑtumi. Ɛyԑ kakra a, obiara bԑhu wo na wɔakyerԑ wo suhyԑn a ԑrepԑ obi.`
F2: `Bɔ mmɔden sɛ wo ne nnipa dodow biara a wopɛ bɛkasa. Akyiri no, obiara behu wo ama wɔati ho akyerɛ wo suhyɛn koro a ɛrepɛ nnipa afa.`
---------------------- (951) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsԑ sԑ wofa ‘Frequent Flyer’ wiemhyԑn wɔ ‘alliance’ yie.`
F2: `Wo woredan kuw bi ayi wimhyɛn a wopɛ sɛ wode tu kwan no a, yɛ ahwɛyie.`
---------------------- (952) ----------------------
F1: `Ebia na ԑyԑ w’adwene sԑ ԑyԑ sԑ wobԑforo wiemhyԑn a daa wode tu kwan no ara, ԑsԑ sԑ wohunu sԑ akwannya a wɔde ma no taa sesa na ‘frequent flyer’ beaeԑ no bԑtumi ate so wɔ wiemhyԑn foforɔ wɔ saa ‘alliance’ hɔ ara.`
F2: `Ewom sɛ wobɛpɛ sɛ wode wimhyɛn koro no ara betu kwan de, nanso ɛsɛ sɛ wuhu sɛ akwannya a wunya wɔ hɔ no betumi asesa ama wimhyɛn foforo ho nhyehyɛe no mmom bɛyɛ ama wo.`
---------------------- (953) ----------------------
F1: `Wiemhyԑn bi te sԑ Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines abae wɔ dwumadie mu akɔ Abibiman mu, na wɔdi dwuma wɔ Abibiman nkuropɔn titire bebree mu wɔ boɔ a ԑwɔ fam sene European wiemhyԑn nkaeԑ no.`
F2: `Wimhyɛn kuw bi te sɛ “Emirates”, “Etihad Airways”, “Qatar Airways” ne “Turkish Airlines” ahyɛ wɔn nhyehyɛe ahorow a wogyina so som amanfo no mu kena wɔ Abibiman mu, ɛnna nea ɛkokɔ Abibiman nkurow binom nso so no, wɔayɛ bow no yiye asen Amannɔne wimhyɛn kuw no bi.`
---------------------- (954) ----------------------
F1: `Turkish Airlines kɔ baabi 39 wɔ Abibiman man 30 ԑfiri afe 2014.`
F2: `Afe 2014 mu no, na “Turkish Airlines” no yɛ adwuma kɔ mmeae 39 wɔ Abibiman nkurow 30 so.`
---------------------- (955) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wowɔ berԑ kakra a, hwehwԑ sika a wobԑtua akɔ Abibiman mu no na fa toto deԑ wotua de kɔ wiase baabi foforɔ no ho.`
F2: `Sɛ wowɔ mmere wɔ hɔ a wode betu kwan a, fa akwantu sika a wubetua de akɔ Abibiman mu no toto kwan a wubetu akɔ wiase afanan ahorow no ho.`
---------------------- (956) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmma wo werԑ mfiri sԑ wobԑfa sika a wode bԑtua visa foforɔ ka, ԑtoɔ a wotua sԑ worefiri hɔ a, sika a wode bԑfa kaa ne ade ma saa beaeԑ a ԑnni Abibiman mu no.`
F2: `Mmeae a enni Abibiman mu no, sɛ wubetu kwan akɔ hɔ a, bɔ mmɔden pɛ sika a wode betua akwantu krataa biara a ɛka nea wowɔ dedaw no ho, mmaeɛ ho tow, lɔrefa sikatua, ne nea ɛkeka ho.`
---------------------- (957) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wotu kwan fa wiase nyinaa wɔ Anaafoɔfam Ntwahohyiafa no mu a, ɔhye da ewiemuhyɛn mu akwantuo ne mmeaɛ a wo bɛkɔ no ho esiane ɔkwan a enni ɛpo no so no nti.`
F2: `Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wutu kwan fa wiase afanan nyinaa wɔ “Southern Hemisphere” a, wimhyɛn ne beae a wubesi no ho yɛ den kakra esiane ɔkwan a wunnya wɔ popɔn so no nti.`
---------------------- (958) ----------------------
F1: `Ewiemuhyɛn adwumakuo nkabom biara nni hɔ a ɛkata ɛpo so ntwamu kwan mmiɛnsa a ɛwɔ Anaafoɔfam Ntwahihyiafa no nyinaa so (na SkyTeam nkata ntwamu kwan no mu biara so).`
F2: `Nnwumakuw a wodi wimhyɛnfa ho dwuma no mu biara nni tumi wɔ popɔn so fa no nyinaa so wɔ “Southern Hemisphere” (ɛnna “Sky Team” nso nni tumi wɔ popɔn so fa yi mu biara so).`
---------------------- (959) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho no, Star Alliance kata biribiara so agye apueɛfam Anaafoɔ Pacific no afiri Santiago de Chile de kosi Tahiti, a ɛyɛ LATAM Oneworld ewiemuhyɛn mu akwantuo.`
F2: `Mmom, wuyi popɔn so fa a efi “South Pacific” a ɛwɔ “Santiago de Chile” de kosi “Tahiti” a ɛyɛ “LATAM Oneworld” wimhyɛn no to nkyɛn a, “Star Alliance” wɔ tumi wɔ nkae no nyinaa so.`
---------------------- (960) ----------------------
F1: `Nnyɛ saa ewiemuhyɛn mu akwantuo wei nkoaa na wobetumi apa sɛ wopɛ sɛ wo bɔ tra Anaafoɔ Pacific no ne Anaafoɔ America atɔeɛ mpoano no a. (hwɛ aseɛ hɔ)`
F2: `Sɛ wompɛ sɛ wofa “South Pacific” ne “South America” atɔe fam no a, ɛnyɛ saa wimhyɛn yi nkutoo na ɛsɛ sɛ wofa.`
---------------------- (961) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ 1994 mu no, Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh abusukuo a afi Azerbaijan no tuu ɔko so sa tiaa Azeris.`
F2: `Afe 1994 mu no, “Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh” a ɛyɛ mantam biako wɔ “Azerbaijan” no koo nnipa a wɔwɔ “Azeris”.`
---------------------- (962) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ tee akwasafoɔman foforɔ aberɛ a na Armeniafoɔ bɔ akyidɔm no. Nanso, ɔman a wɔn ate biara - mpo Armenia no - nnim.`
F2: `“Armerian” taa akyi maa wɔtee ɔman foforo. Mmom, saa ɔman yi nyɛ ɔman a wogye to mu, mpo “Armenia” man no nnye nto mu.`
---------------------- (963) ----------------------
F1: `Amansɛm ho akasakasa a ɛfa ɔmantam no ho no kɔɔ so sɛe ayɔnkofa a ɛda Armenia ne Azerbaijan ntam.`
F2: `Amanaman nkitahodi ho akyinnyegye wɔ saa ɔman yi ho no gu so ara resɛe twaka a ɛda “Armenia” ne “ Azerbaijan” ntam no.`
---------------------- (964) ----------------------
F1: `Canal Mansini (Dutch: Grachtengordel) yɛ 17th-mfeɛ ɔha mansini a agye din a atwa Binnenstad a ɛwɔ Amsterdam no ho ahyia.`
F2: `“Canal District” (Dutch: Grachtengordel) yɛ mansin a etwa “Binnenstad” a ɛwɔ “Amsterdam” ho hyia a egyee din pa ara wɔ mfe ɔha a ɛto so 17 no mu.`
---------------------- (965) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde UNESCO Wiase Amammerɛ Beaɛ dwumadie ahyɛ mansni no nyinaa nsa esiane n'amammerɛ ne n'abakɔsɛm a ɛyɛ soronko na ɛsombo no, na n'agyapadeɛ a ɛsom bo no ka deɛ ɛwowɔ soro paa wɔ ɔman no mu no ho.`
F2: `Esiane sɛ saa mansin yi wɔ amammere ne abakɔsɛm a edi mu ne ntetee pa a ɛda nso wɔ ɔman no mu no nti, wɔayi saa mansin yi sɛ “UNESCO World Heritage Site”.`
---------------------- (966) ----------------------
F1: `Nkura nketewa anum a ɛno ne Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza ne Monterosso na ɛka bom yɛ Cinque Terre, a asekyerɛ ne Nsase Anum, ɛwɔ Italy mantam mu wɔ Liguria.`
F2: `Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza ne Monterosso yɛ Italy a ɛwɔ Liguria mpoano nkurow nketewa anum a ɛwɔ Cinque Terre a ɛkyerɛ Nsase Anum.`
---------------------- (967) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn din wɔ UNESCO Wiase Amammerɛ Dinfrɛ nhoma no mu.`
F2: `Saa nkurow nketewa yi wɔ “UNESCO World Heritage List” no so.`
---------------------- (968) ----------------------
F1: `Mfe ɔpepem a atwam no, nkurɔfoɔ de ahwɛyie asisi terraces wɔ asase hutuhutu, a agyina hɔ kuronkuron wɔ abotan no so a ɛma ɛpo no yɛ fɛ.`
F2: `Mfe ɔha pii a atwam kɔ no, nnipa ahwɛ asisi bamma ahorow wɔ asase a ɛkɔ abo a ɛwɔ po no soro no so.`
---------------------- (969) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔfa bi a ɛkyere adwene a ɛka ho no yɛ mpuntuo nkabom a wɔnni no. Anammɔnkwan, keteke ne kodoɔ ka nkura no bom, na ahyɛn entumi ndu hɔ firi abɔnten.`
F2: `Mpuntu a egyina nkabom so a enni no ne n’ahoɔden no fa bi. Akwan, keteke ne korow na ɛka nkurow nketewa yi bom, ɛnna ɛhyɛn ntumi mfiri abɔnten so nwura mu.`
---------------------- (970) ----------------------
F1: `French kasa ahodoɔ a wɔka wɔ Belgium ne Switzerland no nsonsonoeɛ kakra wɔ mu sen French a wɔka wɔ France no, nanso nsɛdie wɔ mu a ɛma no yɛ mmerɛ sɛ wobɛte aseɛ.`
F2: `Ewom sɛ French kasa no fa bi a Belgium ne Switzerland ka no da nso kakra fi French kasa a wɔka no wɔ France no de, nanso ɛbɛn yiye a wɔka a wɔte wɔn ho ase.`
---------------------- (971) ----------------------
F1: `Titire no, wɔ akontahyɛdeɛ mu wɔ Belgium ne Switzerland a wɔka French no adeɛ soronko kakra wɔ ho a ɛda nso firi French a wɔ ka wɔ France no, na nsonsonoeɛ kakra da sɛdeɛ wɔ bɔ nsɛmfua bi ntam.`
F2: `Titiriw, nsonsonoe kakra da French nɔma ne nsɛmfua a Belgium ne Switzerland de di dwuma ne nea French kasa a wɔka no wɔ France no ntam.`
---------------------- (972) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, nanka ɛsɛ sɛ Belgiumfoɔ ne Swissfoɔ a wɔka French no sua French ɔfranka wɔ sukuu mu, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a anka wɔ bɛte w'ase sɛ mpo wode French ɔfranka akontahyɛdeɛ de dwuma a.`
F2: `Eyi nte nkɔda no, sɛ nnipa a wofi Belgium ne Switzerland no akɔ sukuu akosua French kasa no ankasa a, wobetumi ate French kasa no ankasa nɔma ahorow a wodi di dwuma no ase a wɔmmerɛw ho.`
---------------------- (973) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ wiase no afa bebree mu no, wo nsa a wobɛ him no yɛ ayɔnkofa suo, a ɛkyerɛ "hello."`
F2: `Mmeae binom wɔ wiase yi mu no, sɛ obi behim ne nsa akyerɛ wo no kyerɛ “nkyia”.`
---------------------- (974) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, wɔ Malaysia, wɔ Malays a wɔwɔ nkura aseɛ no mu no, ɛkyerɛ "bra ha,", tesɛ akyerɛkyerɛ kwan nsatea a wɔ bu ba nipadua no anim no, honam yɛbeaɛ a wɔ de di dwuma wɔ Atɔeɛfam aman pii so, na saa atrimpɔ no nkoaa nti na ɛsɛ sɛ wo de di dwuma sa.`
F2: `Mmom, Malaysia man mu no, nnipa a wɔte Malaysia nkurow nketewa binom so no him wɔn nsa kyerɛ wo anaa wɔbu wɔn akyerɛkyerɛkwan nsatea no kyerɛ ɔhonam no so a, ɛkyerɛ sɛ “wɔrefrɛ wo”, a saa ara bi na aman a wɔwɔ Atɔe fam no nso de di dwuma.`
---------------------- (975) ----------------------
F1: `Saa ara nso na, British ɔkwantufoɔ a ɔwɔ Spain bɛ susu sɛ nsa a wɔ him a nsa yam no kyerɛ nipa a ɔrehim ne nsa de adi nkra no (mmom sen nipa a wo him wo nsa akyerɛ no) sɛ yɛbeaɛ a ɛkyerɛ sɛ san w'akyi bra.`
F2: `Saa kwan koro no ara so no, ɔkwantuni a ofi Britain wɔ Spain no nso de ne nsa a ɔrehim (a anka ɛsɛ sɛ ɔde kyerɛ nea ɔrehim ne nsa kyerɛ no ankasa so no) kyerɛ onii no sɛ ɔsan n’akyi mmra.`
---------------------- (976) ----------------------
F1: `Kasa ahodoɔ a ɛboa ɛyɛ kasa a nkurɔfoɔ ayɛ anaa kasa a wɔn ahyehyɛ a wɔ yɛeɛ sɛ ɛbɛ boa nkɔmɔbɔ wɔ nkurɔfoɔ a nkɔmɔbɔ ho yɛ den ma wɔ no ntam.`
F2: `Kasahorow a yehu no sɛ yɛde boa kasa binom no yɛ kasa a nnipa a wɔwɔ ɔhaw wɔ wɔn ankasa kasa a wɔde di nkitaho ho no de di dwuma.`
---------------------- (977) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn ate wɔn afiri lingua francas ho, a ɛyɛ kasa a ɛwɔ ne daadaa fam anaaa wɔn mferaa mu yɛ a edi afoforɔ so esiane atrimbɔ wei anaa foforɔ a ɛyɛ kwan a nnipa a wɔka kasa ahodoɔ fa so bɔ nkɔmɔ.`
F2: `Eyinom da nso fi kasahorow a ɛyɛ kasa a nnipa a wɔnka kasa biako tumi de di nkitaho no ho.`
---------------------- (978) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ ɔhyew mu wɔ da no mu no, akwantufoɔ betumi ahu anisoadehunu a ɛfa nsuo ho (anaasɛ nneɛma afoforɔ).`
F2: `Sɛ ɔhyew wom ɛda no mu a, akwantufo a wɔkɔ hɔ no hu kumaforote a ɛyɛ wɔn te sɛ nsu (anaa nneɛma foforo bi).`
---------------------- (979) ----------------------
F1: `Weinom betumi ayɛ hu sɛ ɔkwantufoɔ no toa n'anisoadehu no so a, ɛsɛe ahoɔden a ɛsombo ne nsuo a aka.`
F2: `Saa nneɛma yi betumi ayɛ ɔhaw ama ɔkwantuni bi a obehu no sɛ kumaforote, efisɛ obetumi asɛe n’ahoɔden ne nsu a aka no wɔ ho.`
---------------------- (980) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛserɛ so a ɛso yɛ hye paa mpo no betumi abɛyɛ nwunu paa wɔ anadwo. Hypothermia yɛ asiane ankasa sɛ wonni ntadeɛ a ɔhyew wɔ mu a.`
F2: `Anweatan a emu yɛ hyew no mpo tumi yɛ nwunu anadwo bere mu. Ɔhyew hwere tumi yɛ ɔhaw ma onipa a ɔnhyɛ atade a ɔhyew wom.`
---------------------- (981) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ ahuhuroberɛ mu, titire no, ɛsɛ sɛ wohwɛ ntomtom kwan sɛ wosi gyinaeɛ sɛ wobɛ nante kwaeɛ no mu de agyegye w'ani a.`
F2: `Ɔhyew bere mu no, sɛ wonenam pɔw mu a, ɛsɛ sɛ wode to wo tim sɛ wubehyia ntontom.`
---------------------- (982) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ mpo wo ka hyɛn fa subtropical nsuotɔ kwaeɛ no mu a, mmerɛ kakra bi a ɛpono no ano bɛ da hɔ berɛ a wore kɔ hyɛ hyɛn no mu no ɛyɛ mmerɛ pa ma ntomtom sɛ wɔne wo bɛkɔ akɔ hyɛ hyɛn no mu.`
F2: `Mpo sɛ wonam nhimahobea pɔw mu a, anitɛtɛ bere kumaa bi a wubebue wo hyɛn awura mu no tumi ma ntontom ho kwan ma wowura hyɛn no mu.`
---------------------- (983) ----------------------
F1: `Nnomaa yareɛ, anaasɛ nea na wɔferɛ no avian influenza no, betumi aka nnomaa ne nufuboa nyinaa.`
F2: `Nnomaa ɔpakum yare anaa ɔpakum a ɛkye ntakramoa binom a wɔte sɛ nnomaa no tumi kye nnomaa ne mmoadoma.`
---------------------- (984) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛho nsem a ɛboro apem na wɔabɔ ho dawuro wɔ nnipa mu, nanso emu binom ayɛ deɛ akum nnipa.`
F2: `Saa yare a yi akye nnipa binom a wonnuru apem, nanso ebinom nam so wuwui.`
---------------------- (985) ----------------------

F2: `警方表示，因爲洛皮科洛曾是普羅文扎諾在巴勒莫的得力助手，所以佔了上風。由於老一輩老闆奉行普羅文扎諾的政策，在加強自己的權力網絡時，盡可能保持低調，所以他豐富的經驗，便為他贏得了老闆的尊重。`

---------------------- (73) ----------------------

F2: `記者馬基斯・特里安塔菲洛普洛斯於幾週前在阿爾法電視台的熱門節目《Zoungla》中披露了此資料後，議員兼律師彼得羅斯・曼圖瓦洛斯便因他的職員涉嫌非法貪污和腐敗而被免職。`
---------------------- (74) ----------------------
F1: `另外，最高法官艾雲傑洛斯·卡路西斯因為貪污同埋腐敗行為罪名成立被判監禁。`
F2: `此外，最高法官埃萬杰洛斯·卡盧西斯因貪污和腐敗行為罪成被判入獄。`
---------------------- (75) ----------------------

F2: `羅伯茨斷然拒絕談論他對生命從何時開始（考慮墮胎道德時的一個重要問題）的見解，並表示對可能情況的細節發表評論是不道德的。`
---------------------- (76) ----------------------

F2: `然而，他重申了他之前的聲明，即羅伊訴韋德案是「美國的既定法律」，強調了最高法院一致裁決的重要性。`

F2: `一次例行消防指揮系統測試後發生電力故障，導致安全閥打開，使原油在格里利堡 9 號泵站附近溢出。`

F2: `閥門打開使系統內的壓力釋放，原油繼而經過油墊流入一個可容納 55,000 桶（230 萬加侖）的油箱。`

---------------------- (105) ----------------------

F2: `石油輸出國組織在最近的每月報告中提及，原油出口已降至 20 年來的最低水平，每天只有 280 萬桶。`

F2: `該國最高領袖阿亞圖拉•阿里•哈梅內伊形容，該國對石油的依賴是源於 1979 年伊朗伊斯蘭革命前的「一個陷阱」，並應該擺脫有關束縛。`

F2: `早在 The Daily Show 和 The Colbert Report 之前，赫克和約翰遜在 1988 年還是華盛頓大學學生時，就想像會有一份刊物模仿新聞和新聞報導。`
---------------------- (125) ----------------------
F1: `自創刊以嚟，《洋蔥新聞》就已經成為一個名副其實嘅新聞搞怪帝國，擁有印刷版、10月份吸引500萬獨立訪客嘅網站、個人廣告、24小時新聞網、播客，同埋最近推出嘅世界地圖集《Our Dumb World》。`
F2: `自創辦以來，《洋蔥報》已經成為一個名副其實的新聞模仿帝國，擁有印刷版、10 月份吸引了 500 萬獨立訪問者的網站、個人廣告、24 小時新聞網絡、博客，以及最近推出名為《我們的愚蠢世界》的世界地圖集。`

F2: `當時，巴士上的樂隊正前往位於密蘇里州的聖路易斯六旗遊樂園，為座無虛席的觀眾表演。`
---------------------- (187) ----------------------
F1: `目擊者話，禮拜六凌晨 1 點 15 分，巴士過緊一盞綠燈，呢個時候有部車喺前面轉彎。`
F2: `據目擊者稱，週六凌晨 1 點 15 分，巴士正橫過一個綠燈，這時汽車在前面轉彎。`
---------------------- (188) ----------------------

F2: `截至八月九日晚上，莫拉克的風眼距離中國福建省約七十公里。`

F2: `颱風預計以每小時十一公里的速度移向中國。`
---------------------- (190) ----------------------

F2: `乘客在華氏90度的高溫下等候時獲派發清水。`
---------------------- (191) ----------------------

---------------------- (192) ----------------------
F1: `至少可以說明，喺過山車上面被困，每時每刻都係唔舒服嘅，而且當時至少用咗一個鐘頭先將第一個人救出。」`
F2: `至少可以說，在過山車上被困，任何一刻都是不舒服的，而且當時至少用了一個小時才將第一個人救出。」`
---------------------- (193) ----------------------

F2: `曾經七次贏取一級方程式錦標賽的冠軍，並於2006年退役的舒馬赫，將代替受傷的費利佩·馬薩出賽。`

---------------------- (317) ----------------------
F1: `一個舊生話：「喺課堂用俚語，用筆記教拍拖技巧，就好似同學生做朋友咁。」`
F2: `一名舊生說他「在課堂上使用俚語，在筆記中教授約會技巧，就像學生的朋友一樣。」`
---------------------- (318) ----------------------
F1: `喺過去 30 年，就算官方上依然係共產主義國家，但係中國已經發展出市場經濟。`
F2: `在過去30年內，儘管官方上仍是共產主義國家，但中國已發展市場經濟。`
---------------------- (319) ----------------------
F1: `第一次經濟改革，係喺鄧小平嘅領導底下進行。`
F2: `第一次經濟改革是在鄧小平領導下進行的。`
---------------------- (320) ----------------------
F1: `由嗰陣時起，中國嘅經濟規模增長咗九十倍。`
F2: `從那時起，中國的經濟規模增長了九十倍。`
---------------------- (321) ----------------------
F1: `舊年，中國出口嘅汽車首次超過德國，而且超過美國成為汽車行業嘅最大市場。`
F2: `去年，中國出口的汽車數量首次超過德國，並超越美國成為汽車行業的最大市場。`
---------------------- (322) ----------------------
F1: `中國嘅GDP或者會喺20年內超越美國。`
F2: `中國的國內生產總值或會在20年內超越美國。`
---------------------- (323) ----------------------
F1: `熱帶風暴丹妮爾喺大西洋東部形成，係2010年大西洋颶風季第四個被命名嘅風暴。`
F2: `熱帶風暴丹妮爾在大西洋東部形成，丹妮爾是 2010 年大西洋颶風季第四個被命名的颶風。`
---------------------- (324) ----------------------
F1: `呢場風暴距離佛羅里達州邁阿密大約3000英哩，最大持續風速達到時速40英哩（64公里）。`
F2: `該風暴距離佛羅里達州邁阿密約 3000 英里，最高持續風速為每小時 40 英里（每小時 64 公里）。`
---------------------- (325) ----------------------
F1: `美國國家颶風中心嘅科學家預測，丹妮爾即將喺禮拜三增強至颶風級別。`
F2: `美國國家颶風中心的科學家預測，丹妮爾將在週三或之前增強為颶風。`
---------------------- (326) ----------------------
F1: `由於風暴距離登陸仲有一段時間，現時仲難以評估會對美國或加勒比海地區嘅潛在影響。`
F2: `風暴距離登陸還有一段時間，目前仍難以評估其對美國或加勒比海地區的潛在影響。`
---------------------- (327) ----------------------
F1: `博貝克喺克羅地亞首都薩格勒布出世，佢喺貝爾格萊德游擊隊效力嗰陣，開始聲名大噪。`
F2: `博貝克出生於克羅地亞首都薩格勒布，在為貝爾格萊德游擊隊球會效力期間成名。`
---------------------- (328) ----------------------
F1: `佢喺 1945 年加入，一直效力到 1958 年。`
F2: `他於 1945 年加入他們，一直效力至 1958 年。`
---------------------- (329) ----------------------
F1: `期間，佢出場468次，攻入403球。`
F2: `他在隊中曾出場 468 次，攻入 403 球。`
---------------------- (330) ----------------------

F2: `沒有人比博貝克為球會出場和入球的次數更多。`
---------------------- (331) ----------------------
F1: `1995 年，佢獲選為游擊隊史上最佳球員。`
F2: `1995 年，他被選為游擊隊史上最佳球員。`
---------------------- (332) ----------------------

---------------------- (333) ----------------------

F2: `緊隨其後的是伊斯坦堡國家交響樂團、一支禁衛軍樂隊，以及歌手 Fatih Erkoç 和 Müslüm Gürses。`

F2: `然後Whirling Dervishes 登上了舞台。`

F2: `土耳其舞蹈團Fire of Anatolia 表演「特洛伊」作結。`
---------------------- (337) ----------------------
