F2: `Daya daga cikin wadanda su ka tsira Franciszek Kowal ya ce “Da muka samu murfin tagar ya karye, sai muka fara fita ta tagar”.`
---------------------- (348) ----------------------
F1: `Taurari suna fitar da wuta da zafi saboda ƙarfin da aka samo yayin da aka haɗa ƙwayar Hydrogen (ko aka hada) tare domin haifar abubuwa masu nauyi.`
F2: `Taurari suna fitar da wuta da zafi saboda karfin da aka samo yayin da aka hada sinadarin Hydrogen da kwayoyin zarra (ko aka hada) tare domin haifar abubuwa masu nauyi.`
---------------------- (352) ----------------------
F1: `Surface tension na faruwa ne saboda ƙananan kwayoyin cikin ruwa a farfajiyan ruwan suna matuƙar haɗuwa da juna saɓanin yadda suke da ƙananan ƙwayoyi na iska da ke samansu.`
F2: `Kumburin ruwa na faruwa ne saboda kananan kwayoyin cikin ruwa a farfajiyan ruwan suna matuƙar jhaɗuwa da juna saɓanin yadda suke kankananan kwayoyi na iska a da ke samansu.`
---------------------- (353) ----------------------
F1: `ƙwayoyin ruwan suna yin wata fata da ba a gani a saman ruwa wadde ke ba da dama ga abubuwa kamar allura su riƙa yawo a saman ruwa.`
F2: `Kwayoyin halittar ruwan suna yin wata fata da ba a gani a saman ruwa wadde ke ba da dama ga abubuwa kamar allura su riƙa yawo a saman ruwa.`
---------------------- (354) ----------------------
F1: `Ƙarfen da ke kan takalman sulun ƙanƙara na zamani na da baki biyu da buɗaɗɗen rami tsakanin su. Gefen biyun suna ba da izini don kyakkyawan kama ƙanƙaran, koda kuwa an goge shi.`
F2: `Karfe da ke kan takalman zamani na wasa a kankara na da baki biyu da buɗaɗɗen rami tsakanin su. Gefen biyun suna ba da izini don kyakkyawan kamu kankaran, koda kuwa an goge shi.`
---------------------- (355) ----------------------
F1: `Saboda ƙasan wuƙar ta ɗan lanƙwashe, yayinda ƙarfen ya karkace daga gefe ɗaya zuwa wani gefen, tsinin wanda yake taɓa ƙanƙarar shi ma yana ɗan lanƙwashewa.`
F2: `Saboda wukar ta dan lankwashe daga kasanta, yayinda wajen kaifin ya karkace dag nan zuwa can, tsinin wanda ya taba kankarar shi ma ya dan lankwashe.`
---------------------- (356) ----------------------
F1: `Wannan yana sa mai sulun ƙanƙarar ya juya. Idan takalman sulun ƙanƙarar ya juya dama, mai sulun ƙanƙarar zai juya dama,Idan takalman sulun ƙanƙarar ya juya hagu, mai sulun ƙanƙarar zai juya hagu.`
F2: `Wannan yana sa skater ya juya. Idan skates suka yi hagu zuwa dama, skater din tayi dama, idan skates dinsu yi hagu zuwa hagu, skater din sai ya juya hagu.`
---------------------- (359) ----------------------
F1: `Masana kimiyya suna kiran wannan tsarin “stimulated emission of radiation” domin ana rura ƙwayar zarra ta hanyar wuta mai haske, wanda ke sa watsin hasken foton, kuma haske wata irin haskawa ne.`
F2: `Masana kimiyya suna kiran wannan tsarin “rurar watsin haskaka” domin ana rura ƙwayar zarra ta hanyar wuta mai haske, wanda ke sa watsin hasken foton, da haske wata iri haskakawa ne.`
---------------------- (360) ----------------------
F1: `Hoto na gaba yana nuna ƙwayan zarra masu fitar da photons. Haƙiƙa, a zahiri photons sunfi ƙanƙanta akan waɗanda suke cikin hoton.`
F2: `Hoto na gaba yana nuna kwayan zarra masu fitar da photons. Hakika, a zahiri photons sunfi yawa akan waɗanda suke cikin hoton.`
---------------------- (361) ----------------------

F2: `Photons suna da kankanci fiye da abin da ke kunshe cikin atom!`
---------------------- (363) ----------------------

F2: `Farko, ya kamata a kashe matatsar wutan ko kuma katse hadin wayan kebur din.`
---------------------- (365) ----------------------

---------------------- (367) ----------------------

F2: `Jini na fitowa daga zuciya ta hanyoyin da ake kira arteries sannan ya na komawa cikin zuciya ta hanyoyin da ake kira veins. Mafikan kantar wadannan hanyoyi su ake kira da capillaries.`

---------------------- (384) ----------------------

F2: `Bayan koma bayan soja da aka samu da farko, Ethelred ya sami daidaituwa da Olaf, wanda ya koma Norway domin kokarin kwato masarautar sa, wadda ya sami nasara a wani wajen amma a wani wajen bai samu ba.`

F2: `A al’adance dai, wanda zai gaji sarautar kai tsaye zai tafi ne ga sojoji bayan kammala makaranta.`
---------------------- (425) ----------------------
F1: `Duk da haka, Charles ya halarci jami'a a Trinity College, Cambridge inda ya karanci Ilimin Al’ummomi da Al’adu da kuma Ilimin Nazarin Kayan Tarihi, kuma daga bisani Tarihi, ya sami maki 2:2 (digiri ajin ƙasa na biyu).`
F2: `Duk da haka, Charles ya halarci jami'ar Trinity College, Cambridge inda ya karanci Ilimin Al’ummomi da Al’adu wato Anthropology and Archaeology da kuma Ilimin Nazarin Kayan Tarihi, kuma daga bisani Tarihi, ya sami digiri na 2:2 (digiri ajin ƙasa na biyu).`
---------------------- (427) ----------------------
F1: `Turkiyyar Turai (wato gabashin Thrace ko Rumelia da ke cikin sashen tsibirin Balkan) ya ƙunshi kashi 3% ne na ƙasar.`
F2: `Turkiyyar Turai (wato gabashin Thrace ko Rumelia da ke cikin sashen tsibirin Balkan) ya kunshi kashi 3% ne na ƙasar.`
---------------------- (429) ----------------------
F1: `Yankin Turkiyya, wanda ya haɗa da tabkuna, ya mamaye kilomita square 783,562 (300,948 sq mi), wanda kilomita square 755,688 (kilomita 291,773) yana kudu maso yammacin Asiya da kuma kilomita square 23,764 (9,174 sq mi) a Turai.`
F2: `Yankin Turkiyya, wanda ya hada da tabkuna, ya mamaye murabba'in murabba'in kilomita 783,562 (300,948 sq mi), wanda murabba'in murabba'in kilomita 755,688 (kilomita 291,773) yana kudu maso yammacin Asiya da kuma murabba'in murabba’in kilomita 23,764 (9,174 sq mi) a Turai.`
---------------------- (430) ----------------------

F2: `Faɗin yankin Turkiyya ya sanya ta kasance ƙasa ta 37 mafi girma a duniya, ta kai girman ƙasashen Faransa da Birtaniya a hade.`
---------------------- (431) ----------------------

---------------------- (451) ----------------------

---------------------- (454) ----------------------

F2: `Rashin alfanu na gilasan kusantowa shine cewa wahalar tsayar da gani da kuma yawan kayan gilashin da ake bukata domin cim ma wasu jerin nisan gani ya fi girma akan gilasan ƙayyadajjen gani.`

F2: `Ta wannan hanyar, za ku gajiyar da kanku kamar kaɗan daidai gwargwado. Ku tuna cewa babu buƙatar a bugi makullin da ƙarfi sosai don ƙarin murya kamar akan fiyano.`

---------------------- (484) ----------------------

F2: `Mabiya addinin Sikh dai nadaukar kansu a matsayin masu bin wani addini na daban da addinin Hindu duk da cewa ma suna daukar addinin Hindun a zaman tushensu dama al’adarsu.`
---------------------- (487) ----------------------
F1: `Mutanen Sikh suna kiran addininsu Gurmat, wanda shine Punjabi ga “al'adar Guru”. Guru shine muhimmin ɓangare na dukkanin addinan Indiya amma a cikin Sikhism ya ɗauki mahimmancin da ke samar da asalin imanin Sikh.`
F2: `Mutanen Sikh suna kiran addininsu Gurmat, wanda shine Punjabi don “hanyar Guru”. Guru shine muhimmin bangare na dukkanin addinan Indiya amma a cikin Sikhism ya ɗauki mahimmancin da ke samar da asalin abubuwan Sikh.`
---------------------- (488) ----------------------
F1: `An kafa adinin a ƙarni na 15 wanda Guru Nanak (1469 - 1539) yayi. Sannan a ka biyo da waɗanda suka ci gadon sarauta wasu gurus guda tara.`

---------------------- (489) ----------------------
F1: `Dukda haka, a watan Yuni ta 1956, an gwada alƙawuran Krushchev a lokacin da tarzoma a Poland, inda ma'aikata ke zanga-zangar adawa da ƙarancin abinci da rage albashi, ta rikiɗe zuwa zanga-zangar gama gari ta adawa da Kwaminisanci.`
F2: `ko da yake, a watan Yuni ta 1956, an gwada alkawuran Krushchev a lokacin da tarzoma a Poland, inda ma'aikata ke zanga-zangar adawa da ƙarancin abinci da rage albashi, ta rikide zuwa zanga-zangar gama gari ta adawa da Kwaminisanci.`
---------------------- (490) ----------------------
F1: `Koda yake a ƙarshe, Kruschev ya aika da tankokin yaƙi don maido da zaman lafiya, amma ya amince da wasu buƙatun tattalin arziƙi da kuma yarda da naɗa mutumin nan mai farin jini Wladyslaw Gomulka a matsayin sabon firayin minista.`
F2: `Kodayake dai a ƙarshe, Kruschev ya aika da tankokin yaƙi don maido da zaman lafiya, amma ya amince da wasu buƙatun tattalin arziki da kuma naɗa mutumin nan mai farin jini wato Wladyslaw Gomulka a matsayin sabon firayin minista.`
---------------------- (491) ----------------------
F1: `Wayewar-kai na Kwarin Indus wata wayewar-kai na Zamanin Tagulla ce a arewa maso yamma na ƙaramar nahiyar Indiya wadda ta ƙunshi yawancin ƙasar Pakistan na zamanin yau da kuma wasu yankuna a cikin arewa maso yamma na Indiya da kuma arewa maso gabas na ƙasar Afganistan.`
F2: `Wayewar-kai na Kwarin Indus wata wayewar-kai na Zamanin Tagulla ce a arewa maso yamma na ƙaramar nahiyar Indiya wadda ta ƙunshi yawancin ƙasar Pakista na zamanin yau da kuma wasu yankuna a cikin arewa maso yamma na Indiya da kuma arewa maso gabas na ƙasa Afganistan.`
---------------------- (492) ----------------------
F1: `Wayewa ya bunƙasa a kewayen kogin Indus ta inda ya samo sunansa.`
F2: `Ci gaban wannan zamani ya bunkasa a kewayen kogin Indus ta inda ya samo sunansa.`
---------------------- (493) ----------------------
F1: `Koda yake wasu masana suna hasashen cewa tun da wayewa ya wanzu a kwarin kogin Sarasvati da yanzu ya ƙafe, ya kamata a kira shi da wayewar Indus-Sarasvati, yayin da wasu ke kiransa da wayewan Haraffa, yankin da aka fara haƙewa a shekarun 1920.`
F2: `Koda yake wasu masana suna hasashen cewa tun da ci gaban zamanin ya wanzu a kwarin da kogin Sarasvati ya kafe, ya kamata a kira shi da ci gaban zamani na Indus-Sarasvati, yayin da wasu ke kiransa da ci gaban zamani na Haraffa, wato yankin da aka fara hakewa a shekarun 1920.`
---------------------- (494) ----------------------

F2: `Yanayin Roman empire da ke dauke da salon soja ya taimaka wajen ci gaba a fanni lafiya.`
---------------------- (495) ----------------------

F2: `Sarki Augustus ya fara daukar likitoci aiki inda har ya kafa Ƙungiyar Likitocin Rum ta farko domin anfani da ita bayan ƙare yaki.`
---------------------- (496) ----------------------
F1: `Likitocin fiɗa suna da ilimin magunguna daban-daban na kashe jiki waɗanda suka haɗa da sinadarin morphine daga irin poppy da scopolamine da aka samo daga irin herbane.`
F2: `Likitocin fiɗa suna da ilimin magunguna daban-daban na kashe jiki wadanda suka hada da sinadarin morphine daga tsirrai da sikari da aka samo daga zirin herbane.`
---------------------- (499) ----------------------
F1: `Pureland origami shi ne origami mai iyakancewa akan iya naɗi ɗaya kawai za'ayi iya yi a lokaci guda, ba a yarda da naɗi mai wuya ba kamar naɗin baya, kuma dukkan naɗi suna da wurare kai tsaye.`
F2: `Pureland origami shi ne origami da ƙuntatawan da akan iya nadi daya kawai a lokaci guda, ba a yarda da nadi mai wuya ba kamar nadin baya, da dukkan nadi suna da wurare kai tsaye.`
---------------------- (500) ----------------------
F1: `John Smith ya ƙirƙiro shi a cikin shekarar 1970 don taimakon fayiloli da ba su da ƙwarewa ko waɗanda ke da ƙuntatacciyar damar motsi.`
F2: `John Smith ya kirkiro shi a cikin shekarar 1970 don taimakon masu adana fayiloli da ba su da ƙwarewa ko waɗanda ke da kuntatacciyar damar motsi.`
---------------------- (502) ----------------------
F1: `Alal misali, yaran da suke daga tsirarun ƙabilun da ake yi wa kallon basa wani abin kirki a makaranta akwai yiwuwar hakan ya dakushe himmarsu a makaranta da zarar sun fahimci cewa ana musu wani kallon-kallo saboda launin fatarsu.`
F2: `Alal misali, yaran da suke daga tsirarun kabilun da ake yi wa kallon basa wani abin kirki a makaranta akwai yiwuwar hakan ya dakushe himmarsu a makaranta da zarar sun fahimci cewa ana musu wani kallon-kallo saboda launin fatarsu.`
---------------------- (503) ----------------------

---------------------- (505) ----------------------

F2: `Shafin yanar gizon na da amfani, wanda ya hada da damar bude wani shafin da zai kunshi, karamin shafin yanar gizo, hoto mai motsi da mara motsi da wasu abubuwan.`

---------------------- (508) ----------------------

---------------------- (514) ----------------------

---------------------- (548) ----------------------

F2: `Da samun sauyi daga kwatan gudun rabin mil guda, batun gudu ya zama maras muhimmanci sosai yayin da jajircewa kuma ya zama wani abu na lallai.`
---------------------- (549) ----------------------

F2: `Tabbas mai tseren rabin mil ta lamba daya, mutumin da zai iya kure minti biyu, dole ne ya mallaki saurin gudu, amma dole ne a sami juriya a kowane haɗari.`
---------------------- (550) ----------------------

---------------------- (551) ----------------------
F1: `Tsarin abinci mai kyau kawai ba zai iya samar da ƙwazon fitattun mutane ba, amma suna iya tasiri sosai ga lafiyar 'yan wasa matasa gaba ɗaya.`
F2: `Tsarin abinci mai kyau kawai ba zai iya samar da ƙwazon fitattun mutane ba, amma suna iya tasiri sosai ga lafiyar 'yan wasa matasa gaba daya.`
---------------------- (552) ----------------------
F1: `Kula da ƙoshin lafiyar daidaituwar ƙarfin jiki, yin ɗabi'a mai kyau game da shan ruwa, da fahimtar abubuwa daban-daban na ayyukan haɓaka na iya taimaka wa 'yan wasa su inganta ayyukansu kuma su ƙara jin daɗin wasanni.`

---------------------- (553) ----------------------

F2: `Za a iya siyan kaya kamar yadda ake bukata,amma yawanci zasu zama marasa fa’ida kadan ko sosai akan aikin.`
---------------------- (557) ----------------------
F1: `Abu ne mai matuƙar wuyar sha’ani da ya haɗa da, bisa ga sassauƙan tsarin Bohr, na nucleus ɗin tsakiya wanda electrons suke zagaye shi, ya yi kama da duniyoyi da ke kewaye da rana - duba Hoto na 1.1.`
F2: `Abu ne mai matuƙar wuyar sha’ani da ya haɗa da, bisa ga sassauƙan tsarin Bohr, na tsakiyar nucleus wanda electrons suka zagaye, ya yi kama da taurarin da ke kewaye da rana - duba Hoto na 1.1.`
---------------------- (558) ----------------------
F1: `Nucleus ta ƙunshi abubuwa guda biyu- neutrons da protons.`
F2: `Tsakiya kwayar halittar ta kunshi abubuwa guda biyu-yayan kwayoyin zarra mara cajin lantarki da mai caji karbar wuta.`
---------------------- (559) ----------------------
F1: `Protons na ɗauke da cajin wutan lantarki mafi soyuwa yayin da ita Neutron bata ɗauke da wutan lantarki. Electrons suna da cajin wutan lantarki mummuna.`
F2: `Protons na dauke da cajin wutan lantarki mafi soyuwa yayin da ita Neutron bata dauke da wutan lantarki. Electrons suna da cajin wutan lantarki mummuna.`

---------------------- (634) ----------------------

---------------------- (636) ----------------------
F1: `A shekara ta 1970, Raymond Damadian, likita kuma masanin kimiyya mai bincike, ya gano madogarar amfani da magnetic resonance imaging a matsayin kayan aiki don gano cuta a asibiti.`
F2: `A shekara ta 1970, Raymond Damadian, likita kuma masanin kimiyya mai bincike, ya gano madogarar amfani da hton rawar magnet wato magnetic resonance imaging a matsayin kayan aiki don gano cuta a asibiti.`
---------------------- (637) ----------------------

F2: `Bayan shekaru hudu an ba da izini lambar mallakar kira, wanda shi ne farkon lambar kira a duniya da aka bayar a cikin fannin MRI.`
---------------------- (638) ----------------------
F1: `A shekarar 1977, Dr. Damadian ya kammala aikin ƙirƙirar na’urar MRI "ta duka jiki" ta farko, wadda ya kira da “gagara misali”.`
F2: `A shekarar 1977 ne, Dr. Damadian ya kammala aikin kirkirar na’urar MRI ta farko a tarihi, wadda ya kira da “gagara misali”.`
---------------------- (640) ----------------------
F1: `Yana ba wa ɗalibai damar yin aiki cikin hanzarinsu da iyakance hanzarinsu na kayan koyarwa da bayani.`
F2: `Yana ba wa dalibai daman yin aiki cikin hanzarinsu da iyakance hanzarinsu na kayan koyarwa da bayani.`
---------------------- (641) ----------------------
F1: `Bugu da ƙari, akwai ƙarancin takunkumin lokaci tare da yiwuwar sassaucin lokutan aiki. (Bremer, 1998)`
F2: `Bugu da kari, akwai karancin takunkumin lokaci tare da yiwuwar sassaucin lokutan aiki. (Bremer, 1998)`
---------------------- (643) ----------------------
F1: `Ɗalibai na iya gabatar da tambayoyi ga malamai a kowane lokaci na rana kuma suyi tsammanin amsoshi cikin gaggawa, maimakon jiran har sai ganawa ta gaba da gaba.`
F2: `Dalibai na iya gabatar da tambayoyi ga malamai a kowane lokaci na rana kuma suyi tsammanin amsoshi cikin gaggawa, maimakon jiran har sai ganawa ta gaba da gaba.`
---------------------- (644) ----------------------

F2: `Mahangar zamanin ga koyo yana ba da 'yanci daga kafaffun ƙa’idoji. Babu wata hanya mai kyau don koyo.`
---------------------- (645) ----------------------
F1: `A zahiri, babu wani abu mai kyau da za'a koya. Koyo yana faruwa ne a tsakanin mai koyo da kuma karantarwar da ake yi.`
F2: `A takaice dai, babu wani abun da za a koya. Koyarwa tana faruwa ne a tsakanin mai koyo da kuma karantarwar da ake yi.`
---------------------- (647) ----------------------
F1: `Da yawa daga cikinmu mun sami kanmu muna kallon wani shirin talibijin da ke ba mu labarin wani tsari ko ƙwarewa wanda ba za mu taɓa shiga ko amfani da wannan ilimin ba.`
F2: `Da yawa daga cikinmu sun sami kanmu muna kallon wani talibijin da ke ba mu labarin wani tsari ko ƙwarewa wanda ba za mu taɓa shiga ko amfani da wannan ilimin ba.`
---------------------- (648) ----------------------
F1: `Ba za mu taɓa yi wa mota garambawul ba, gina maɓuɓɓugar ruwa a filin bayan gidan mu, tafiya zuwa Peru don nazarin gidajen mutanen dā, ko kuma yi wa gidan maƙwabcin mu kwaskwarima.`
F2: `Ba za mu taɓa yi wa mota garambawul ba, gina maɓuɓɓugar ruwa a ciki filin bayan gidan mu, mu yi tafiya zuwa Peru don nazarin gidajen mutanen dā, ko kuma yi wa gidan maƙwabtcin mu kwaskwarima.`
---------------------- (649) ----------------------

F2: `Godiya ga haɗe-haɗen kebur na fiber optic a ƙarƙarshin teku zuwa ga Turai da kuma tauraron ɗan Adam mai yawan faɗi, Greenland yana a haɗe sosai kuma 93% a cikin jam'arsa suna da damar ga haɗin yanar-gizo.`
---------------------- (650) ----------------------

F2: `Otel dinka ko kuma wanda zai dauki bakoncinka (Idan yana zama a gidan ajiye baki ko kuma a gidansa) zai zama yana da maganadisun intanet na WIFI ko kwamfuta mai intanet kuma dukkan wuraren suna da shagunan intanet.`
---------------------- (651) ----------------------

F2: `Kamar yadda aka ambata a sama, kodayake kalmar “Eskimo” ya kasance karɓaɓɓiya a cikin Amurka, ana ɗaukar sa mai daɗaɗawa ga yawancin mutanen da ba 'yan Amurka ba da asalin mutanen Arctic, musamman ma Kanada.`

---------------------- (894) ----------------------
F1: `Abin da ya fi haddasa haɗura a lokacin hunturu shi ne titi da gefen titi da mutane ke bi da kuma matattakala masu santsi.`
F2: `Abin da ya fi haddasa hadura a lokacin hunturu shi ne kananan hanyoyi da hanyoyin da mutane ke bi a gefen titi musamman ma matattakala.`
---------------------- (895) ----------------------
F1: `Mafi karanci kana bukatar takalmi wanda ƙasan sa ya dace. Takalman lokacin zafi yawanci su na sulluɓewa a kan ƙanƙara ko dusarta hatta wasu takalman na hunturu su na gazawa.`
F2: `Mafi karanci kana bukatar takalmi wanda ke da kasansa mai kwari. Takalman lokacin zafi yawanci su na sullubewa a kan kankara ko dusarta hatta wasu takalman na hunturu su na gazawa.`
---------------------- (897) ----------------------
F1: `Wasu takalman suna da ƙusoshi a ƙasansu kuma akwai abin ƙari mai ƙusoshi don yanayin santsi, wanda ya dace da yawancin takalma da sau ciki, domin takalmi mai tsini ko mai tsini da soson tafin ƙafa.`
F2: `Wasu takalman suna da ƙusoshi a ƙasansu kuma akwai abin ƙari mai ƙusoshi don yanayin santsi, wanda ya dace da yawancin takalma, domin dugadugai ko dugadugai da tafin kafa.`
---------------------- (898) ----------------------
F1: `Ya kamata tsinin takalma su yi ƙasa da faɗi. Yawanci ana watsa yashi, tsakuwa ko gishiri (Calcium Chloride) a kan tituna ko hanyoyi don inganta kama ƙasa.`
F2: `Ya kamata wasu bayan tafin kafan takalma su yi kasa ko faɗi. Ana watsa yashi, tsakuwa ko gishiri (Calcium Chloride) a kan tituna ko hanyoyi don inganta kama ƙasa.`
---------------------- (899) ----------------------
F1: `Avalanches ba abu ne mara kyau ba; gangara na iya riƙewa a hankali sosai, sai kuma sauran kima za su zuɓo a matsayin avalanches.`

---------------------- (900) ----------------------
F1: `Matsalar ita ce dusar ƙanƙara na da danƙo, don haka yana buƙatar musabbabi da zai saka shi saukowa, kuma wasu dusar ƙanƙara da ke saukowa na iya zama musabbabin aukuwa ga sauran.`
F2: `Matsalar ita ce dusar ƙanƙara na da danko, don haka yana buƙatar wasu abubuwan da za su iya saukowa su sauko, kuma wasu dusar ƙanƙara da ke saukowa na iya zama abin da ke haifar da sauran.`
---------------------- (901) ----------------------

F2: `Wasu lokuta asalin abin da ke haifar da shi shine hasken rana da ke sanya dusar ƙanƙara, wani lokacin wasu ƙarin dusar ƙanƙara, wani lokacin wasu al'amuran yanayi, sau da yawa ɗan adam.`
---------------------- (902) ----------------------

F2: `Mahaukaciyar guguwa kamar wani sunduki ne me jujjuyawa wanda ke kunshe da iska mai nauyi wadda ke zukar sauran iska da ke gefenta daga kasa ya yi sama.`
